T09bsa032_u:329: tadarhati śrotumayaṃ jano yadi pracakṣva tatkiṃ nviti bhāṣase nṛpa /
T09bsa032_u:330: rahasyamevaṃ ca na kīrtyate kvacitprakāśamasmācca mayāpi pṛcchyate // Jm_3.7 //
T09bsa032_u:331: atha sa rājā prītyabhisnigdhayā dṛṣṭyā samabhivīkṣya devīṃ smitapravikasitavadana uvāca -
T09bsa032_u:333: na kevalaṃ tavaivātra kautūhalacalaṃ manaḥ // Jm_3.8 //
T09bsa032_u:335: puraṃ ca sāntaḥpuramatra tena me niśamyatāṃ yena mayaivamucyate // Jm_3.9 //
T09bsa032_u:336: suptaprabuddha iva jātimanusmarāmi yasyāmihaiva nagare bhṛtako 'hamāsam /
T09bsa032_u:339: bhikṣārthinaśca caturaḥ śramaṇānapaśyaṃ vaśyendriyānanugatāniva bhikṣulakṣmyā // Jm_3.11 //
T09bsa032_u:340: tebhyaḥ prasādamṛdunā manasā praṇamya kulmāṣamātrakamadāṃ prayataḥ svagehe /
T09bsa032_u:341: tasyāṅkarodaya ivaiṣa yadanyarājacūḍāprabhāścaraṇareṇuṣu me niṣaktāḥ // Jm_3.12 //
T09bsa032_u:343: puṇyena ca labhe tṛptimarhatāṃ darśanena ca // Jm_3.13 //
T09bsa032_u:344: atha sā devī praharṣavismayaviśālākṣī sabahumānamudīkṣamāṇā rājānamityuvāca /
T09bsa032_u:347: tadevameva pāpapravṛttivimukhaḥ piteva prajānāṃ samyakparipālanasumukhaḥ puṇyagaṇārjanābhimukhaḥ /
T09bsa032_u:350: samīraṇākuñcitasāgarāmvarāṃ ciraṃ mahīṃ dharmanayena pālaya // Jm_3.14 //
T09bsa032_u:352: so 'haṃ tameva punarāśrayituṃ yatiṣye śreyaḥpathaṃ samabhilakṣitaramyacihnam /
T09bsa032_u:353: lokaḥ praditsati hi dānaphalaṃ niśamya dāsyāmyahaṃ kimiti nātmagataṃ niśamya // Jm_3.15 //
T09bsa032_u:354: atha sa rājā devīṃ devīmiva śriyā jvalantīmabhisnigdhamavekṣya śrīsampattihetukutūhalahṛdayaḥ punaruvāca -
T09bsa032_u:356: akṛthāḥ kiṃ nu kalyāṇi karmātimadhurodayam // Jm_3.16 //
T09bsa032_u:357: devyuvāca - asti deva kiñcidahamapi pūrvajanmavṛttiṃ samanusmarāmīti /
T09bsa032_u:358: kathaya kathayedānīmiti ca sādaraṃ rājñā paryanuyuktovāca -
T09bsa032_u:360: kṣīṇāsravāya munaye vinayena dattvā supteva tatra samavāpamiha prabodham // Jm_3.17 //
T09bsa032_u:361: etatsmarāmi kuśalaṃ naradeva yena tvannāthatāmupagatāsmi samaṃ pṛthivyā /
T09bsa032_u:362: kṣīṇāsraveṣu na kṛtaṃ tanu nāma kiñcidityuktavānasi yathaiva munistathaiva // Jm_3.18 //
T09bsa032_u:363: atha sa rājā puṇyaphalapradarśanātpuṇyeṣu samutpāditabahumānāmabhiprasannamanasaṃ parṣadaṃ vismayaikāgrāmavetya niyatamīdṛśaṃ kiñcitsamanuśaśāsa
T09bsa032_u:366: naiva draṣṭumapi kṣamaḥ sa puruṣaḥ paryāptavitto 'pi san
T09bsa032_u:368: tyaktavyaṃ vivaśena yanna ca tathā kasmaicidarthāya yat
T09bsa032_u:370: ko 'sau tatra bhajeta matsarapathaṃ jānanguṇānāṃ rasaṃ
T09bsa032_u:376: vibhavasamudayaṃ vā dīptamājñāguṇaṃ vā tridaśapuranivāsaṃ rūpaśobhāguṇaṃ vā /
T09bsa032_u:377: yadabhilaṣati sarvaṃ tatsamāpnoti dānād iti parigaṇitārthaḥ ko na dānāni dadyāt // Jm_3.22 //
T09bsa032_u:379: dānaṃ śrīmatsajjanatvāvadānaṃ bālyaprajñaiḥ pāṃsudānaṃ sudānam // Jm_3.23 //
T09bsa032_u:380: atha sā parṣattasya rājñastadgrāhakaṃ vacanaṃ sabahumānamabhinandya pradānādipratipattyabhimukhī babhūva /
T09bsa032_u:381: tadevaṃ cittaprasādodgataṃ pātrātiśayapratipāditaṃ ca nālpakaṃ nāma dānamasti vipākamahattvāditi
T09bsa032_u:382: prasannacittenānuttare puṇyakṣetra āryasaṃghe dānaṃ dadatā parā prītirutpādayitavyā /
T09bsa032_u:383: adūre mamāpyevaṃvidhā ato viśiṣṭatarāśca sampattaya iti /
T09bsa032_u:388: kena nāma svasthena na dātavyaṃ syāt?
T09bsa032_u:394: tyāgaśauryonnataṃ nāma tasya vyāpa diśo daśa // Jm_4.1 //
T09bsa032_u:398: sattvārthiduḥkhaṃ na śaśāka soḍhuṃ nāstīti vaktuṃ ca tato jugopa // Jm_4.3 //
T09bsa032_u:399: atha kadācittasya mahāsattvasya bhojanakāle snātānuliptagātrasya kuśalodārasūdopakalpite
T09bsa032_u:409: bhikṣārthinamabhigatamālokya patnīmuvāca - bhadre svayamāryāya paryāptaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ dehīti /
T09bsa032_u:410: sā tatheti pratiśrutya praṇītaṃ bhakṣyabhojyamādāya prasthitā /
T09bsa032_u:412: kimetaditi ca bhartrā paryanuyuktā samāpatitasādhvasāpihitakaṇṭhī tatkathañcittasmai kathayāmāsa /
T09bsa032_u:413: atha bodhisattvaḥ kathamayamāryo madgṛhādanavāptabhikṣa eva pratiyāsyatīti sasambhramaṃ
T09bsa032_u:414: tattasyāḥ kathitamanādṛtya svayameva ca praṇītaṃ bhakṣyabhojyamādāya tasya mahātmanaḥ
T09bsa032_u:416: tasya kiṃ svididamiti samutpannavitarkasya māraḥ pāpīyānbhavanabhitterviniḥsṛtya
T09bsa032_u:417: saṃdṛśyamānadivyādbhūtavapurantarikṣe sthitvā hitakāma iva nāmābravīt - gṛhapate
T09bsa032_u:421: arthastrivargasya viśeṣahetustasminhate kena hato na dharmaḥ /
T09bsa032_u:422: dharmaṃ ca hatvārthanibarhaṇena kathaṃ nu na syānnarakapratiṣṭhaḥ // Jm_4.6 //
T09bsa032_u:423: dānaprasaṅgena ca dharmamūlaṃ ghnatā tvayārthaṃ yadakāri pāpam /
T09bsa032_u:425: tatsādhu dānādviniyaccha buddhimevaṃ hi sadyaḥpatanaṃ na te syāt /
T09bsa032_u:426: viceṣṭamānaiḥ karuṇaṃ rudadbhirmā dātṛbhirgāḥ samatāmamībhiḥ // Jm_4.8 //
T09bsa032_u:430: atha bodhisattvo nūnamasyaitaddurātmano mama dānavighnāya viceṣṭitamityavagamya sattvāvaṣṭambhadhīraṃ vinayamadhurāvicchedaṃ niyatamityavocadenam
T09bsa032_u:432: yuktā viśeṣeṇa ca daivateṣu parānukampānipuṇā pravṛttiḥ // Jm_4.10 //
T09bsa032_u:433: doṣodayātpūrvamanantaraṃ vā yuktaṃ tu tacchāntipathena gantum /
T09bsa032_u:434: gate prayāsaṃ hyupacāradoṣairvyādhau cikitsāpraṇayo vighātaḥ // Jm_4.11 //
T09bsa032_u:435: idaṃ ca dānavyasanaṃ madīyaṃ śaṅke cikitsāviṣayavyatītam /
T09bsa032_u:436: tathā hyanādṛtya hitaiṣitāṃ te na me manaḥ saṅkacati pradānāt // Jm_4.12 //
T09bsa032_u:437: dānādadharmaṃ ca yadūcivāṃstvamarthaṃ ca dharmasya viśeṣahetum /
T09bsa032_u:438: tanmānuṣī neyamavaiti buddhirdānādṛte dharmapatho yathārthaḥ // Jm_4.13 //
T09bsa032_u:439: nidhīyamānaḥ sa nu dharmahetuścauraiḥ prasahyātha vilupyamānaḥ /
T09bsa032_u:441: yaccāttha dātā narakaṃ prayāti pratigrahītā tu surendralokam /
T09bsa032_u:442: vivardhitastena ca me tvayā 'yaṃ dānodyamaḥ saṃyamayiṣyatāpi // Jm_4.15 //
T09bsa032_u:443: ananyathā cāstu vacastavedaṃ svargaṃ ca me yācanakā vrajantu /
T09bsa032_u:444: dānaṃ hi me lokahitārthamiṣṭaṃ nedaṃ svasaukhyodayasādhanāya // Jm_4.16 //
T09bsa032_u:446: atha sa māraḥ pāpīyānpunarapi bodhisattvaṃ hitaiṣīva dhīrahastenovāca -
T09bsa032_u:447: hitoktimetāṃ mama cāpalaṃ vā samīkṣya yenecchasi tena gaccha /
T09bsa032_u:448: sukhānvito vā bahumānapūrvaṃ smartāsi māṃ vipratisāravānvā // Jm_4.17 //
T09bsa032_u:450: kāmaṃ patāmi narakaṃ sphuradugravahniṃ jvālāvalīḍhaśithilāvanatena mūrdhnā /
T09bsa032_u:451: na tvarthināṃ praṇayadarśitasauhṛdānāṃ sammānakālamavamānanayā hariṣye // Jm_4.18 //
T09bsa032_u:452: ityuktvā bodhisattvaḥ svabhāgyabalāvaṣṭambhājjānānaśca niratyayatāṃ dānasya nivāraṇaikarasamavadhūya
T09bsa032_u:456: atha bodhisattvaḥ padmasaṃkrameṇa svapuṇyātiśayanirjātenābhigamya pratyekabuddhaṃ prasādasaṃharṣāpūrṇahṛdayaḥ piṇḍapātamasmai prāyacchat /
T09bsa032_u:458: varṣañjvalaṃścaiva sa tatra reje savidyududdyotapayodalakṣmyā // Jm_4.20 //
T09bsa032_u:460: tamabhimukhamudīkṣituṃ na sehe saha narakeṇa tatastirobabhūva // Jm_4.21 //
T09bsa032_u:463: kena nāma svasthena na dātavyaṃ syāt?
T09bsa032_u:468: na vibhavakṣayāvekṣayā samṛddhyāśayā vā pradānavaidhuryamupayānti satpuruṣāḥ /
T09bsa032_u:472: dāyakaśreṣṭhaḥ śreṣṭhī babhūva mātsaryādidoṣāviṣahyo 'viṣahya iti prakāśanāmā /
T09bsa032_u:474: yathārthināṃ darśanamāsa tasya tathārthināṃ darśanamāsa tasya // Jm_5.1 //
T09bsa032_u:475: dehīti yācñāniyatārthamukto nāstīti nāsau gadituṃ śaśāka /
T09bsa032_u:476: hṛtāvakāśā hi babhūva citte tasyārthasaktiḥ kṛpayā mahatyā // Jm_5.2 //
T09bsa032_u:479: bhavanti lokasya hi bhūyasārthā lobhāśrayād durgatimārgasārthāḥ /
T09bsa032_u:487: yathā yathā tasya vineśurarthāḥ sūryābhisṛṣṭa iva toyaleśāḥ /
T09bsa032_u:488: tathā tathainān vipulaiḥ pradānairgṛhātpradīptādiva nirjahāra // Jm_5.5 //
T09bsa032_u:490: atha śakro devendrastyāgaparāyaṇameva taṃ mahāsattvamavetya prakṣīyamāṇavibhavasāramapi
T09bsa032_u:492: atha bodhisattvaḥ prabhātāyāṃ rajanyāṃ yathocittaṃ prativibuddhaḥ paśyati sma dhanadhānyaparicchadaparijanavibhavaśūnyaṃ
T09bsa032_u:494: kimiti ca samutthitavitarkaḥ samanuvicaraṃstadrajjukuṇḍalakaṃ dātraṃ ca kevalamatra dadarśa /
T09bsa032_u:495: tasya cintā prādurabhavat - yadi tāvat kenacidyācitumanucitavacasā svavikramopārjitopajauvinā madgṛhe praṇaya evaṃ darśitaḥ sūpayuktā evamarthāḥ
T09bsa032_u:496: atha tvidānīṃ madbhāgyadoṣāducchrayamasahamānena kenacidanupayuktā eva vidrutāstatkaṣṭam /
T09bsa032_u:498: arthināmeva pīḍā tu dahatyatra mano mama // Jm_5.6 //
T09bsa032_u:500: kathaṃ bhaviṣyanti nu te mamārthinaḥ pipāsitāḥ śuṣkamivāgatā hradam // Jm_5.7 //
T09bsa032_u:501: atha sa bodhisattvaḥ svadhairyāvaṣṭambhādanāsvāditaviṣādadainyastasyāmapyavasthāyāmanabhyastayācñākramatvāt parān yācituṃ paricitānapi na prasehe
T09bsa032_u:502: evaṃ duṣkaraṃ yācitumiti ca tasya bhūyasī yācanakeṣvanukampā babhūva /
T09bsa032_u:503: atha sa mahātmā yācanakajanasvāgatādikriyāvekṣayā svayameva tadrajjukuṇḍalakaṃ dātraṃ ca pratigṛhya pratyahaṃ tṛṇavikrayopalabdhayā vibhavamātrayārthijanapraṇayasammānanāṃ cakāra /
T09bsa032_u:504: atha śakro devendrastasyemāmaviṣāditāṃ parame 'pi dāridrye pradānābhimukhatāṃ cāvekṣya
T09bsa032_u:508: na dasyubhirnaiva jalānalābhyāṃ na rājabhiḥ saṃhriyamāṇavittaḥ // Jm_5.8 //
T09bsa032_u:509: tattvāṃ hitāvekṣitayā bravīmi niyaccha dāne vyasanānurāgam /
T09bsa032_u:510: itthaṃgataḥ sannapi cenna dadyā yāyāḥ punaḥ pūrvasamṛddhiśobhām // Jm_5.9 //
T09bsa032_u:512: śaśvat kṛśenāpi parivyayeṇa kālena dṛṣṭvā kṣayamarjanānām /
T09bsa032_u:513: cayena valmīkasamucchrayāṃśca vṛddhyarthinaḥ saṃyama eva panthāḥ // Jm_5.10 //
T09bsa032_u:516: mā caiva tadbhūnmama śakra vittaṃ yatprāptihetoḥ kṛpaṇāśayaḥ syām // Jm_5.11 //
T09bsa032_u:517: icchanti yācñāmaraṇena gantuṃ duḥkhasya yasya pratikāramārgam /
T09bsa032_u:518: tenāturān kaḥ kulaputramānī nāstīti śuṣkāśaninābhihanyāt // Jm_5.12 //
T09bsa032_u:519: tanmadvidhaḥ kiṃ svidupādadīta ratnaṃ dhanaṃ vā divi vāpi rājyam /
T09bsa032_u:522: sa tyāgamevārhati madvidhebhyaḥ parigrahacchadmamayo vighātaḥ // Jm_5.14 //
T09bsa032_u:524: dāne nidāne ca sukhodayānāṃ mātsaryamāryaḥ ka ivāśrayeta // Jm_5.15 //
T09bsa032_u:526: svabhyastaharṣaṃ tu manaḥ pradānaistadutpathe kena dhṛtiṃ labheta // Jm_5.16 //
T09bsa032_u:528: na cātra manyoranuvṛttimārge cittaṃ bhavānarhati saṃniyoktum /
T09bsa032_u:529: na hi svabhāvasya vipakṣadurgamāroḍhumalpena balena śakyam // Jm_5.17 //
T09bsa032_u:530: śakra uvāca - gṛhapate paryāptavibhavasya paripūrṇakośakoṣṭhāgārasya samyakpravṛttavividhavipulakarmāntasya
T09bsa032_u:531: virūḍhāyaterloke vaśīkṛtaiśvaryasyāyaṃ kramo nemāṃ daśāmabhiprapannasya / paśya -
T09bsa032_u:533: samṛddhimākṛṣya śubhena karmaṇā sapatnatejāṃsyabhibhūya bhānuvat // Jm_5.18 //
T09bsa032_u:534: jane prasaṅgena vitasya sadgatiṃ prabodhya harṣaṃ sasuhṛtsu bandhuṣu /
T09bsa032_u:536: atha pradāne pravijṛmbhitakramaḥ sukheṣu vā naiti janasya vācyatām /
T09bsa032_u:537: ajātapakṣaḥ khamivārurukṣayā vighātabhākkevalayā tu ditsayā // Jm_5.20 //
T09bsa032_u:539: anāryatāpyatra ca nāma kā bhavenna yatpradadyā vibhaveṣvabhāviṣu // Jm_5.21 //
T09bsa032_u:541: ātmārthaḥ syādyasya garīyān parakāryāt tenāpi syāddeyamanādṛtya samṛddhim /
T09bsa032_u:542: naiti prītiṃ tāṃ hi mahatyāpi vibhūtyā dānaistuṣṭiṃ lobhajayādyāmupabhuṅkte // Jm_5.22 //
T09bsa032_u:544: naiti svargaṃ kevalayā yacca samṛddhyā dānenaiva khyātimavāpnoti ca puṇyām /
T09bsa032_u:545: mātsaryādīnnābhibhavatyeva ca doṣāṃstasyā hetordānamataḥ ko na bhajeta // Jm_5.23 //
T09bsa032_u:547: yo nāsvādaṃ vetti sukhānāṃ paraduḥkhaiḥ kastasyārthastvadgatayā syādapi lakṣmyā // Jm_5.24 //
T09bsa032_u:550: iti yācanakaṃ labdhvā na samṛddhiravekṣyate // Jm_5.25 //
T09bsa032_u:551: eko rathaśca bhuvi yadvidadhāti vartma tenāparo vrajati dhṛṣṭataraṃ tathānyaḥ /
T09bsa032_u:552: kalyāṇamādyamimamityavadhūya mārgaṃ nāsatpathapraṇayane ramate mano me // Jm_5.26 //
T09bsa032_u:553: arthaśca vistaramupaiṣyati cetpunarme hartā manāṃsi niyamena sa yācakānām /
T09bsa032_u:554: evaṃgate 'pi ca yathāvibhavaṃ pradāsye mā caiva dānaniyame pramadiṣma śakra // Jm_5.27 //
T09bsa032_u:555: ityukte śakro devendraḥ samabhiprasāditamanāḥ sādhu sādhvityenamabhisaṃrādhya sabahumānasnigdhamavekṣamāṇa uvāca -
T09bsa032_u:558: acintayitvā tu dhanakṣayaṃ tvayā svasaukhyahāniṃ mama ca pratāraṇām /
T09bsa032_u:562: pradānasaṃkocavirūpatāṃ gataṃ dhane pranaṣṭe 'pi na yattadāśayā // Jm_5.30 //
T09bsa032_u:564: himāvadātaḥ śikharīva vāyunā na yatpradānādasi kampito mayā // Jm_5.31 //
T09bsa032_u:565: yaśaḥ samudbhāvayituṃ parīkṣayā dhanaṃ tavedaṃ tu nigūḍhavānaham /
T09bsa032_u:567: yataḥ pradānairabhivarṣa yācakān hradān mahāmegha ivābhipūrayan /
T09bsa032_u:568: dhanakṣayaṃ nāpsyasi matparigrahādidaṃ kṣamethāśca viceṣṭitaṃ mama // Jm_5.33 //
T09bsa032_u:569: ityenamabhisaṃrādhya śakrastaccāsya vibhavasāramupasaṃhṛtya kṣamayitvā ca tatraivāntardadhe /
T09bsa032_u:570: tadevaṃ na vibhavakṣayāvekṣayā samṛddhyāśayā vā pradānavaidhuryamupayānti satpuruṣā iti /
T09bsa032_u:575: kena nāma manuṣyabhūtena na dātavyaṃ syāt?
T09bsa032_u:586: tasya guṇātiśayasaṃbhṛtena snehagauraveṇa viśeṣavattaramavabaddhahṛdayāstu ye sahāyā babhūvurudraḥ śṛgālo vānaraśca,
T09bsa032_u:587: te parasparasaṃbandhanibaddhasnehā iva bāndhavā anyonyapraṇayasaṃmānanāvirūḍhasauhārdā iva ca suhṛdaḥ saṃmodamānāstatra viharanti sma /
T09bsa032_u:589: dharmāvirodhinyā ca yaśo 'nuvṛttyā paṭuvijñānatvādviniyamadhīrayā ca sajjaneṣṭayā
T09bsa032_u:591: sukhānulome guṇabādhini krame guṇānukūle ca sukhoparodhini /
T09bsa032_u:593: abhūtsa teṣāṃ tu śaśākṛtiḥ kṛtī parānukampāpratiṣadgururguruḥ /
T09bsa032_u:594: svabhāvasaṃpacca guṇakramānugā yaśo yadeṣāṃ suralokamapyagāt // Jm_6.5 //
T09bsa032_u:596: atha kadācit sa mahātmā sāyāhnasamaye dharmaśravaṇārthamabhigataiḥ sabahumānamupāsyamānastaiḥ
T09bsa032_u:606: dānena śīlābharaṇena tasmāt puṇyāni saṃvardhayituṃ yatadhvam /
T09bsa032_u:607: vivartamānasya hi janmadurge lokasya puṇyāni parā pratiṣṭhā // Jm_6.8 //
T09bsa032_u:609: jyotīṃṣi cākramya sahasraraśmiryaddīpyate puṇyaguṇocchrayaḥ saḥ // Jm_6.9 //
T09bsa032_u:613: puṇyādhikaiḥ sā hyavabhartsyamānā paryetyamarṣādiva tadvipakṣān // Jm_6.11 //
T09bsa032_u:615: śrīmatsu saukhyodayasādhaneṣu puṇyaprasaṅgeṣu matiṃ kurudhvam // Jm_6.12 //
T09bsa032_u:617: te tathetyasyānuśāsanāṃ pratigṛhyābhivādya pradakṣiṇīkṛtya cainaṃ svānsvānālayānabhijagmuḥ /
T09bsa032_u:618: aciragateṣu ca teṣu sahāyeṣu sa mahātmā cintāmāpede /
T09bsa032_u:622: śakyā nātithaye dātuṃ sarvathā dhigaśaktitām // Jm_6.14 //
T09bsa032_u:625: tatkutredānīmidamatithiparicaryāvaiguṇye niḥsāraṃ śarīrakamutsṛjyamānaṃ kasyacidupayogāya syāditi vimṛśansa mahātmā smṛtiṃ pratilebhe / aye
T09bsa032_u:629: samadhigatamidaṃ mayātitheyaṃ hṛdaya vimuñca yato viṣādadainyam /
T09bsa032_u:631: iti viniścatya sa mahāsattvaḥ paramamiva lābhamadhigamya paramaprītamanāstatrāvatastheḥ /
T09bsa032_u:634: tataḥ praharṣādiva sācalā calā mahī babhūvānibhṛtārṇavāṃśukā /
T09bsa032_u:635: vitastanuḥ khe suradundubhisvanā diśaḥ prasādābharaṇāścakāśire // Jm_6.19 //
T09bsa032_u:642: vitarkādbhūtaṃ śakro devendraḥ samāpūryamāṇavismayakautūhalena manasā tasya mahāsattvasya
T09bsa032_u:647: iva kṣuttarṣaśramaviṣādadīnakaṇṭhaḥ sasvaraṃ prarudannātidūre teṣāṃ vicukrośa /
T09bsa032_u:651: kāntāre 'smindharmatarṣaklamārtaṃ mā bhaiḥ śabdaiḥ ko nu māṃ hlādayeta // Jm_6.23 //
T09bsa032_u:652: atha te mahāsattvāstasya tena karuṇenākranditaśabdena samākampitahṛdayāḥ sasaṃbhramā drutataragatayastaṃ deśamabhijagmuḥ /
T09bsa032_u:655: svasya śiṣyagaṇasyeva samīpe vartase hi naḥ // Jm_6.24 //
T09bsa032_u:657: vidhāyānugrahaṃ saumya śco gantāsi yathepsitam // Jm_6.25 //
T09bsa032_u:660: khedaprasuptā iva sapta matsyā labdhā mayaitānnivaseha bhuktvā // Jm_6.26 //
T09bsa032_u:663: ekā ca godhā daghibhājanaṃ ca kenāpi saṃtyaktamihādhyagaccham /
T09bsa032_u:664: tanme hitāvekṣitayopayujya vane 'stu te 'sminguṇavāsa vāsaḥ // Jm_6.27 //
T09bsa032_u:667: āmrāṇi pakvānyudakaṃ manojñaṃ chāyā ca satsaṃgamasaukhyaśītā /
T09bsa032_u:668: ityasti me brahmavidāṃ variṣṭha bhuktvaitadatraiva tavāstu vāsaḥ // Jm_6.28 //
T09bsa032_u:669: atha śaśaḥ samupasṛtyainamupacārakriyānantaraṃ sabahumānamudīkṣamāṇaḥ svena śarīreṇopanimantrayāmāsa -
T09bsa032_u:670: na santi mudgā na tilā na taṇḍulā vane vivṛddhasya śaśasya kecana /
T09bsa032_u:673: na cāsti dehādadhikaṃ ca me dhanaṃ pratīccha sarvasvamidaṃ yato mama // Jm_6.30 //
T09bsa032_u:676: iti darśitasauhārde kathā kaiva bhavadvidhe // Jm_6.31 //
T09bsa032_u:679: atha śakro devānāmindrastasya bhāvamavetya taptatapanīyavarṇaṃ sphuratpratanujvālaṃ vikīryamāṇavisphuliṅgaprakaraṃ nirdhūmamaṅgārarāśimabhinirmame
T09bsa032_u:681: dṛṣṭvā ca prītamanāḥ śakramuvāca - samadhigato 'yaṃ mayātmānugrahopāyaḥ /
T09bsa032_u:684: deyaṃ ca ditsāpravaṇaṃ ca cittaṃ bhavadvidhenātithinā ca yogaḥ /
T09bsa032_u:686: nāvāptumetaddhi sukhena śakyaṃ tatsyādamoghaṃ bhavadāśrayānme // Jm_6.32 //
T09bsa032_u:688: tataḥ sa taṃ vahnimabhijvalantaṃ nidhiṃ dhanārthī sahasaiva dṛṣṭvā /
T09bsa032_u:689: pareṇa harṣeṇa samāruroha toyaṃ hasatpadmamivaikahaṃsaḥ // Jm_6.33 //
T09bsa032_u:697: jātiḥ kveyaṃ tadvirodhi kva cedaṃ tyāgaudāryaṃ cetasaḥ pāṭavaṃ ca /
T09bsa032_u:698: vispaṣṭo 'yaṃ puṇyamandādarāṇāṃ pratyādeśo devatānāṃ nṛṇāṃ ca // Jm_6.35 //
T09bsa032_u:701: atha śakrastatkarmātiśayavikhyāpanārthaṃ lokahitāvekṣī śaśabimbalakṣaṇena vaijayantasya prāsādavarasya sudharmāyāśca devasabhāyāḥ kūṭāgārakarṇike candramaṇḍalaṃ cābhyalaṃcakāra /
T09bsa032_u:708: kena nāma manuṣyabhūtena na dātavyaṃ syāt?
T09bsa032_u:709: tathā tiryaggatā api guṇavātsalyāt saṃpūjyante sadbhiriti guṇeṣvādaraḥ kārya ityevamapyunneyam /
T09bsa032_u:718: sa yathākramaṃ śrutismṛtivihitānavāpya jātakarmādīn saṃskārānadhītya sāṅgānvedānkṛtsnaṃ
T09bsa032_u:719: ca kalpaṃ vyāpya vidyāyaśasā manuṣyalokaṃ guṇapriyairdātṛbhirabhyarthya pratigṛhyamāṇavibhavatvāt
T09bsa032_u:722: prahlādayāmāsa tathā samṛddhyā deśānmahāmedha ivābhivarṣan // Jm_7.1 //
T09bsa032_u:723: vidvattayā tasya yaśaḥ prakāśaṃ tattyāgaśauryādadhikaṃ cakāśe /
T09bsa032_u:726: kṛśāsvādaṃ gārhasthyamavetya taddoṣaviviktasukhāṃ ca dharmapratipattyanukūlāṃ mokṣadharmārambhādhiṣṭhānabhūtāṃ
T09bsa032_u:729: pravrajitamapi taṃ mahāsattvaṃ yaśaḥprakāśatvāt pūrvasaṃstavānusmaraṇāt saṃbhāvitaguṇatvāt praśamābhilakṣitatvācca śreyo 'rthī janastadguṇagaṇāvarjitamatistathaivābhijagāma
T09bsa032_u:735: navacandra iva vyomni kāntatvenākṛśaḥ kṛśaḥ // Jm_7.3 //
T09bsa032_u:739: atha sa mahātmā pradānocitatvāttapovane 'pi nivasan kālopanatamatithijanaṃ yathāsaṃnihitena
T09bsa032_u:740: mūlaphalena śucinā salilena hṛdyābhiśca svāgatāśīrvādapeśalābhistapasvijanayogyābhirvāgbhiḥ saṃpūjayati sma /
T09bsa032_u:741: atithijanopayuktaśeṣeṇa ca yātrāmātrārthamabhyavahṛtena tena vanyenāhāreṇa vartayāmāsa /
T09bsa032_u:742: tasya tapaḥprakarṣāt pravisṛtena yaśasā samāvarjitahṛdayaḥ śakro devendraḥ sthairyajijñāsayā
T09bsa032_u:745: bodhisattvo 'pi dhyānaprasṛtamānasatayā saṃtoṣaparicayādanadhimūrcchitatvādāhāre svaśarīre cānabhiṣvaṅgānna tamantardhānahetuṃ manasi cakāra
T09bsa032_u:746: sa taruṇāni taruparṇānyadhiśrāya tairāhāraprayojanamabhiniṣpādyātṛṣyamāṇa āhāraviśeṣānutsukaḥ svasthamatistathaiva vijahāra /
T09bsa032_u:748: kutra nāma na vidyante tṛṇaparṇajalāśayāḥ // Jm_7.5 //
T09bsa032_u:751: atha bodhisattvaḥ pratyārdratarāṇi śīrṇaparṇāni samāhṛtya tairudakasvinnairanutkaṇṭhitamatirvartamāno dhyānasukhaprīṇitamanāstatrāmṛtatṛpta iva vijahāra /
T09bsa032_u:754: atha śakrastena tasyādbhutarūpeṇa saṃtoṣasthairyeṇa samabhivṛddhavismayaḥ sāmarṣa
T09bsa032_u:755: iva tasya mahāsattvasya vratakāle hutāgnihotrasya parisamāptajapyasyātithijanadidṛkṣayā
T09bsa032_u:760: kṛcchropalabdhamapi tacchrapaṇaṃ samastaṃ tasmai dadau svayamabhūcca mudeva tṛptaḥ // Jm_7.7 //
T09bsa032_u:762: sa tathaiva praviśya dhyānāgāraṃ tenaiva prītiprāmodyena tamahorātramatināmayāmāsa //
T09bsa032_u:763: atha śakrastasya dvitīye tṛtīye caturthe pañcame 'pi cāhani tathaiva vratakāle purataḥ prādurabhūt /
T09bsa032_u:770: āśāṅkuśaṃ nu vyavasṛjya kutra tapaḥparikleśamimaṃ śrito 'si // Jm_7.9 //
T09bsa032_u:772: na hetunālpena hi yānti dhīrāḥ sukhoparodhīni tapovanāni // Jm_7.10 //
T09bsa032_u:774: kiṃ nāma tadyasya guṇapraveśavaśīkṛtaivaṃ bhavato 'pi buddhiḥ // Jm_7.11 //
T09bsa032_u:775: bodhisattva uvāca - śrūyatāṃ mārṣa yannimitto 'yaṃ mama prayatnaḥ /
T09bsa032_u:778: atha śakro devendro nāyamasmadgatāṃ śriyamabhikāmayata iti samāśvāsitahṛdayaḥ subhāṣitena
T09bsa032_u:779: tena cābhiprasāditamatiryuktamityabhipūjya tadasya vacanaṃ varapradānena bodhisattvamupanimantrayāmāsa -
T09bsa032_u:782: dadāmi kāśyapa varaṃ tadvṛṇīṣva yadicchasi // Jm_7.13 //
T09bsa032_u:783: atha bodhisattvo bhavabhogasukheṣvanāsthaḥ prārthanāmeva duḥkhamavagacchansātmībhūtasaṃtoṣaḥ śakramuvāca -
T09bsa032_u:785: vṛṇe tasmādahamimaṃ devānāṃ pravaraṃ varam // Jm_7.14 //
T09bsa032_u:787: yenābhitaptamatireti na jātu tṛptiṃ lobhānalaḥ sa hṛdayaṃ mama nābhyupeyāt // Jm_7.15 //
T09bsa032_u:788: atha śakrastayā tasya saṃtoṣapravaṇamānasatayā subhāṣitābhivyañjitayā bhūyasyā mātrayā saṃprasāditamatiḥ punarbodhisattvaṃ sādhu sādhviti praśasya vareṇopacchandayāmāsa -
T09bsa032_u:791: atha bodhisattvaḥ kleśaviyogasyaiva durlabhatāmasya pradarśayanvarayācñāpadeśena punarapyasmai dharmaṃ deśayāsāsa -
T09bsa032_u:792: dadāsi me yadi varaṃ sadguṇāvāsa vāsava /
T09bsa032_u:795: yenābhibhūtā dviṣateva sattvāḥ sadveṣavahnirmama dūrataḥ syāt // Jm_7.18 //
T09bsa032_u:796: tacchrutvā śakro devānāmadhipatirvismayavaśāt sādhu sādhvityenamabhipraśasya punaruvāca -
T09bsa032_u:799: atha bodhisattvaḥ kleśaprātikūlyāt kliṣṭasattvasaṃparkavigarhāṃ vratisaṃpratigrahāpadeśena kurvannityuvāca -
T09bsa032_u:800: śṛṇuyāmapi naiva jātu bālaṃ na ca vīkṣeya na cainamālapeyam /
T09bsa032_u:801: na ca tena nivāsakhedaduḥkhaṃ samupeyāṃ varamityahaṃ vṛṇe tvām // Jm_7.20 //
T09bsa032_u:819: tacchrutvā śakraḥ sādhu sādhvityenamabhinandya subhāṣitābhiprasāditamatiḥ punaruvāca -
T09bsa032_u:823: vīkṣeya dhīraṃ śṛṇuyāṃ ca dhīraṃ syānme nivāsaḥ saha tena śakra /
T09bsa032_u:824: saṃbhāṣaṇaṃ tena sahaiva bhūyādetaṃ varaṃ devavara prayaccha // Jm_7.28 //
T09bsa032_u:825: śakra uvāca - atipakṣapāta iva khalu te dhīraṃ prati /
T09bsa032_u:830: atha bodhisattvaḥ sajjanamāhātmyamasya pradarśayannuvāca - śrūyatāṃ mārṣa,
T09bsa032_u:832: vrajati guṇapathena ca svayaṃ nayati parānapi tena vartmanā /
T09bsa032_u:833: vacanamapi na rūkṣamakṣamāṃ janayati tasya hitopasaṃhitam // Jm_7.30 //
T09bsa032_u:834: aśaṭhavinayabhūṣaṇaḥ sadā hitamiti lambhayituṃ sa śakyate /
T09bsa032_u:835: iti mama guṇapakṣapātinī namati matirguṃṇapakṣapātini // Jm_7.31 //
T09bsa032_u:836: athainaṃ śakraḥ sādhūpapannarūpamidamiti cābhinandya samabhivṛddhaprasādaḥ punarvareṇopanimantrayāmāsa -
T09bsa032_u:841: atha tasya parāmupakartukāmatāmavekṣya bodhisattvastatpriyahitakāmatayā pradānānutarṣaprābalyamasmai prakāśayannuvāca -
T09bsa032_u:843: viśuddhaśīlābharaṇāśca yācakā mama syuretāṃ varasaṃpadaṃ vṛṇe // Jm_7.34 //
T09bsa032_u:844: śakra uvāca - subhāṣitaratnākaraḥ khalvatrabhavān / api ca -
T09bsa032_u:849: na mābhyupeyāḥ punarityabhijvalannimaṃ varaṃ dainyanisūdanaṃ vṛṇe // Jm_7.36 //
T09bsa032_u:851: atha śakraḥ sāmarṣavadenamativismayamāna uvāca - mā tāvadbhoḥ
T09bsa032_u:853: bhavānpunarnecchati kena hetunā varapraditsābhigatasya me sataḥ // Jm_7.37 //
T09bsa032_u:855: samanuneṣyāmyahamatrabhavantaṃ devarāja na hyasāvadākṣiṇyānuvṛttirna cāpyabahumānaviceṣṭitamasamavadhānakāmyatā vā bhavati bhavatām / kiṃ tu
T09bsa032_u:856: nirīkṣya te rūpamamānuṣādbhutaṃ prasannakānti jvalitaṃ ca tejasā /
T09bsa032_u:857: bhavetpramādastapasīti me bhayaṃ prasādasaumyādapi darśanāttava // Jm_7.38 //
T09bsa032_u:858: atha śakraḥ praṇamya pradakṣiṇīkṛtya cainaṃ tatraivāntardadhe /
T09bsa032_u:859: prabhātāyāṃ ca rajanyāṃ bodhisattvaḥ śakraprabhāvopahṛtaṃ prabhūtaṃ divyamannapānaṃ dadarśa /
T09bsa032_u:860: śakropanimantraṇāhūtāni cānekāni pratyekabuddhaśatāni vyāyatābaddhaparikarāṃśca pariveṣaṇasajjānanekāṃśca devakumārān /
T09bsa032_u:862: vṛttyā ca tāpasajanocitayābhireme dhyānāpramāṇaniyamena śamena caiva // Jm_7.39 //
T09bsa032_u:863: tadevaṃ tapovanasthānāmapyalaṃkārastyāgaśauryaṃ prāgeva gṛhasthānāmiti tyāgaśauryeṇālaṃkartavya evātmā satpuruṣeṇeti /
T09bsa032_u:864: dānapatisaṃpraharṣaṇāyāmapyunneyaṃ lobhadveṣamohabālyavigarhāyāṃ kalyāṇamitrasaṃparkaguṇe saṃtoṣakathāyāṃ tathāgatamāhātmye ca /
T09bsa032_u:865: evaṃ pūrvajanmasvapi subhāṣitaratnātiśayākaraḥ sa bhagavān prāgeva saṃbuddha iti /
T09bsa032_u:873: duḥkhaṃ sukhaṃ vā yadabhūtprajānāṃ tasyāpi rājñastadabhūttathaiva /
T09bsa032_u:874: ataḥ prajārakṣaṇadakṣiṇo 'sau śastraṃ ca śāstraṃ ca parāmamarśa // Jm_8.1 //
T09bsa032_u:876: vispaṣṭarūpaṃ dadṛśe ca śāstraṃ nayeṣu lokasya hitodayeṣu // Jm_8.2 //
T09bsa032_u:887: tasya prabhāvātiśayānnṛpasya mameti yatraiva babhūva buddhiḥ /
T09bsa032_u:888: saivāsya rakṣā paramāsa tasmādojāṃsi hartuṃ na viṣehire te // Jm_8.5 //
T09bsa032_u:890: yadā ca paramapi prayatnaṃ kurvanto naiva śaknuvanti sma kasyacidviṣayanivāsino janasyaujo 'pahartumatha teṣāṃ parasparamavekṣyaitadabhūt /
T09bsa032_u:893: na santi caiṣāmatha cādya sarve vyarthābhidhānatvamupāgatāḥ smaḥ // Jm_8.6 //
T09bsa032_u:894: atha te yakṣā brāhmaṇavarṇamātmānamabhinirmāya samanucaranto dadṛśuḥ pratyaraṇyacaramanyatamaṃ
T09bsa032_u:895: gopālakaṃ saśādvale chāyādrumamūle sopānatkaṃ saṃniṣaṇṇaṃ sapallavairvanatarukusumairviracitāṃ
T09bsa032_u:896: mālāmudvahantaṃ dakṣiṇato vinyastadaṇḍaparaśumekākinaṃ rajjuvartanavyāpṛtaṃ prakṣveḍitavilāsena gāyantamāsīnam /
T09bsa032_u:898: bho gavāṃ saṃrakṣādhikṛta evaṃ vivikte nirjanasampāte 'sminnaraṇye vicarannevamekākī kathaṃ na bibheṣīti /
T09bsa032_u:900: yakṣā ūcuḥ - kiṃ tvayā na śrūtapūrvā yakṣarākṣasānāṃ piśācānāṃ vā nisargaraudrā prakṛtiriti?
T09bsa032_u:903: tebhyo nṛmedaḥpiśitāśanebhyaḥ kathaṃ bhayaṃ te 'sti na rākṣasebhyaḥ /
T09bsa032_u:908: tena geha ivāraṇye rātrāvapi yathā divā /
T09bsa032_u:909: janānta iva caiko 'pi nirbhayo vicarāmyaham // Jm_8.10 //
T09bsa032_u:910: athainaṃ te yakṣāḥ kutūhalaprābalyātsādaramutsāhayanta ivocuḥ - tatkathaya kathaya tāvadbhada kīdṛśo 'yaṃ yuṣmākaṃ svastyayanaviśeṣa iti /
T09bsa032_u:916: ityuktvā sāmarṣavismayastān yakṣānavekṣamāṇaḥ punaruvāca - āścaryaṃ batedam /
T09bsa032_u:917: evaṃ prakāśo nṛpatiprabhāvaḥ kathaṃ nu vaḥ śrotrapathaṃ na yātaḥ /
T09bsa032_u:918: atyadbhutatvādathavā śruto 'pi bhavatsu vipratyayato na rūḍhaḥ // Jm_8.12 //
T09bsa032_u:919: śaṅke guṇānveṣaṇaviklavo vā deśī jano 'sāvakutūhalo vā /
T09bsa032_u:920: vivarjito bhāgyaparikṣayādvā kīrtyā narendrasya yato 'bhyupaita // Jm_8.13 //
T09bsa032_u:922: yakṣā ūcuḥ - bhadramukha kathaya kiṃkṛto 'yamasya rājñaḥ prabhāvo yadasyāmānuṣā na prasahante viṣayavāsinaṃ janaṃ hiṃsitumiti /
T09bsa032_u:925: maitrī tasya balaṃ dhvajāgraśabalaṃ tvācāramātraṃ balaṃ
T09bsa032_u:926: nāsau vetti rūṣaṃ na cāha paruṣaṃ samyak ca gāṃ rakṣati /
T09bsa032_u:927: dharmastasya nayo na nītinikṛtiḥ pūjārthamarthaḥ satām
T09bsa032_u:928: ityāścaryamayo 'pi durjanadhanaṃ garvaṃ ca nālambate // Jm_8.14 //
T09bsa032_u:930: tenāsya na prasahante viṣayanivāsinaṃ janaṃ hiṃsitumupadravāḥ /
T09bsa032_u:935: nṛpatiguṇākṣiptahṛdayaṃ tatkīrtyāśrayāḥ stutīrmaṅgalamiva svastyayanamiva ca praharṣādabhyasyantaṃ
T09bsa032_u:937: satyāṃ ca guṇabahumānodbhāvanāyāṃ taddidṛkṣayā yūyamavaśyaṃ tadguṇapratyakṣiṇo bhaviṣyatheti /
T09bsa032_u:939: atha te yakṣāḥ svaprabhāvapratighātāttasminnājani sāmarṣahṛdayā bhāvaprayuktayāpi yuktayā tayā tadguṇakathayā naiva mārdavamupajagmuḥ /
T09bsa032_u:942: pradānapriyatāṃ tu samabhivīkṣya tasya rājñaste yakṣāstadapakāracikīrṣavaḥ samabhigamya rājānaṃ sandarśanakāle bhojanamayācanta /
T09bsa032_u:943: atha sa rājā pramuditamanāstadadhikṛtānpuruṣānsamādideśakṣipramabhirucitaṃ bhojanaṃ brāhmaṇebhyo dīyatāmiti /
T09bsa032_u:944: atha te yakṣāḥ samupahṛtaṃ rājārhamapi bhojanaṃ haritatṛṇamiva vyāghrā naiva pratyagṛhṇannaivaṃvidhaṃ bhojanaṃ vayamaśnīma iti /
T09bsa032_u:945: tacchrutvā sa rājā samabhigamyainānabravīt - atha kīdṛśaṃ bhojanaṃ yuṣmākamupaśete?
T09bsa032_u:952: samabhivīkṣya cainānsa rājāpiśācāḥ khalvime na mānuṣāstenāsmadīyamannapānaṃ nābhilaṣantīti niścayamupajagāma /
T09bsa032_u:957: pratyahaṃ ca tadanveṣyaṃ kinnu duḥkhamataḥ param // Jm_8.18 //
T09bsa032_u:961: pratyāhameṣāṃ dahatāṃ svamarthaṃ duḥkhāni yāsyanti kadā nu nāśam // Jm_8.20 //
T09bsa032_u:968: ato 'nyathā ko hi mama kramaḥ syādityāgateṣvarthiṣu yuktarūpaḥ // Jm_8.22 //
T09bsa032_u:969: svayaṃmṛtānāṃ hi nirūṣmakāṇi bhavanti māṃsāni viśoṇitāni /
T09bsa032_u:970: priyāṇi caiṣāṃ na hi tāni samyag bubhukṣayā pīḍitavigrahāṇām // Jm_8.23 //
T09bsa032_u:971: jīvato 'pi ca kuto 'hamanyasmānmāṃsamādāsye māmabhigamya caite tathaiva kṣuttarṣaparikṣāmanayanavadanā niṣphalāśāpraṇayatvādadhikataravighātāturamanasaḥ kathaṃ nāma pratiyāsyanti?
T09bsa032_u:976: iti viniścitya sa mahātmā praharṣodgamasphītīkṛtanayanavadanaśobhaḥ svaṃ śarīramupadarśayaṃstānyakṣānuvāca -
T09bsa032_u:977: amūni māṃsāni saśoṇitāni dhṛtāni lokasya hitārthameva /
T09bsa032_u:978: yadyātitheyatvamupeyuradya mahodayaḥ so 'bhyudayo mama syāt // Jm_8.25 //
T09bsa032_u:979: atha te yakṣā jānanto 'pi tasya rājñastamadhyāśayamatyadbhutatvādaśraddadhānā rājānamūcuḥ -
T09bsa032_u:983: atha rājā - anumatamidameṣāmiti pramuditamanāḥ sirāmokṣaṇārthaṃ vaidyā ājñāpyantāmiti samādideśa /
T09bsa032_u:985: vyaktamīdṛśaṃ kañcidarthaṃ snehavaśādūcuḥ - nārhati devaḥ pradānaharṣātiśayādanuraktānāṃ
T09bsa032_u:992: asaṃśayaṃ na prasahanta ete tvadvīryaguptaṃ naradeva lokam /
T09bsa032_u:993: anarthapāṇḍityahatāstathā hi nayena vāñchantyanayaṃ prajānām // Jm_8.29 //
T09bsa032_u:995: satkārapūtaṃ bhavadīyamannaṃ sampannameṣāṃ kila naiva rucyam // Jm_8.30 //
T09bsa032_u:998: pañcānāmamīṣāmarthe sakalaṃ jagadanarthīkartavyamiti ko 'yaṃ dharmamārgo devasya? api ca /
T09bsa032_u:1000: kena vāsmākaṃ svāmyarthe viniyojyamānāni vinigūḍhapūrvāṇi māṃsaśoṇitāni yadaparikṣīṇeṣvevāmīṣu svāni devo dātumicchatīti /
T09bsa032_u:1003: na dāsyāmītyasatyaṃ vā vispaṣṭamapi yācitaḥ // Jm_8.31 //
T09bsa032_u:1004: dharmavyavasthāsu puraḥsaraḥ san svayaṃ vrajeyaṃ yadi kāpathena /
T09bsa032_u:1005: asmadgatācārapathānugānāṃ bhavedavasthā mama kā prajānām // Jm_8.32 //
T09bsa032_u:1007: yataḥ prajā eva samīkṣamāṇaḥ sāraṃ śarīrādahamuddhariṣye /
T09bsa032_u:1008: kaśca prabhāvo jagadarthasādhurmātsaryahāryālpahṛdo mama syāt // Jm_8.33 //
T09bsa032_u:1009: yadapi cāsmatpremabahumānāvarjitaṃ praṇayavisrambhagarbhamabhidhīyate bhavadbhiḥ - kiṃkṛteyamasmāsvevaṃ niṣpraṇayatā yadaparikṣīṇeṣveva no māṃsaśoṇiteṣu svāni devo dātumicchatīti /
T09bsa032_u:1011: na khalu me yuṣmāsu pratihataviṣayaḥ praṇayamārgo visrambhavirahātpariśaṅkāgahanaduravagāho vā / kintu -
T09bsa032_u:1012: dhane tanutvaṃ kramaśo gate vā bhāgyānuvṛttyā kṣayamāgate vā /
T09bsa032_u:1013: vijṛmbhamāṇapraṇayaḥ suhṛtsu śobheta na sphītadhanaḥ kṛśeṣu // Jm_8.34 //
T09bsa032_u:1015: gātreṣu māṃsopacayonnateṣu yuṣmāsvapi syātpraṇayo virūpaḥ // Jm_8.35 //
T09bsa032_u:1016: asaṃstutānāmapi na kṣameya pīḍāṃ kathaṃ kaiva kathā bhavatsu /
T09bsa032_u:1017: svānyeva māṃsāni yato 'smi ditsurmāṃ caiva yācanta ime na yuṣmān // Jm_8.36 //
T09bsa032_u:1026: naikopayogasya dhanasya tāvanna pratyahaṃ yācanakā bhavanti /
T09bsa032_u:1030: vimarśamārgo 'pyanudāttatā syānmātsaryadainyaṃ tu parā tamisrā // Jm_8.39 //
T09bsa032_u:1031: tanna mā vārayatumarhantyatrabhavanta ityanunīya sa rājā svāṃ parṣadamāhūya vaidyānpañca sirāḥ svaśarīre mokṣayitvā tān yakṣānuvāca -
T09bsa032_u:1032: dharmakarmaṇi sācivyaṃ prītiṃ ca paramāṃ mama /
T09bsa032_u:1034: te tathetyuktvāñjalipuṭaireva rājño raktacandanarasābhitāmraṃ rudhiraṃ pātumupacakramire /
T09bsa032_u:1037: prītiprakarṣāddhṛtisampadā ca vapurguṇādeva ca tasya rājñaḥ /
T09bsa032_u:1038: mamlau na gātraṃ na mumūrcha cetaḥ saṃcikṣipe na kṣatajaṃ kṣaradvā // Jm_8.42 //
T09bsa032_u:1043: ratnaprabhodbhāsuraruciratsaruṃ niśitaṃ nistriṃśamādāya svamāṃsāni cchittvā tebhyaḥ prāyacchat /
T09bsa032_u:1045: na prasehe manastasya cchedaduḥkhaṃ vigāhitum // Jm_8.44 //
T09bsa032_u:1053: atha te yakṣāstaṃ rājānaṃ svamāṃsotkartanaparaṃ tathaivāskhalitavadanaprasādamavikampyamānaṃ māṃsacchedavedanābhirabhivīkṣya prasādaṃ vismayaṃ copajagmuḥ /
T09bsa032_u:1054: āścaryamadbhutamaho bata kiṃsvidetat satyaṃ na veti samudīrṇavicāraharṣāḥ /
T09bsa032_u:1057: santarpitāḥ smastavānayādbhutayā yācanakajanamanoharayā pratipattyeti sasambhramāḥ sapraṇāmaṃ vinivārya rājānaṃ prasādāśrupariṣiktavadanāḥ sabahumānamudīkṣamāṇāḥ punarūcuḥ -
T09bsa032_u:1061: dyauḥ paśyatyuditaspṛhā vasumatīṃ no cedaho vañcyate // Jm_8.49 //
T09bsa032_u:1062: kiṃ bahunā? evaṃvidhajanābhyupapannaḥ sabhāgyaḥ khalu manuṣyalokaḥ /
T09bsa032_u:1066: kiṃ tadatyadbhutaṃ sthānaṃ pathānena yadīpsasi // Jm_8.50 //
T09bsa032_u:1068: brahmabhūyaṃ vimokṣaṃ vā tapasānena vāñchasi // Jm_8.51 //
T09bsa032_u:1073: prayatnalabhyā yadayatnanāśinī na tṛptisaukhyāya kutaḥ praśāntaye /
T09bsa032_u:1074: bhavāśrayā sampadato na kāmaye surendralakṣmīmapi kimvathetarām // Jm_8.53 //
T09bsa032_u:1075: na cātmaduḥkhakṣayamātrakeṇa me prayāti santoṣapathena mānasam /
T09bsa032_u:1077: anena puṇyena tu sarvadarśitāmavāpya nirjitya ca doṣavidviṣaḥ /
T09bsa032_u:1079: atha te yakṣāḥ prasādasaṃharṣitatanuruhāḥ praṇamya rājānamūcuḥ - upapannarūpamevaṃvidhasya vyavasāyātiśayasyedaṃ karma /
T09bsa032_u:1080: tanna dūre bhavadvidhānāmabhiprāyasampada iti niścitamanaso vijñāpayāmaḥ -
T09bsa032_u:1087: atha sa rājā prasādamṛdūkṛtahṛdayānmatvainānuvāca - upakāraḥ khalvayaṃ nāyāso mametyalamatra vo 'kṣamāśaṅkayā / api ca -
T09bsa032_u:1092: lobhaḥ paradravyaparigraheṣu vāggarhitā madyamayaśca pāpmā // Jm_8.60 //
T09bsa032_u:1093: atha te yakṣāstathetyasmai pratiśrutya praṇamya pradakṣiṇīkṛtya cainaṃ tatraivāntardadhire /
T09bsa032_u:1096: prasasvanurdundubhayaśca tadgatā drumāśca puṣpaṃ sasṛjurvikampanāt // Jm_8.61 //
T09bsa032_u:1098: visṛtya mālā grathiteva kutracitsamaṃ samantānnṛpatervyakīryata // Jm_8.62 //
T09bsa032_u:1104: upetya taktarma manojñayā girā prasādasaṃharṣavaśena tuṣṭuve // Jm_8.65 //
T09bsa032_u:1107: aho parānugrahapeśalā matistvadarpaṇānnāthavatī bata kṣitiḥ // Jm_8.66 //
T09bsa032_u:1109: yathāpaurāṇaṃ śarīraṃ kṛtvā dākṣiṇyavinayopacāramadhuraṃ pratipūjitastena rājñā svamāvāsaṃ pratijagāma /
T09bsa032_u:1111: ko nāma dhanamātrake 'pyapekṣāṃ notsraṣṭumarhatīti dāyakajanasamuttejanāyāṃ vācyam /
T09bsa032_u:1113: yaccoktaṃ bhagavatā 'bahukaraḥ khalvete pañcakā bhikṣavaḥ ' iti syādetatsandhāya /
T09bsa032_u:1114: tena hi samayena te pañca yakṣā babhūvuḥ /
T09bsa032_u:1115: teṣāṃ bhagavatā yathāpratijñātameva prathamaṃ dharmāmṛtasaṃvibhāgaḥ kṛta iti /
T09bsa032_u:1123: prakṛtibhiḥ prakāśyamānadaṇḍanītiśobhaḥ samyakpravṛttavārttāvidhiḥ saṃjayo nāma śibīnāṃ rājā babhūva /
T09bsa032_u:1126: tapassu vidyāsu kalāsu caiva kṛtaśramā yasya sadābhyupetāḥ /
T09bsa032_u:1128: tasya rājñaḥ pratipattyanantaraṃ prathitaguṇagaṇanirantaro viśvaṃtaro nāma putro yuvarājo babhūva /
T09bsa032_u:1132: dṛṣṭaprayāmāsu ca dikṣu tasya vyāpte ca lokatritaye yaśobhiḥ /
T09bsa032_u:1142: na hi tāṃ kurute prītiṃ bibhūtirbhavanāśritā /
T09bsa032_u:1144: atha kadācittasyaivaṃvidhaṃ dānaprasaṅgaṃ pramuditahṛdayairarthibhiḥ samantato vikīryamāṇamupalabhyānyatamo
T09bsa032_u:1147: atha te brāhmaṇā viśvaṃtarasya svāni sattrāgārāṇi pratyavekṣamāṇasya pramodādadhikataranayanavadanaśobhasya
T09bsa032_u:1149: sa tato vinigṛhya dviradavaramupacārapuraḥsaramabhigamanaprayojanamenān paryapṛcchadājñāpyatāṃ kenārtha iti /
T09bsa032_u:1161: iti viniścitya sa mahātmā tvaritamavatīrya dviradavarāt pratigṛhyatāmiti samudyatakāñcanabhṛṅgārasteṣāṃ purastādavatasthe /
T09bsa032_u:1163: dharmānurāgeṇa dadau gajendraṃ nītivyalīkena na saṃcakampe // Jm_9.10 //

T09bsa032_u:1167: atha dviradapatipradānaśravaṇāt samudīrṇakrodhasaṃrambhāḥ śibayo brāhmaṇavṛddhā mantriṇo
T09bsa032_u:1168: yodhāḥ pauramukhyāśca kolāhalamupajanayantaḥ saṃjayaṃ rājānamabhigamya sasaṃbhramāmarṣasaṃrambhāt
T09bsa032_u:1171: kimetaditi ca sāvegamuktā rājñā punarevamūcuḥ - kasmād devo na jānīte
T09bsa032_u:1175: viśvaṃtareṇaiṣa gajaḥ sa datto rūpī jayaste hriyate 'nyadeśam // Jm_9.13 //
T09bsa032_u:1176: gāvaḥ suvarṇaṃ vasanāni bhojyamiti dvijebhyo nṛpa deyarūpam /
T09bsa032_u:1177: yasmiñjayaśrīrniyatā dvipendre deyaḥ sa nāmetyatidānaśauryam // Jm_9.14 //
T09bsa032_u:1179: nopekṣaṇaṃ deva tavātra yuktaṃ purāyamānandayati dviṣaste // Jm_9.15 //
T09bsa032_u:1180: tacchrutvā sa rājā putrapriyatvāt kiṃcittāneva pratyaprītamanāḥ kāryānurodhāt sāvegavadevamityuktvā
T09bsa032_u:1183: dattaṃ tvanena svaṃ hastinaṃ vāntakalpaṃ kaḥ pratyāhariṣyati?
T09bsa032_u:1184: api tu tathāhameva kariṣye yathā dāne mātrāṃ jñāsyati viśvaṃtaraḥ /
T09bsa032_u:1186: śibaya ūcuḥ - na khalu mahārāja paribhāṣāmātrasādhyo 'sminnarthe viśvaṃtara iti /
T09bsa032_u:1187: saṃjaya uvāca - atha kimanyadatra mayā śakyaṃ kartum?

T09bsa032_u:1194: ko vā vadhaṃ bandhanatāḍanaṃ vā sutasya te rocayate narendra /
T09bsa032_u:1195: dharmātmakastveṣa na rājyabhārakṣobhasya soḍhā karuṇāmṛdutvāt // Jm_9.17 //
T09bsa032_u:1199: sahyāsta eṣāṃ tu tathāpi dṛṣṭā mūloparodhānna tu pārthivānām // Jm_9.19 //
T09bsa032_u:1200: kimatra vā vahvabhidhāya niścayastvayaṃ śibīnāṃ tvadabhūtyamarṣiṇām /
T09bsa032_u:1201: prayātu vaṅkaṃ tapaso 'bhivṛddhaye nṛpātmajaḥ siddhaniṣevitaṃ girim // Jm_9.20 //
T09bsa032_u:1202: atha sa rājā snehapraṇayavisrambhavaśādanayāpāyadarśinā hitodyatena tena janena pariniṣṭhuramityabhidhīyamānaḥ
T09bsa032_u:1206: evamastviti ca pratigṛhītānunayaḥ śibibhiḥ sa rājā kṣattāramuvāca - gacchemaṃ vṛttāntaṃ viśvantarāya nivedayeti /
T09bsa032_u:1207: sa tatheti pratiśrutya śokāśrupariṣiktavadano viśvantaraṃ svabhavanagatamupetya śokaduḥkhāvegāt sasvaraṃ rudan pādayorasya nyapatat /
T09bsa032_u:1208: api kuśalaṃ rājakulasyeti ca sasaṃbhramaṃ viśvantareṇānuyuktaḥ samavasīdannaviśadapadākṣaramenamuvāca - kuśalaṃ rājakulasyeti /
T09bsa032_u:1209: atha kasmādevamadhīro 'sīti ca punaranuyukto viśvantareṇa kṣattā bāṣpavegoparudhyamānagadgadakaṇṭhaḥ śvāsaviskhalitalulitākṣaraṃ śanairityuvāca
T09bsa032_u:1211: rāṣṭrātpravrājayanti tvāṃ kupitāḥ śibayo nṛpa // Jm_9.21 //
T09bsa032_u:1212: viśvantara uvāca - māṃ śibayaḥ pravrājayanti kupitā iti kaḥ saṃbandhaḥ?
T09bsa032_u:1214: rame na vinayonmārge dveṣmi cāhaṃ pramāditām /

T09bsa032_u:1218: datte tvayā mānada vāraṇendre dhairyāṇi kopastvaharacchibīnām // Jm_9.23 //
T09bsa032_u:1220: yena pravrājitā yānti pathā tena kila vraja // Jm_9.24 //
T09bsa032_u:1221: atha bodhisattvaḥ kṛpābhyāsarūḍhāṃ yācanakajanavatsalatāṃ dhairyātiśayasaṃpadaṃ ca svāmudbhāvayannuvāca - capalasvabhāvāḥ khalu śibayo 'nabhijñā iva cāsmatsvabhāvasya /
T09bsa032_u:1222: dravyeṣu bāhyeṣu ka eva vādo dadyāmahaṃ sve nayane śiro vā /
T09bsa032_u:1223: imaṃ hi lokārthamahaṃ bibharmi samucchrayaṃ kimvatha vastravāhyam // Jm_9.25 //
T09bsa032_u:1224: yasya svagātrairapi yāvakānāṃ vacāṃsi saṃpūjayituṃ manīṣā /
T09bsa032_u:1225: bhayānna dadyātsa iti pratarkaḥ prakāśanā bāliśacāpalasya // Jm_9.26 //
T09bsa032_u:1226: kāmaṃ māṃ śibayaḥ sarve ghnantu pravrājayantu vā /
T09bsa032_u:1227: na tvevāhaṃ na dāsyāmi gacchāmyeṣa tapovanam // Jm_9.27 //
T09bsa032_u:1228: atha bodhisattvo vipriyaśravaṇaviklavamukhīṃ patnīmuvāca - śruto 'trabhavatyā śibīnāṃ niścayaḥ?

T09bsa032_u:1242: tenāhamapi yāsyāmi yena kṣatriya yāsyasi // Jm_9.31 //
T09bsa032_u:1245: naiva ca khalu me deva vanavāso duḥkha iti pratibhāti / tathā hi -
T09bsa032_u:1250: krīḍantau vanagulmeṣu na rājyasya smariṣyasi // Jm_9.34 //
T09bsa032_u:1252: vane tvāṃ ramayiṣyanti saritkuñjāśca sodakāḥ // Jm_9.35 //
T09bsa032_u:1256: vaneṣu kṛtasaṃgītaṃ harṣayiṣyati te manaḥ // Jm_9.37 //
T09bsa032_u:1260: vibhūṣaṇānāmiva saṃninādāḥ pramodayiṣyanti vane manaste // Jm_9.39 //
T09bsa032_u:1263: athemāṃ viśvantarapravrājanapravṛttimupalabhya rājakule tumula ākrandaśabdaḥ prādurabhūta /
T09bsa032_u:1264: śokaduḥkhāvegānmūrcchāparīta ivārthijano mattonmatta iva ca tattadbahuvidhaṃ vilalāpa /
T09bsa032_u:1266: dhātrī na lajjāṃ yadupaiti bhūmirvyaktaṃ tadasyā hatacetanatvam // Jm_9.40 //
T09bsa032_u:1268: vyarthābhidhānā bata lokapālā viproṣitā vā śrutimātrakaṃ vā // Jm_9.41 //
T09bsa032_u:1269: adharmo bata jāgarti dharmaḥ supto 'thavā mṛtaḥ /
T09bsa032_u:1275: śokaduḥkhābhibhūtadhairyayormātāpitroścaraṇāvabhipraṇamya saputradāraḥ syandanavaramabhiruhya puṇyāhaghoṣeṇaiva mahato janakāyasyākranditaśabdena puravarānniragacchat /
T09bsa032_u:1276: anurāgavaśagamanuyāyinaṃ ca janaṃ śokāśrupariklinnavadanaṃ prayatnādvinivartya svayameva rathapragrahān pratigṛhya yena vaṅkaḥ parvatastena prāyāt /
T09bsa032_u:1282: atha bodhisattvasya svayameva rathadhuryatāmupagantukāmasya gāḍhataraṃ parikaramabhisaṃyacchamānasya
T09bsa032_u:1283: rohitamṛgarūpiṇaścatvāro yakṣakumārāḥ suvinītā iva sadaśvāḥ svayameva rathayugaṃ
T09bsa032_u:1285: tāṃstu dṛṣṭvā harṣavismayaviśālatarākṣīṃ madrīṃ bodhisattva uvāca -
T09bsa032_u:1291: rūḍho 'pi hi guṇābhyāsaḥ sarvatra na samaḥ satām // Jm_9.46 //

T09bsa032_u:1296: pūrayāmāsa viprasya sa rathena manoratham // Jm_9.48 //
T09bsa032_u:1297: atha bodhisattvaḥ prītamanā rathādavatārya svajanānniryātya rathavaraṃ brāhmaṇāya jālinaṃ kumāramaṅkenādāya padbhyāmevādhvānaṃ pratyapadyata
T09bsa032_u:1298: avimanaskaiva ca madrī kṛṣṇājināṃ kumārīmaṅkenādāya pṛṣṭhato 'nvagacchadenam /
T09bsa032_u:1300: puṇyānubhāvādabhivīkṣamāṇāḥ śiṣyā vinītā iva ca praṇemuḥ // Jm_9.49 //

T09bsa032_u:1303: vitānaśobhāṃ dadhire payodāḥ sukhaḥ sugandhiḥ pravavau nabhasvān /
T09bsa032_u:1306: iti bodhisattva udyānagata iva pādacāravinodanasukhamanubhavanmārgaparikhedarasamanāsvādya saputradāraḥ prānta eva tu vaṅkaparvatamapaśyat /
T09bsa032_u:1309: saritā kusumarajo 'ruṇasukhapavanaṃ tapovanaṃ vanacarakādeśitamārgaḥ praviśya viśvakarmaṇā

T09bsa032_u:1314: atha kadācinmūlaphalārthaṃ gatāyāṃ rājaputryāṃ putrayoḥ paripālananimittamāśramapadamaśūnyaṃ
T09bsa032_u:1320: atha sa brāhmaṇo bhāryānurāgādutsāritadhairyalajjaḥ pratigrahamātrasajjo niyatamarthamīdṛśamuvāca -
T09bsa032_u:1321: āloko bhavati yataḥ samaśca mārgo loko 'yaṃ vrajati tato na durgameṇa /
T09bsa032_u:1322: prāyo 'smiñjagati tu matsarāndhakāreṇānye na praṇayapadāni me vahanti // Jm_9.53 //
T09bsa032_u:1324: ato 'smi yācñāśramamabhyupeyivānprayaccha tanme paricārakau sutau // Jm_9.54 //
T09bsa032_u:1329: tatkimidānīmāsyata iti ca brāhmaṇenābhihitaḥ sa mahāsattvaḥ pradānakathāśravaṇotpatitaviṣādaviplutākṣayoḥ sutayoḥ snehāvegādavalambamānahṛdayo bodhisattva uvāca -
T09bsa032_u:1331: dattāvetau mayā tubhyaṃ kiṃ tu mātānayorgatā /
T09bsa032_u:1334: ihaikarātraṃ viśramya śvo netāsi sutau mama // Jm_9.57 //
T09bsa032_u:1336: gauṇametaddhi nārīṇāṃ nāma vāmā iti sthitam /
T09bsa032_u:1337: syāccaiva dānavighnaste tena vāsaṃ na rocaye // Jm_9.58 //
T09bsa032_u:1343: kīdṛśīṃ nāma kuryātāṃ dāsaprītimimau tava // Jm_9.59 //
T09bsa032_u:1345: addhā dadyādyadiṣṭaṃ te dhanaṃ niṣkrayametayoḥ // Jm_9.60 //
T09bsa032_u:1347: evaṃ hyarthena mahatā dharmeṇa ca sameṣyasi // Jm_9.61 //
T09bsa032_u:1352: atha bodhisattvo yatheṣṭamidānīmitvaparisamāptārthamuktvā sānunayamanuśiṣya tanayau paricaryānukūlye pratigrahārthamabhiprasārite brāhmaṇasya pāṇau kamaṇḍalumāvarjayāmāsa /
T09bsa032_u:1358: ambā ca tāta niṣkrāntā tvaṃ ca nau dātumicchasi /
T09bsa032_u:1359: yāvattāmapi paśyāvastato dāsyati nau bhavān // Jm_9.64 //
T09bsa032_u:1362: asya vā putrasnehāt paścāttāpaḥ saṃbhavatīti vicintya padmakalāpamivānayorhastānābadhya
T09bsa032_u:1363: latayā saṃtarjayanviceṣṭamānau pitaraṃ prati vyāvartitavadanau prakṛtisukumārau kumārau pracakarṣa /
T09bsa032_u:1364: atha kṛṣṇājinā kumāryapūrvaduḥkhopanipātāt sasvaraṃ rudatī pitaramuvāca -
T09bsa032_u:1365: ayaṃ māṃ brāhmaṇastāta latayā hanti nirdayaḥ /
T09bsa032_u:1366: na cāyaṃ brāhmaṇo vyaktaṃ dhārmikā brāhmaṇāḥ kila // Jm_9.65 //
T09bsa032_u:1368: nīyamānau piśācena tāta kiṃ nāvupekṣase // Jm_9.66 //
T09bsa032_u:1370: naivedaṃ me tathā duḥkhaṃ yadayaṃ hanti māṃ dvijaḥ /
T09bsa032_u:1375: bhaviṣyati kathaṃ nvambā dṛṣṭvā śūnyaṃ tapovanam // Jm_9.69 //
T09bsa032_u:1377: ato 'rdhaṃ deyamambāyai śokaṃ tena vineṣyati // Jm_9.70 //
T09bsa032_u:1379: durlabhaṃ hi punastāta tava tasyāśca darśanam // Jm_9.71 //
T09bsa032_u:1380: ehi kṛṣṇe mariṣyāvaḥ ko nvartho jīvitena nau /
T09bsa032_u:1383: atha bodhisattvastenātikaruṇena tanayapralāpenākampitamatirapi ka idānīṃ dattvānutāpaṃ
T09bsa032_u:1388: nāśaṅkata kathaṃ nāma dhigalajjo bata dvijaḥ // Jm_9.73 //
T09bsa032_u:1391: yāsyataḥ kathamadhvānaṃ tasya ca preṣyatāṃ gato // Jm_9.74 //
T09bsa032_u:1395: kā tvavasthā mama tayoḥ sutayoḥ sukhavṛddhayoḥ // Jm_9.76 //
T09bsa032_u:1397: satāṃ tu dharmaṃ saṃsmṛtya ko 'nutāpaṃ kariṣyati // Jm_9.77 //
T09bsa032_u:1398: atha madrī vipriyopanipātaśaṃsibhiraniṣṭernimittairupajanitavaimanasyā mūlaphalānyādāya kṣiprataramāgantukāmāpi vyālamṛgoparudhyamānamārgā ciratareṇāśramapadamupajagāma
T09bsa032_u:1399: ucitāyāṃ ca pratyudgamanabhūmāvākrīḍāsthāne ca tanayāvapaśyantī bhṛśataramarativaśamagāt /
T09bsa032_u:1403: adarśanādadya tayostadeva me prayāti kāntāramivāśaraṇyatām // Jm_9.79 //
T09bsa032_u:1405: krīḍāprasaṅgaśramajātanidrau suptau nu naṣṭau gahane vane vā /
T09bsa032_u:1406: cirānmadabhyāgamanādatuṣṭau syātāṃ kvacid bālatayā nilīnau // Jm_9.80 //
T09bsa032_u:1407: ruvanti kasmācca na pakṣiṇo 'pyamī samākulāstadvadhasākṣiṇo yadi /
T09bsa032_u:1408: taraṃgabhaṅgairavinītakopayā hṛtau nu kiṃ nimnagayātivegayā // Jm_9.81 //
T09bsa032_u:1412: apyaniṣṭanivedināṃ nimittānāṃ maccharīra eva vipāko bhavet /
T09bsa032_u:1417: athānupraviśyāśramapadamekānte nikṣipya mūlaphalaṃ yathopacārapuraḥsaraṃ bhartāramabhigamya kva dārakāviti papraccha /
T09bsa032_u:1418: atha bodhisattvo jānānaḥ snehadurbalatāṃ mātṛhṛdayasya durnivadyatvācca vipriyasya naināṃ kiṃcidvaktuṃ śaśāka /
T09bsa032_u:1422: yadayamevaṃ tūpṇīṃbhūtaḥ śokadainyānuvṛttyaivetyavadhārya samantataḥ kṣiptacitteva vilokyāśramapadaṃ tanayāvapaśyantī sabāṣpagadgadaṃ punaruvāca
T09bsa032_u:1423: dārakau ca na paśyāmi tvaṃ ca māṃ nābhibhāṣase /
T09bsa032_u:1424: hatā khalvahaṃ kṛpaṇā vipriyaṃ hi na kathyate // Jm_9.83 //
T09bsa032_u:1425: ityuktvā śokāgninā parigatahṛdayā chinnamūleva latā nipapāta /
T09bsa032_u:1426: patantīmeva caināṃ parigṛhya bodhisattvastṛṇaśayanamānīya śītābhiradbhiḥ pariṣicya pratyāgataprāṇāṃ samāśvāsayannuvāca -
T09bsa032_u:1428: na hi saṃbhāvyate dhairyaṃ manasi snehadurbale // Jm_9.84 //
T09bsa032_u:1430: tasmai dattau mayā putrau samāśvasihi mā śucaḥ // Jm_9.85 //
T09bsa032_u:1431: māṃ paśya madri mā putrau paridevīśca devi mā /
T09bsa032_u:1432: putraśokasaśalye me prahārṣīriva mā hṛdi // Jm_9.86 //
T09bsa032_u:1433: yācitena kathaṃ śakyaṃ na dātumapi jīvitam /
T09bsa032_u:1434: anumodasva tad bhadre putradānamidaṃ mama // Jm_9.87 //
T09bsa032_u:1441: tathā hi dikṣu prasṛtapratisvanaiḥ samantato daivatadundubhisvanaiḥ /
T09bsa032_u:1444: divaḥ patadbhiḥ kusumaiśca kāñcanaiḥ savidyududyotamivābhavannabhaḥ // Jm_9.90 //
T09bsa032_u:1446: nipānabhūto lokānāṃ dātaiva ca punarbhava // Jm_9.91 //
T09bsa032_u:1447: atha śakro devendraḥ kṣititalacalanādākampite vividharatnaprabhodbhāsini sumerau
T09bsa032_u:1448: parvatarāje kimidamiti samutpannavimarśo vismayotphullanayanebhyo lokapālebhyaḥ pṛthivīkampakāraṇaṃ
T09bsa032_u:1452: mahāhradeṣvambha ivopaśoṣaṃ na dānadharmaḥ samupaiti satsu /
T09bsa032_u:1453: yāce tatastvāṃ surasannibhā yā bhāryāmimāmahaṃsi tatpradātum // Jm_9.92 //
T09bsa032_u:1455: tataḥ sa vāmena kareṇa madrīmādāya savyena kamaṇḍaluṃ ca /

T09bsa032_u:1457: cukopa madrī na tu no ruroda viveda sā tasya hi taṃ svabhāvam /

T09bsa032_u:1477: śrutvā samākleditahṛdayā brāhmaṇahastānniṣkrīya bodhisattvatanayau prasādyānīya ca
T09bsa032_u:1479: tadevamatyadbhutā bodhisattvacaryeti tadunmukheṣu sattvaviśeṣeṣu nāvajñā pratīghāto vā karaṇīyaḥ /
T09bsa032_u:1486: bodhisattvaḥ kila svapuṇyaprabhāvopanatāmānatasarvasāmantāṃ praśāntasvaparacakrādyupadravatvādakaṇṭakāmasapatnāmekātapatrāṃ dāyādyakramāgatāṃ pṛthivīṃ pālayāmāsa /
T09bsa032_u:1489: viveda lokasya hi sa svabhāvaṃ pradhānacaryānukṛtipradhānam /

T09bsa032_u:1491: dadau dhanaṃ śīlavidhiṃ samādade kṣamāṃ niṣeve jagadarthamaihata /
T09bsa032_u:1492: prajāhitādhyāśayasaumyadarśanaḥ sa mūrtimāndharma iva vyarocata // Jm_10.3 //
T09bsa032_u:1493: atha kadācittadbhujābhiguptamapi taṃ viṣayaṃ sattvānāṃ karmavaiguṇyātpramādavaśagatvācca varṣakarmādhikṛtānāṃ devaputrāṇāṃ durvṛṣṭiparyākulatā kvacitkvacidabhidudrāva /
T09bsa032_u:1494: atha sa rājā vyaktamayaṃ mama prajānāṃ vā dharmāpacārātsamupanato 'nartha iti niścitamatiḥ
T09bsa032_u:1497: atha te vedavihitamanekaprāṇiśatavadhārambhabhīṣaṇaṃ yajñavidhiṃ suvṛṣṭihetuṃ manyamānāstasmai saṃvarṇayāmāsuḥ /
T09bsa032_u:1498: viditavṛttāntastu sa rājā yajñavihitānāṃ prāṇivaiśasānāṃ karuṇātmakatvānna teṣāṃ tadvacanaṃ bhāvenābhyanandat /
T09bsa032_u:1499: vinayānuvṛttyā cainānpratyākhyānarūkṣākṣaramanuktvā prastāvāntareṇaiṣāṃ tāṃ kathāṃ tiraścakāra /
T09bsa032_u:1500: te punarapi taṃ rājānaṃ dharmasaṃkathāprastāvalabdhāvasarā gāmbhīryāvagūḍhaṃ tasya bhāvamajānānā yajñapravṛttaye samanuśaśāsuḥ -
T09bsa032_u:1501: kāryāṇi rājñāṃ niyatāni yāni lābhe pṛthivyāḥ paripālane ca /
T09bsa032_u:1502: nātyeti kālastava tāni nityaṃ teṣāṃ kramo dharmasukhāni yadvat // Jm_10.4 //
T09bsa032_u:1505: yajñābhidhāne suralokasetau pramādatandreva kathaṃ matiste // Jm_10.5 //
T09bsa032_u:1506: bhṛtyairivājñā bahu manyate te sākṣādiyaṃ siddhiriti kṣitīśaiḥ /
T09bsa032_u:1507: śreyāṃsi kīrtijvalitāni cetuṃ yajñairayaṃ te ripukāla kālaḥ // Jm_10.6 //
T09bsa032_u:1508: kāmaṃ sadā dīkṣita eva ca tvaṃ dānaprasaṅgānniyamādarācca /
T09bsa032_u:1509: vedaprasiddhaiḥ kratubhistathāpi yuktaṃ bhavenmoktumṛṇaṃ surāṇām // Jm_10.7 //
T09bsa032_u:1510: sviṣṭyābhituṣṭāni hi daivatāni bhūtāni vṛṣṭyā pratimānayanti /
T09bsa032_u:1511: iti prajānāṃ hitamātmanaśca yaśaskaraṃ yajñavidhiṃ juṣasva // Jm_10.8 //
T09bsa032_u:1512: tasya cintā prādurabhavat - atidurnyasto batāyaṃ parapratyayahāryapelavamatiramīmāṃsako dharmapriyaḥ śraddadhāno jano yatra hi nāma -
T09bsa032_u:1513: ya eva lokeṣu śaraṇyasammatāsta eva hiṃsāmapi dharmato gatāḥ /
T09bsa032_u:1517: viśasyamānaḥ kila mantraśaktibhiḥ paśurdivaṃ gacchati tena tadvadhaḥ /
T09bsa032_u:1518: upaiti dharmatvamitīdamapyasatparaiḥ kṛtaṃ ko hi paratra lapsyate // Jm_10.11 //

T09bsa032_u:1525: mudaṃ prayāsyanti vapādikāraṇādvadhena śocyasya paśordivaukasaḥ // Jm_10.14 //
T09bsa032_u:1526: tadidamatra prāptakālamiti viniścitya sa rājā yajñārambhasamutsuka iva nāma tatteṣāṃ
T09bsa032_u:1527: vacanaṃ pratigṛhyāvocadenan - sanāthaḥ khalvahamanugrahavāṃśca yadevaṃ me hitāvahitamanaso 'trabhavantaḥ /
T09bsa032_u:1531: athainaṃ purohita uvāca - īpsitārthasiddhaye snātu tāvanmahārāja ekasya yajñasya samāptāvavabhṛthe /
T09bsa032_u:1533: yugapatpuruṣapaśavaḥ sahasraśo hi parigṛhyamāṇā vyaktamudvegadoṣāya prajānāṃ te syuriti /
T09bsa032_u:1534: astyetaditi brāhmaṇairuktaḥ sa rājā tānuvāca - alamatrabhavatāṃ prakṛtikopāśaṅkayā /
T09bsa032_u:1535: tathā hi saṃvidhāsye yathodvegaṃ me prajā na yāsyantīti /
T09bsa032_u:1536: atha sa rājā paurajānapadānsaṃnipātyāvravīt - icchāmi puruṣamedhasahasreṇa yaṣṭum /
T09bsa032_u:1537: na ca mayārhaḥ kaścidakāmaḥ puruṣaḥ paśutve niyoktumaduṣṭaḥ /
T09bsa032_u:1538: tadyaṃ yamataḥ prabhṛti vo drakṣyāmi vyavadhūtapramādanidreṇa vimalena cāracakṣuṣā
T09bsa032_u:1539: śīlamaryādātivartinamasmadājñāṃ paribhavantaṃ taṃ taṃ svakulapāṃsanaṃ deśakaṇṭakamahaṃ
T09bsa032_u:1543: sarvāḥ kriyāstava hitapravaṇāḥ prajānāṃ tatrāvamānanavidhernaradeva ko 'rthaḥ /
T09bsa032_u:1544: brahmāpi te caritamabhyanumantumarhaḥ sādhupramāṇa paramatra bhavānpramāṇam // Jm_10.15 //
T09bsa032_u:1546: asmatpriyahitādanyad dṛśyate na hi te priyam // Jm_10.16 //
T09bsa032_u:1547: iti pratigṛhītavacanaḥ paurajanāpadaiḥ sa rājā janaprakāśenāḍambareṇa pratyayitānamātyānpāpajanopagrahaṇārthaṃ
T09bsa032_u:1548: janapadaṃ nagarāṇi ca preṣayāmāsa samantataśca pratyahamiti ghoṣaṇāḥ kārayāmāsa /
T09bsa032_u:1550: avinayanirataiḥ prajāhitārthaṃ narapaśubhistu sahasraśo yiyakṣuḥ // Jm_10.17 //
T09bsa032_u:1555: atha tadviṣayanivāsinaḥ puruṣā yajñapaśunimittaṃ duḥśīlapuruṣānveṣaṇādaraṃ tamanvavekṣya
T09bsa032_u:1559: saṃvibhāgaviśāradāḥ priyātithayo vinayanaibhṛtyaślāghinaḥ kṛta iva yuge babhūvuḥ /
T09bsa032_u:1561: suśuklabhāvācca viruḍhayā hriyā janaḥ saḥ śīlāmalabhūṣaṇo 'bhavat // Jm_10.19 //
T09bsa032_u:1562: yathā yathā dharmaparo 'bhavajjanastathā tathā rakṣijano viśeṣataḥ /
T09bsa032_u:1563: cakāra duḥśīlajanābhimārgaṇāmataśca dharmānna cacāla kaścana // Jm_10.20 //
T09bsa032_u:1567: parā manīṣā mama rakṣituṃ prajā gatāśca tāḥ samprati dakṣiṇīyatām /
T09bsa032_u:1568: idaṃ ca yajñāya dhanaṃ pratarkitaṃ yiyakṣurasmīti yathāpratarkitam // Jm_10.22 //
T09bsa032_u:1569: yadīpsitaṃ yasya sukhendhanaṃ dhanaṃ prakāmamāpnotu sa tanmadantikāt /
T09bsa032_u:1570: itīyamasmadviṣayopatāpinī daridratā nirviṣayā yathā bhavet // Jm_10.23 //

T09bsa032_u:1596: lakṣmeva kṣaṇadākarasya vitataṃ gātre na kṛṣṇājinaṃ
T09bsa032_u:1601: hiṃsāviṣaktaḥ kṛpaṇaḥ phalepsoḥ prāyeṇa lokasya nayajña yajñaḥ /

T09bsa032_u:1606: dānaṃ nāma dhanodaye sati jano datte tadāśāvaśaḥ
T09bsa032_u:1607: syācchīle 'pi ca lokapaṃktyabhimukhaḥ svarge ca jātaspṛhaḥ /

T09bsa032_u:1624: harmye sudhāsekanavāṅgarāge niṣaktarūpā śaśinaḥ prabheva // Jm_11.1 //

T09bsa032_u:1631: dharmātmano 'pi tu sa tasya parābalepaḥ krīḍāvighātavirasaṃ ca bhayaṃ janasya /
T09bsa032_u:1632: tejasvitā nayapathopanataḥ kramaśca yuddhodbhavābhimukhatāṃ hṛdayasya cakruḥ // Jm_11.3 //
T09bsa032_u:1635: pāṇḍukambalinaṃ haimaṃ rathavaramabhiruhya mahatā hastyaśvarathapadātivicitreṇa devānīkena
T09bsa032_u:1639: tiṣṭha naivamitaḥ paśya kvedānīṃ manna mokṣyase /

T09bsa032_u:1653: mātalirdevendrasārathiḥ svaṃ ca balaṃ palāyanaparamavetyāpayānamatra prāptakālamiti
T09bsa032_u:1655: atha śakro devendraḥ samutpatato ratheṣāgrābhimukhānyabhighātapathāgatāni śālmalīvṛkṣe garuḍanīḍānyapaśyat /
T09bsa032_u:1656: dṛṣṭvaiva ca karuṇayā samālambyamānahṛdayo mātaliṃ saṃgrāhakamityuvāca -
T09bsa032_u:1658: amī pateyurna yathā ratheṣayā vicūrṇitā vāhaya me rathaṃ tathā // Jm_11.11 //
T09bsa032_u:1659: mātaliruvāca - amī tāvanmārṣa samabhiyānti no daityasaṃghā iti /
T09bsa032_u:1663: nivartanādasya rathasya kevalaṃ śivaṃ bhavedamburuhākṣa pakṣiṇām /
T09bsa032_u:1664: cirasya labdhaprasarā sureṣvasāvabhidravatyeva tu no dviṣaccamūḥ // Jm_11.12 //
T09bsa032_u:1665: atha śakro devendraḥ svamadhyāśayātiśayaṃ sattvaviśeṣaṃ ca kāruṇyaviśeṣāt prakāśayannuvāca -
T09bsa032_u:1667: dhigvādadagdhayaśaso na tu jīvitaṃ me sattvānyamūni bhayadīnamukhāni hatvā // Jm_11.13 //
T09bsa032_u:1669: atha mātalistatheti pratiśrutya turagasahasrayuktaṃ syandanamasya nivartayāmāsa /

T09bsa032_u:1674: nirīkṣya bhagnaṃ tu tadāsuraṃ balaṃ surendrasenāpyatha sā nyavartata /

T09bsa032_u:1678: evaṃ sa eva tasya saṃgrāmasya vijayo babhūva /

T09bsa032_u:1681: prāṇātyaye 'pi tu na sādhujanaḥ svavṛttiṃ velāṃ samudra iva laṅghayituṃ samarthaḥ // Jm_11.18 //
T09bsa032_u:1682: tadevaṃ devarājyaṃ prāṇānapi parityajya dīrgharātraṃ paripālitāni bhagavatā sattvāni /

T09bsa032_u:1684: tathā hi dharmo ha vai rakṣati dharmacāriṇamityatrāpyunneyam /

T09bsa032_u:1692: sa yathākramaṃ garbhādhānapuṃsavanasīmantonnayanajātakarmādibhiḥ kṛtasaṃskārakramo vedādhyayananimittaṃ śrutābhijanācārasampanne gurau prativasati sma /
T09bsa032_u:1693: tasya śrutagrahaṇadhāraṇapāṭavaṃ ca bhaktyanvayaśca satataṃ svakulaprasiddhaḥ /

T09bsa032_u:1701: vyasanamiva sadaiva śocanaṃ dhanavikalatvamatīva dāruṇam // Jm_12.4 //

T09bsa032_u:1705: asmatparikleśāmarṣibhistu bhavadbhirayameva yatno dhanāharaṇaṃ prati yuktaḥ karttuṃ syāt / kutaḥ?

T09bsa032_u:1708: śiṣyā ūcuḥ - kiṃ kariṣyāmo mandabhāgyā vayaṃ yadetāvānnaḥ śaktiprayāmaḥ / api ca
T09bsa032_u:1710: nedaṃ dāridryaduḥkhaṃ te vayamevaṃ sahemahi // Jm_12.6 //
T09bsa032_u:1720: adhyāpaka uvāca - taruṇairapi vyavasāyaśithilahṛdayairdurabhisambhavāḥ khalvevaṃvidhā dhanārjanopāyāḥ /
T09bsa032_u:1723: āpaddharmaḥ steyamiṣṭaṃ dvijānāmāpaccāntyā niḥsvatā nāma loke /
T09bsa032_u:1724: tasmād bhojyaṃ svaṃ pareṣāmaduṣṭaiḥ sarvaṃ caitad brāhmaṇānāṃ svameva // Jm_12.8 //
T09bsa032_u:1725: kāmaṃ prasahyāpi dhanāni hartuṃ śaktirbhavedeva bhavadvidhānām /

T09bsa032_u:1727: iti muktapragrahāstena te chātrāḥ paramamiti tattasya vacanamayuktamapi yuktamiva pratyaśrauṣuranyatra bodhisattvāt /
T09bsa032_u:1731: atha sa teṣāmadhyāpako bodhisattvamavekṣya taṃ vidhimanabhinandantamapratikrośantaṃ

T09bsa032_u:1805: tasmādidamatra prāptakālamiti yathāprastāvamupetya rājñe nivedayāmāsuḥ - dṛṣṭāsmābhirmahārāja sā kanyakā /

T09bsa032_u:1811: iti śrutārthaḥ sa rājā - apalakṣaṇā kilāsau,
T09bsa032_u:1812: na ca me kulānurūpeti tasyāṃ vinivṛttābhilāṣo babhūva /
T09bsa032_u:1813: anarthitāṃ tu vijñāya rājñaḥ sa gṛhapatistāṃ dārikāṃ tasyaiva rājño 'mātyāyābhipāragāya prāyacchat /
T09bsa032_u:1814: atha kadācitsa rājā kramāgatāṃ kaumudīṃ svasminpuravare niṣaktaśobhāṃ draṣṭumutsukamanā
T09bsa032_u:1819: athonmādayantyapalakṣaṇā kilāhamityanena rājñāvadhūteti samutpannāmarṣā rājadarśanakutūhalena nāma saṃdṛśyamānarūpaśobhā vidyudiva ghanaśikharaṃ
T09bsa032_u:1822: atha tasya rājñaḥ puravaravibhūtidarśanakutūhalaprasṛtā dṛṣṭirabhimukhasthitāyāṃ sahasaiva tasyāmapatat /
T09bsa032_u:1827: uditamadanavismayaḥ striyaṃ tāṃ ciramanimeṣavilocano dadarśa // Jm_13.9 //

T09bsa032_u:1830: iti vicārayata eva tasya rājñastaddarśanāvitṛptanayanasya sa rathastaṃ deśamativartamāno na manorathānukūlo babhūva /
T09bsa032_u:1831: atha sa rājā śūnyahṛdaya iva tadgataikāgramanāḥ svabhavanamupetya manmathākṣiptadhṛtiḥ sunandaṃ sārathiṃ rahasi paryapṛcchat -
T09bsa032_u:1833: kā sā tatra vyarociṣṭa vidyutsita ivāmbude // Jm_13.11 //
T09bsa032_u:1835: tasya tadgṛhaṃ tasyaiva ca sā bhāryā kirīṭavatsasya duhitā unmādayantī nāmeti /

T09bsa032_u:1840: sthitaṃ tasyāṃ hi me cetaḥ sā prabhutvena tatra vā // Jm_13.13 //
T09bsa032_u:1845: kāryāntarakramanivedanadhṛṣṭaśabdā vidveṣamuttudati cetasi nālikā me // Jm_13.15 //
T09bsa032_u:1846: iti sa rājā madabalavicalitadhṛtirvyavasthāpayannapyātmānamāpāṇḍukṛśatanuḥ pradhyānaviniśvasitavijṛmbhaṇaparaḥ pravyaktamadanākāro babhūva /
T09bsa032_u:1847: dhṛtyā mahatyāpi niguhyamānaḥ sa bhūpatestasya manovikāraḥ /
T09bsa032_u:1848: mukhena cintāstimitekṣaṇena kārśyena ca vyaktimupājagāma // Jm_13.16 //
T09bsa032_u:1850: snehāttadatyayāśaṅko jānānaścātibalatāṃ madanasya rahasi rājānaṃ saṃviditaṃ samupetya
T09bsa032_u:1853: māmāha nāvaiṣi nṛpasya kasmādunmādayantyāṃ hṛdayaṃ niviṣṭam // Jm_13.17 //
T09bsa032_u:1855: taccettathā deva kimetadevamasmāsu te niṣpraṇayatvamaunam // Jm_13.18 //
T09bsa032_u:1857: atha rājā pratyādeśāllajjāvanatavadano madanavaśagato 'pi svabhyastadharmasaṃjñatvādaviklavībhūtadhairyaḥ pratyākhyānaviśadākṣaramenamuvāca - naitadasti / kutaḥ?
T09bsa032_u:1858: puṇyāccyutaḥ syāmamaro na cāsmi vidyācca naḥ pāpamidaṃ jano 'pi /

T09bsa032_u:2193: valganniva vyākuladhūmakeśaḥ sasvāna teṣāṃ dhṛtimādadānaḥ // Jm_16.4 //
T09bsa032_u:2195: so 'gniḥ sasaṃrambha ivābhipatya sphuratsphuliṅgaprakaro dadāha // Jm_16.5 //
T09bsa032_u:2198: dhūmaughamagnaṃ paṭuvahniśabdaṃ vanaṃ tadārtyeva bhṛśaṃ rarāsa // Jm_16.6 //
T09bsa032_u:2199: krameṇa cotpīḍyamāna iva sa vahniḥ paṭunā mārutena tṛṇagahanānusārī teṣāṃ nīḍasamīpamupajagāma /
T09bsa032_u:2200: atha te vartakāpotakā bhayavirasavyākulavirāvāḥ parasparanirapekṣāḥ sahasā samutpetuḥ /
T09bsa032_u:2202: viditātmaprabhāvastvasaṃbhrānta eva sa mahāsattvaḥ sarabhasamivopasarpantamagniṃ sānunayamityuvāca -
T09bsa032_u:2204: tvadyogyamasti na ca kiñcidihātitheyamasmānnivartitumatastava yuktamagne // Jm_16.7 //
T09bsa032_u:2207: nadīmiva prāpya vivṛddhatoyāṃ tadvācamāsādya śaśāma sadyaḥ // Jm_16.8 //
T09bsa032_u:2208: adyāpi taṃ himavati prathitaṃ pradeśaṃ dāvāgniruddhataśikho 'pi samīraṇena /
T09bsa032_u:2209: mantrābhiśapta iva naikaśirā bhujaṅgaḥ saṅkocamandalulitārcirupaiti śāntim // Jm_16.9 //
T09bsa032_u:2211: velāmiva pracalitormiphaṇaḥ samudraḥ śikṣāṃ munīndravihitāmiva satyakāmaḥ /
T09bsa032_u:2212: satyātmanāmiti na laṅghayituṃ yadājñāṃ śaktaḥ kṛśānurapi satyamato na jahyāt // Jm_16.10 //
T09bsa032_u:2213: tadevaṃ satyavacanaparibhāvitāṃ vācamagnirapi na prasahate laṅghayitumiti satyavacane 'bhiyogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ /
T09bsa032_u:2220: bodhisattvaḥ kila karuṇātiśayaparibhāvitamatiḥ parahitasukhopapādanaparaḥ puṇyāṃ pratipadamudbhāvayandānadamasaṃyamādibhiḥ kadācicchakrā devānāmindro babhūva /
T09bsa032_u:2221: sa prakarṣiṇāmapi divyānāṃ viṣayasukhānāṃ nikāmalābhī sannapi karuṇāvaśagatvānnaiva lokārthacaryāsamudyogaśithilaṃ manaścakāra /
T09bsa032_u:2227: svabhāvamahatā cakṣuṣā dadarśa sarvamitraṃ nāma rājānamakalyāṇamitrasaṃparkadoṣāt
T09bsa032_u:2229: tatra cāsyādoṣadarśitāmavekṣya mahādoṣatāṃ ca madyapānasya sa mahātmā mahatyā karuṇayā samāpīḍyamānahṛdayaścintāmāpede /
T09bsa032_u:2236: ityatra rājaiva cikitsanīyaḥ śubhāśubhaṃ tatprabhavaṃ hi loke // Jm_17.4 //
T09bsa032_u:2238: brāhmaṃ vapurabhinirmāya surāpūrṇaṃ ca vāmapārśvasthaṃ nātibṛhantaṃ kumbhaṃ sarvamitrasya rājñaḥ (Vaidya 105)
T09bsa032_u:2239: pariṣadi saṃniṣaṇṇasya prastāvopanatāsu pravṛttāsu surāsavaśīdhumaireyamadhukathāsu purato 'ntarikṣe prādurabhūt /
T09bsa032_u:2240: vismayabahumānāvarjitena ca prāñjalinā tena janenābhyutthāya pratyarcyamānaḥ sajala iva jaladharo gambhīramabhi dannuccairuvāca -
T09bsa032_u:2244: kisalayaracanāsamutkaṭaṃ ghaṭamimamicchati kaḥ krayeṇa vaḥ // Jm_17.6 //
T09bsa032_u:2245: athainaṃ sa rājā vismayāvarjitakautūhalaḥ sabahumānamīkṣamāṇaḥ kṛtāñjaliruvāca -
T09bsa032_u:2246: dīptyā navārka iva cārutayā śaśīva saṃlakṣyase ca vapuṣānyatamo munīnām /
T09bsa032_u:2247: tadvaktumarhasi yathā vidito 'si loke saṃbhāvanā hi guṇatastvayi no vicitrā // Jm_17.7 //
T09bsa032_u:2249: paścādapi jñāsyasi yo 'hamasmi ghaṭaṃ tvidaṃ kretumito ghaṭasva /
T09bsa032_u:2250: na ced bhayaṃ te paralokaduḥkhādihaiva tīvravyasanāgamādvā // Jm_17.8 //
T09bsa032_u:2253: prasiddha iti lokasya paṇyānāṃ vikrayakramaḥ // Jm_17.9 //
T09bsa032_u:2255: na hi kṛcchre 'pi saṃtyaktuṃ satyamicchanti sādhavaḥ // Jm_17.10 //
T09bsa032_u:2256: tadācakṣva mahābhāga pūrṇaḥ kasya ghaṭo nvayam /
T09bsa032_u:2259: nāyaṃ toyadavicyutasya payasaḥ pūrṇo na tīrthāmbhasaḥ
T09bsa032_u:2260: kaiñjalkasya sugandhino na madhunaḥ sarpirviśeṣasya vā /
T09bsa032_u:2263: pūrṇaḥ pāpamayasya yasya tu ghaṭastasya prabhāvaṃ śṛṇu // Jm_17.12 //
T09bsa032_u:2267: tatsaṃpūrṇamimaṃ gataṃ krayapathaṃ krīṇīta kumbhādhamam // Jm_17.13 //
T09bsa032_u:2268: anīśaḥ sve citte vicarati yayā saṃhṛtamatir
T09bsa032_u:2271: krayārhā seyaṃ vaḥ śubhavirahitā kumbhanihitā // Jm_17.14 //
T09bsa032_u:2281: gaṇayecca sā dhanapatiṃ na patiṃ tadidaṃ ghaṭe vinihitaṃ nihitam // Jm_17.17 //
T09bsa032_u:2283: parasparaṃ niṣpipiṣurgadābhirunmādanī sā nihiteha kumbhe // Jm_17.18 //
T09bsa032_u:2285: ucchedanī vittavatāṃ kulānāṃ seyaṃ ghaṭe krayyatayādhirūḍhā // Jm_17.19 //
T09bsa032_u:2288: paribhavabhavanaṃ bhavati ca niyataṃ yadupahatamatistadidamiha ghaṭe // Jm_17.20 //
T09bsa032_u:2290: bahu vadantyasamīkṣitaniścayaṃ krayapathena gataṃ tadidaṃ ghaṭe // Jm_17.21 //
T09bsa032_u:2292: trāṇāpekṣāstoyarāśau mamajjustasyāḥ pūrṇaṃ kumbhametaṃ vṛṇīta // Jm_17.22 //
T09bsa032_u:2293: brūyādasatyamapi satyamiva pratītaḥ kuryādakāryamapi kāryamiva prahṛṣṭaḥ /
T09bsa032_u:2294: yasyā guṇena sadasatsadasacca vidyācchāpasya mūrtiriva sā nihiteha kumbhe // Jm_17.23 //
T09bsa032_u:2296: advaitasiddhāṃ kalipaddhatiṃ tāṃ krīṇīta ghorāṃ manasastamistrām // Jm_17.24 //
T09bsa032_u:2298: avigaṇitasukhāyatiryatiṃ vā krayavidhinā nṛpa tāmito gṛhāṇa // Jm_17.25 //
T09bsa032_u:2299: evaṃvidhaṃ madyamidaṃ narendra sureti loke prathitaṃ surābha /
T09bsa032_u:2300: na pakṣapāto 'sti guṇeṣu yasya sa kretumudyogamidaṃ karotu // Jm_17.26 //
T09bsa032_u:2303: tiryaggatiṃ pretadaridratāṃ ca ko nāma taddraṣṭumapivyavasyet // Jm_17.27 //
T09bsa032_u:2304: laghurapi ca vipāko madyapānasya yaḥ syānmanujagatigatānāṃ śīladṛṣṭīḥ sa hanti /
T09bsa032_u:2305: jvalitadahanaraudre yena bhūyo 'pyavīcau nivasati pitṛloke hīnatiryakṣu caiva // Jm_17.28 //
T09bsa032_u:2306: śīlaṃ nimīlayati hanti yaśaḥ prasahya lajjāṃ nirasyati matiṃ malinīkaroti /
T09bsa032_u:2307: yannāma pītamupahanti guṇāṃśca tāṃstāṃstatpātumarhasi kathaṃ nṛpa madyamadya // Jm_17.29 //
T09bsa032_u:2308: atha sā rājā taistasya hṛdayagrāhakairhetumadbhirvacobhiravagamitamadyapānadoṣo madyaprasaṅgādapavṛttābhilāṣaḥ śakramityuvāca -
T09bsa032_u:2309: snigdhaḥ pitā vinayabhaktiguṇād gururvā yadvaktumarhati nayānayavinmunirvā /
T09bsa032_u:2310: tāvattvayā svabhihitaṃ hitakāmyayā metatkarmaṇā vidhivadarcayituṃ yatiṣye // Jm_17.30 //
T09bsa032_u:2312: dadāmi te grāmavarāṃśca pañca dāsīśataṃ pañca gavāṃ śatāni /
T09bsa032_u:2313: sadaśvayuktāṃśca rathāndaśemānhitasya vaktā hi gururmamāsi // Jm_17.31 //
T09bsa032_u:2316: artho 'sti na grāmavarādinā me surādhipaṃ māmabhigaccha rājan /
T09bsa032_u:2317: saṃpūjanīyastu hitasya vaktā vākpragraheṇa pratipanmayena // Jm_17.32 //
T09bsa032_u:2319: ayaṃ hi panthā yaśasaḥ śriyaśca paratra saukhyasya ca tasya tasya /
T09bsa032_u:2324: evaṃ lokahitaḥ pūrvajanmasvapi sa bhagavāniti tathāgatavarṇe 'pi vācyam /
T09bsa032_u:2335: kalāsu jananayanakāntena ca vapuṣā dharmāvirodhinyā ca lokajñatayā svajana iva lokasya
T09bsa032_u:2337: na hi svajana ityeva svajano bahu manyate /
T09bsa032_u:2338: jano vā jana ityeva svajanād dṛśyate 'nyathā // Jm_18.1 //
T09bsa032_u:2340: vrajatyāspadatāṃ lokaḥ svajanasya janasya vā // Jm_18.2 //
T09bsa032_u:2343: sukhodayatvaṃ ca tapovanānāṃ na gehasaukhyeṣu manaḥ sasañje // Jm_18.3 //
T09bsa032_u:2344: sa mātāpitroḥ kālakriyayā saṃvignahṛdayastamanekaśatasahasrasaṃkhyaṃ gṛhavibhavasāraṃ mitrasvajanakṛpaṇaśramaṇabrāhmaṇebhyo yathārhamatisṛjya pravavrāja /
T09bsa032_u:2346: sa dhyānaguṇābhyāsāt sātmībhūtenākṛtakenendriyaprasādena śrutihṛdayāhlādinā ca vidvattāsūcakenānutsiktena
T09bsa032_u:2350: kautūhalinā ca janena samupalabdhakulapravrajyākramaḥ suṣṭhutaraṃ lokasaṃmatastatrābhūt /
T09bsa032_u:2353: athāsya tatrābhigamanamupalabhya pitṛvayasyaḥ samabhigamya cainaṃ guṇabahumānāt kuśalaparipraśnapūrvakaṃ
T09bsa032_u:2354: cāsmai nivedyātmānaṃ pitṛvayasyatāṃ ca saṃkathāprastāvāgatamenaṃ snehāduvāca - cāpalamiva
T09bsa032_u:2357: ārādhyate satpratipattimadbhirdharmo yadāyaṃ bhavane vane vā /
T09bsa032_u:2358: śrīmanti hitvā bhavanānyatastvaṃ kasmādaraṇyeṣu matiṃ karoṣi // Jm_18.5 //
T09bsa032_u:2361: mūrtaṃ daridratvamivopaguhya kathaṃ nu śokasya vaśaṃ prayāsi /
T09bsa032_u:2362: imāmavasthāṃ hi tavekṣamāṇā dviṣo 'pi bāṣpāpihitekṣaṇāḥ syuḥ // Jm_18.7 //
T09bsa032_u:2363: tadehi pitryaṃ bhavanaṃ tavedaṃ śrutārthasāraṃ bhavatāpi nūnam /
T09bsa032_u:2364: saṃpādayethā nivasaṃstvamatra dharmaṃ ca satputramanorathaṃ ca // Jm_18.8 //
T09bsa032_u:2368: atha bodhisattvaḥ pravivekasukhāmṛtarasaparibhāvitamatistatpravaṇahṛdayaḥ samupalabdhaviśeṣo gṛhavanavāsayoḥ kāmopabhoganimantraṇāyāṃ tṛpta iva bhojanakathāyāmasukhāyamāna uvāca -
T09bsa032_u:2370: sukhasaṃjñāṃ tu mā kārṣīḥ kadācidgṛhacārake // Jm_18.10 //
T09bsa032_u:2373: yatra nāma sukhaṃ naiva sadhanasyādhanasya vā /
T09bsa032_u:2375: yadapi ceṣṭaṃ gṛhasthenāpi śakyamayamārādhayituṃ dharma iti kāmamevametat /
T09bsa032_u:2382: yadi dharmamupaiti nāsti gehamatha gehābhimukhaḥ kuto 'sya dharmaḥ /
T09bsa032_u:2383: praśamaikaraso hi dharmamārgo gṛhasiddhiśca parākramakrameṇa // Jm_18.14 //
T09bsa032_u:2384: iti dharmavirodhadūṣitatvād gṛhavāsaṃ ka ivātmavān bhajeta /
T09bsa032_u:2385: paribhūya sukhāśayā hi dharmaṃ niyamo nāsti sukhodayaprasiddhau // Jm_18.15 //
T09bsa032_u:2386: niyataṃ ca yaśaḥparābhavaḥ syādanutāpo manasaśca durgatiśca /
T09bsa032_u:2387: iti dharmavirodhinaṃ bhajante na sukhopāyamapāyavannayajñāḥ // Jm_18.16 //
T09bsa032_u:2388: api ca, sukho gṛhavāsa iti śraddhāgamyamidaṃ me pratibhāti /
T09bsa032_u:2391: sukhamatra kutaḥ kathaṃ kadā vā parikalpapraṇayaṃ na cedupaiti /
T09bsa032_u:2394: prāyaḥ samṛddhyā madameti gehe mānaṃ kulenāpi balena darpam /
T09bsa032_u:2395: duḥkhena roṣaṃ vyasanena dainyaṃ tasminkadā syātpraśamāvakāśaḥ // Jm_18.19 //
T09bsa032_u:2399: ka ivāśrayedabhimukhaṃ vilayaṃ bahutīvraduḥkhanilayaṃ nilayam // Jm_18.20 //
T09bsa032_u:2401: prasīdati yathā cetastridive 'pi tathā kutaḥ // Jm_18.21 //
T09bsa032_u:2403: adharmamiśraṃ tu sukhaṃ na kāmaye viṣeṇa saṃpṛktamivānnamātmavān // Jm_18.22 //
T09bsa032_u:2404: ityavagamitamatiḥ sa tena pitṛvayasyo hṛdayagrāhakeṇa vacasā bahumānameva tasminmahāsattve satkāraprayogaviśeṣeṇa pravedayāmāsa /
T09bsa032_u:2411: pravivekasukharasajñānāṃ viḍambaneva vihiṃseva ca kāmāḥ pratikūlā bhavanti /
T09bsa032_u:2413: bodhisattvaḥ kila kasmiṃścinmahati guṇaprakāśayaśasi vācyadoṣavirahite brāhmaṇakule janmaparigrahaṃ cakāra /
T09bsa032_u:2414: tasya yatra kanīyāṃsaḥ ṣaḍapare bhrātarastadanurūpaguṇāḥ snehabahumānaguṇānnityānuguṇā babhūvuḥ,
T09bsa032_u:2416: sa kṛtaśramaḥ sāṅgeṣu sopavedeṣu vedeṣu samadhigatavidyāyaśāḥ saṃmato jagati daivatavanmātāpitarau
T09bsa032_u:2417: parayā bhaktyā paricarannācārya iva piteva tānbhrātṝnvidyāsu vinayannayavinayakuśalo gṛhamāvasati sma /
T09bsa032_u:2418: sa kālakramānmātāpitroḥ kālakriyayā saṃvignahṛdayaḥ kṛtvā tayoḥ pretakṛtyāni vyatīteṣu śokamayeṣviva keṣucideva divaseṣu tānbhrātṝn saṃnipātyovāca
T09bsa032_u:2420: saha sthitvāpi suciraṃ mṛtyunā yadviyojyate // Jm_19.1 //
T09bsa032_u:2430: evaṃ hi vaḥ syādyaśasaḥ samṛddhirdharmasya cārthasya sukhāspadasya /
T09bsa032_u:2435: adyāpi tāvatpitṛśokaśalyakṣatāni rohanti na no manāṃsi /
T09bsa032_u:2437: tatsādhvimāṃ saṃhara dhīra buddhiṃ mā naḥ kṣate kṣāramihopahārṣīḥ // Jm_19.5 //
T09bsa032_u:2438: athākṣamaṃ vetsi gṛhānurāgaṃ śreyaḥpathaṃ vā vanavāsasaukhyam /
T09bsa032_u:2439: asmānanāthānapahāya gehe kasmādvanaṃ vāñchasi gantumekaḥ // Jm_19.6 //
T09bsa032_u:2444: prapātamiva manyante pravrajyāṃ prāyaśo janāḥ // Jm_19.7 //
T09bsa032_u:2445: iti mayā nigṛhya nābhihitāḥ stha pravrajyāśrayaṃ prati jānatāpi gṛhavanavāsaviśeṣam /
T09bsa032_u:2447: te saptāpi bhrātaro bhaginyaṣṭamāḥ sphītaṃ gṛhavibhavāsāramaśrumukhaṃ ca mitrasvajanabandhuvargaṃ vihāya tāpasapravrajyayā pravrajitāḥ /
T09bsa032_u:2454: sa caiṣāṃ dhyānopadeśapravṛttāṃ kāmādīnavadarśanīṃ saṃvejanīyāṃ pravivekasantoṣavarṇabahulāṃ
T09bsa032_u:2456: sā cainān dāsī bahumānānurāgavaśā tathaiba paricacāra /
T09bsa032_u:2457: sā tasmātsaraso bisānyuddhṛtya mahatsu padminīparṇeṣu śucau tīrapradeśe samānvinyasya ca bhāgānkāṣṭhasaṃghaṭṭanaśabdena kālaṃ nivedyāpakrāmati sma /
T09bsa032_u:2459: yathākramamādāya svasyāṃ svasyāṃ parṇaśālāyāṃ vidhivatparibhujya dhyānābhiyuktamatirvijahāra /
T09bsa032_u:2460: ta evaṃ pravṛttā naiva parasparaṃ dadṛśuranyatra dharmaśravaṇakālāt /
T09bsa032_u:2461: teṣāmevaṃvidhena niravadyena śīlavṛttasamudācāreṇa pravivekābhiratyā dhyānapravaṇamānasatayā ca sarvatra yaśaḥ samupaśrutya śakro devānāmindrastatparīkṣānimittaṃ tatrābhijagāma /
T09bsa032_u:2462: taccaiṣāṃ dhyānābhimukhatvaṃ kukāryeṣvaprasaṅgamanutkaṇṭhāṃ praśamābhirāmaṃ cāvasthānamavekṣya sthirataraguṇasambhāvanastatparīkṣānimittamavahitamanā babhūva /
T09bsa032_u:2466: atha dvipakalabhadaśanapāṇḍukomalāni samuddhṛtya prakṣālya ca bisāni marakataharitaprabheṣu
T09bsa032_u:2468: nivedya kālaṃ teṣāmṛṣīṇāmapasṛtāyāṃ tasyāṃ dāsyāṃ bodhisattvaparīkṣārthaṃ śakro devānāmindraḥ
T09bsa032_u:2470: pravartane hi duḥkhasya tiraskāre sukhasya ca /
T09bsa032_u:2472: atha bodhisattvo 'bhigataḥ prathame bisabhāgasthāne bisabhāgavirahitaṃ padminīpatraṃ
T09bsa032_u:2474: eva pratinivṛtya praviśya parṇaśālāyāṃ yathocitaṃ dhyānavidhimārebhe /
T09bsa032_u:2476: itare tvasya bhrātaro nūnamanena gṛhītaḥ pratyaṃśa iti manyamānā yathocitāneva svānsvānanukrameṇa bisabhāgānādāya yathāsvaṃ parṇaśālāsu paribhujya dhyāyanti sma /
T09bsa032_u:2477: evaṃ dvitīye tṛtīye caturthe pañcame ca divase śakrastasya taṃ bisapratyaṃśamupanidadhe /
T09bsa032_u:2486: atha te tāpasāḥ parasparamīdṛśamanācāramasambhāvayantastatpīḍayā ca samupajātasaṃvegāḥ kaṣṭaṃ kaṣṭamityuktvā vrīḍāvanatavadanāḥ samatiṣṭhanta
T09bsa032_u:2487: śakraprabhāvācca samāvṛtajñānagativiṣayāḥ kuta idamiti na niścayamupajagmuḥ /
T09bsa032_u:2488: atha bodhisattvasyānujo bhrātā svamāvegamātmaviśuddhiṃ ca pradarśayañchapathātiśayamimaṃ cakāra -
T09bsa032_u:2489: samṛddhicihnābharaṇaṃ sa gehaṃ prāpnotu bhāryāṃ ca mano 'bhirāmām /
T09bsa032_u:2490: samagratāmetu ca putrapautrairbisāni te brāhmaṇa yo hyahārṣīt // Jm_19.11 //
T09bsa032_u:2494: kāmeṣu tīvrāṃ sa karotvapekṣāṃ bisānyahārṣīddvijamukhya yaste // Jm_19.12 //
T09bsa032_u:2497: vayo 'pyapaśyanramatāṃ sa gehe bisāni yaste sakṛdapyahārṣīt // Jm_19.13 //
T09bsa032_u:2500: kṛtsnāṃ mahīṃ pātu sa rājavṛttyā lobhādahārṣīttava yo bisāni // Jm_19.14 //
T09bsa032_u:2502: purohitaḥ so 'stu narādhipasya mantrādinā svastyayayena yuktaḥ /
T09bsa032_u:2503: satkāramāpnotu tathā ca rājñastavāpi yo nāma bisānyahārṣīt // Jm_19.15 //
T09bsa032_u:2506: arcantu taṃ jānapadāḥ sametya biseṣu lubdho na guṇeṣu yaste // Jm_19.16 //
T09bsa032_u:2508: catuḥśataṃ grāmavaraṃ samṛddhaṃ labdhvā narendrādupayātu bhoktum /
T09bsa032_u:2509: avītarāgo maraṇaṃ sa caitu lobhaṃ biseṣvapyajayanna yaste // Jm_19.17 //
T09bsa032_u:2513: mā rājataśca vyasanāni labdha bisārthamātmārthamaśīśamadyaḥ // Jm_19.18 //
T09bsa032_u:2515: vidyotamānāṃ bapuṣā śriyā ca patnītvamānīya narādhipastām /
T09bsa032_u:2518: ekākinī sā samatītya sādhūnsvādūpabhoge praṇayaṃ karotu /
T09bsa032_u:2519: satkāralabdhāṃ mudamudvahantī bisānyapaśyattava yā na dharmam // Jm_19.20 //
T09bsa032_u:2520: atha tatra dharmaśravaṇārthaṃ samāgatāstadvanādhyuṣitā yakṣadviradavānarāstāṃ kathāmupaśrutya parāṃ vrīḍāṃ saṃvegaṃ copajagmuḥ /
T09bsa032_u:2523: ālokasandhiṃ divasaiḥ karotu yastvayyapi praskhalito bisārtham // Jm_19.21 //
T09bsa032_u:2525: ṣaḍbhirdṛḍhaiḥ pāśaśataiḥ sa bandhaṃ prāpnotu ramyācca vanājjanāntam /
T09bsa032_u:2526: tīkṣṇāṅkaśākarṣaṇajā rujaśca yaste muniśreṣṭha bisānyahārṣīt // Jm_19.22 //
T09bsa032_u:2528: sa puṣpamālī trapughṛṣṭakaṇṭho yaṣṭayā hataḥ sarpamukhaṃ paraitu /
T09bsa032_u:2530: vaikakṣyabaddhaśca vased gṛheṣu laulyādahārṣīttava yo bisāni // Jm_19.23 //
T09bsa032_u:2532: yo naṣṭamityāha na cāsya naṣṭamiṣṭānsa kāmānadhigamya kāmam /
T09bsa032_u:2533: upaitu gehāśrita eva mṛtyuṃ bhavatsu yaḥ śaṅkata īdṛśaṃ vā // Jm_19.24 //
T09bsa032_u:2534: atha śakro devendrastena teṣāṃ kāmopabhogaprātikūlyasūcakena śapathātiśayena samutpāditavismayabahumānaḥ svenaiva vapuṣābhijvalatā tānṛṣīnabhigamya sāmarṣavaduvāca - mā tāvadbhoḥ /
T09bsa032_u:2536: yānprāptumicchanti tapaḥśramaiśca tānkena kāmāniti kutsayadhve // Jm_19.25 //
T09bsa032_u:2538: saṃkṣepatastu śrūyatāṃ yadabhisamīkṣya kāmānna praśaṃsanti munayaḥ /
T09bsa032_u:2539: kāmeṣu bandhamupayāti vadhaṃ ca lokaḥ śokaṃ klamaṃ bhayamanekavidhaṃ ca duḥkham /
T09bsa032_u:2540: kāmārthameva ca mahīpatayaḥ patanti dharmopamardarabhasā narakaṃ paratra // Jm_19.26 //
T09bsa032_u:2541: yatsauhṛdāni sahasā virasībhavanti yannītiśāṭhyamalinena pathā prayānti /
T09bsa032_u:2542: kīrtyā viyogamasukhaiḥ parataśca yogaṃ yatprāpnuvanti nanu kāraṇamatra kāmāḥ // Jm_19.27 //
T09bsa032_u:2543: iti hīnavimadhyamottamānāmiha cāmutra ca yadvadhāya kāmāḥ /
T09bsa032_u:2545: atha śakro devānāmindrastasya tadvacanaṃ yuktamityabhinandya tena caiteṣāmṛṣīṇāṃ māhātmyenābhiprasāditamanāstebhyaḥ svamaparādhamāviścakāra
T09bsa032_u:2550: viśuddhiḥ sthiracāritre tadetāni bisāni te // Jm_19.30 //
T09bsa032_u:2553: na bāndhavā naiva vayaṃ sahāyā na te naṭā nāpi viḍambakāḥ smaḥ /
T09bsa032_u:2557: pitevācārya iva ca kṣantumarhati tadbhavān // Jm_19.32 //
T09bsa032_u:2559: kṣamāṃ ca tatrātmavatāṃ prapattumato 'pyadaścetasi mā sma kārṣīḥ // Jm_19.33 //
T09bsa032_u:2561: tadevaṃ pravivekasukharasajñānāṃ viḍambaneva vihiṃseva ca kāmāḥ pratikūlā bhavanti /
T09bsa032_u:2572: abhūtaguṇasaṃbhāvanā pratodasaṃcodaneva bhavati sādhūnāmiti guṇasaṃpādane prayatitavyam /
T09bsa032_u:2579: atha kadācittasminmahāsattve rājakulamabhigate kenacideva karaṇīyena tasya śvaśrūrduhitaramavalokayituṃ tadgṛhamabhijagāma /
T09bsa032_u:2580: kṛtābhyāgamanasatkārā ca saṃkathāprastāvāgataṃ svāṃ duhitaraṃ bodhisattvabhāryāṃ rahasi kuśalaparipraśnapūrvakaṃ paryapṛcchatkaccittvāṃ tāta bhartā nāvamanyate /
T09bsa032_u:2583: sā vrīḍāvanatavadanā lajjā 'pragalbhaṃ śanakairuvāca - yādṛśo 'yaṃ śīlaguṇasamudācāreṇa,
T09bsa032_u:2585: atha sā tasyā mātā jaropahataśrutismṛtitvāllajjāsaṃkucitākṣaraṃ tanayayā tadvacanamabhidhīyamānaṃ na samyagupadhārayāmāta /
T09bsa032_u:2587: sā sasvaramabhiruditā svāṃ duhitaramanuśocantī duḥkhāvegavaśātparidevanaparā babhūva /
T09bsa032_u:2588: kīdṛśastasya śīlaguṇasamudācāro ya evamanuraktaṃ svaṃ janamapahāya pravrajitaḥ?
T09bsa032_u:2591: kṣitipābhimatasya tasya vai vanavāse praṇatā matiḥ katham // Jm_20.2 //
T09bsa032_u:2593: kathamekapade rujaṃ vinā vibhavodgāri gṛhaṃ sa muktavān // Jm_20.3 //
T09bsa032_u:2598: śuciśīladhanaḥ kimāpnuyānna sa geheṣu vane yadīpsati // Jm_20.5 //
T09bsa032_u:2600: yatidharmaparaḥ sa nekṣate kimimaṃ dharmapathavyatikramam // Jm_20.6 //
T09bsa032_u:2602: na ghṛṇāpathameti mānasaṃ yadi vā dharmalavo 'pi sidhyati // Jm_20.7 //
T09bsa032_u:2603: atha sā bodhisattvasya patnī tena mātuḥ karuṇenākṛtakena paridevitena patipravrajyābhisaṃbandhena
T09bsa032_u:2605: pravrajito me bharteti madvyavasthāpanārthamambā gṛhamidamabhigatā vipriyaśravaṇāditi
T09bsa032_u:2606: niścayamupetya saparidevitaṃ sasvaraṃ rudatī mohamupajagāma bālā /
T09bsa032_u:2608: tacchrutvā prātiveśyamitrasvajanabandhuvargaḥ saṃśritajano brāhmaṇagṛhapatayaśca tasya gṛhapateranurāgavaśānugāḥ prāyaśaśca paurāstadgṛhamabhijagmuḥ
T09bsa032_u:2611: atha bodhisattvo rājakulāt svabhavanasamīpamupagataḥ sākrandaśabdaṃ svabhavanamavetya mahataśca janakāyasya saṃnipātaṃ svaṃ puruṣamanvādideśa jñāyatāṃ kimetaditi /
T09bsa032_u:2614: iti śrutvā kuto 'pyeṣa snehādevaṃgato janaḥ // Jm_20.9 //
T09bsa032_u:2616: atha sa mahāsattvaḥ prakṛtyā śuddhāśayaḥ pratyādiṣṭa iva tena vacasā samupajātavrīḍasaṃvegaścintāmāpede /
T09bsa032_u:2619: gṛhābhimukha eva syāṃ yadi kiṃ mama pauruṣam // Jm_20.10 //
T09bsa032_u:2620: syāddoṣabhaktiḥ prathitā mayaivaṃ guṇeṣvavajñāvirasā ca vṛttiḥ /
T09bsa032_u:2621: yāyāmataḥ sādhujane laghutvaṃ ki jīvitaṃ syācca tathāvidhasya // Jm_20.11 //
T09bsa032_u:2624: iti vicintya sa mahātmā tata eva pratinivṛtya rājñaḥ pratihārayāmāsa - śreṣṭhī punardraṣṭumicchati devamiti /
T09bsa032_u:2626: kimidamiti ca rājñā paryanuyukto 'bravīt - icchāmi pravrajitum,
T09bsa032_u:2629: mayi sthite bandhusuhṛdviśiṣṭe tvaṃ kena duḥkhena vanaṃ prayāsi /
T09bsa032_u:2630: yannāpahartuṃ prabhutā mama syāddhanena nītyā balasaṃpadā vā // Jm_20.13 //
T09bsa032_u:2631: artho dhanairyadi gṛhāṇa dhanāni mattaḥ pīḍā kutaścidatha tāṃ pratiṣedhayāmi /
T09bsa032_u:2632: māṃ yācamānamiti bandhujanaṃ ca hitvā kiṃ vā tvamanyadabhivīkṣya vanaṃ prayāsi // Jm_20.14 //
T09bsa032_u:2633: iti sa mahātmā sasnehabahumānamabhihito rājñā sānunayamenamuvāca -
T09bsa032_u:2635: ato na duḥkhena vanaṃ prayāmi yamarthamuddiśya tu taṃ nibodha // Jm_20.15 //
T09bsa032_u:2637: dīkṣāmupāśrita iti prathito 'smi deva śokāśrudurdinamukhena mahājanena /
T09bsa032_u:2638: icchāmi tena vijaneṣu vaneṣu vastuṃ śraddheyatāmupagato 'smi guṇābhipattau // Jm_20.16 //
T09bsa032_u:2640: na hi bhavadvidhānāṃ janapravādasaṃpādanābhirādhyā guṇavibhūtistadasaṃpādanavirādhyā vā /
T09bsa032_u:2642: kurvīta yastā hṛdaye 'pi tāvatsyātso 'pahāsyaḥ kimuta prapattā // Jm_20.17 //
T09bsa032_u:2647: tasyā na hīyeta naraḥ sadharmā hriyāpi tāvaddhuramudvahettām // Jm_20.18 //
T09bsa032_u:2648: saṃbhāvanāyāṃ guṇabhāvanāyāṃ saṃdṛśyamāno hi yathā tathā vā /
T09bsa032_u:2649: viśeṣato bhāti yaśaḥprasiddhyā syāttvanyathā śuṣka ivodapānaḥ // Jm_20.19 //
T09bsa032_u:2651: vicūrṇitā kīrtitanurnarāṇāṃ duḥkhena śaknoti punaḥ prasartum // Jm_20.20 //
T09bsa032_u:2653: krodhocchiraskāniva kṛṣṇasarpānyukto 'si māṃ deva na saṃniṣeddhum // Jm_20.21 //
T09bsa032_u:2654: snehena bhaktijñatayā ca kāmaṃ yukto vidhirbhṛtyajane tavāyam /
T09bsa032_u:2656: vittena tu pravrajitasya kiṃ me parigrahakleśaparigraheṇa // Jm_20.22 //
T09bsa032_u:2657: ityanunīya sa mahātmā taṃ rājānaṃ kṛtābhyanujñastena tata eva vanāya pratasthe /
T09bsa032_u:2658: athainaṃ suhṛdo jñātayaḥ saṃśritāścābhigamya śokāśrupariplutanayanāḥ pādayoḥ saṃpariṣvajya nivārayitumīṣuḥ /
T09bsa032_u:2663: gṛhāśrama eva puṇyatama ityevamanye śrutiyuktisaṃgrathitaṃ grāhayitumīhāṃ cakrire /
T09bsa032_u:2664: tapovanavāsaduḥkhatāsaṃkīrtanaiḥ kāryaśeṣaparisamāptyā yācñayā paralokaphalasaṃdehakathābhistaistaiśca vārttāviśeṣairnivartayitumenaṃ vyāyacchanta
T09bsa032_u:2665: tasya tān pravrajyāśrayavimukhān vanagamananivāraṇadhīramukhān nayanajalārdramukhān suhṛdo 'bhivīkṣya vyaktamiti cintā babhūva -
T09bsa032_u:2666: suhṛtpratijñaiḥ suhṛdi pramatte nyāyyaṃ hitaṃ rūkṣamapi prayoktum /
T09bsa032_u:2667: rūḍhaḥ satāmeṣa hi dharmamārgaḥ prāgeva rūcyaṃ ca hitaṃ ca yatsyāt // Jm_20.23 //
T09bsa032_u:2668: vanād gṛhaṃ śreya idaṃ tvamīṣāṃ svastheṣu citteṣu kathaṃ nu ruḍham /
T09bsa032_u:2670: mṛto mariṣyannapi vā manuṣyaścyutaśca dharmāditi roditavyam /
