T09bsa032_u:2671: kayā nu buddhyā vanavāsakāmaṃ māmeva jīvantamamī rudanti // Jm_20.25 //
T09bsa032_u:2672: madviprayogastvatha śokaheturmayā samaṃ kiṃ na vane vasanti /
T09bsa032_u:2673: gehāni cetkāntatarāṇi mattaḥ ko nvādaro bāṣpaparivyayena // Jm_20.26 //
T09bsa032_u:2674: atha tvidānīṃ svajanānurāgaḥ karoti naiṣāṃ tapase 'bhyanujñām /
T09bsa032_u:2676: sāmarthyamāsītkathamasya naiva byūḍheṣvanīkeṣvapi tatra tatra // Jm_20.27 //
T09bsa032_u:2678: saṃrūḍhamūlo 'pi suhṛtsvabhāvaḥ śāṭhyaṃ prayātyatra vinānuvṛttyā // Jm_20.28 //
T09bsa032_u:2679: nivāraṇārthāni sagadgadāni vākyāni sāśrūṇi ca locanāni /
T09bsa032_u:2680: praṇāmalolāni śirāṃsi caiṣāṃ mānaṃ samānasya yathā karoti // Jm_20.29 //
T09bsa032_u:2682: mā bhūnnaṭānāmiva vṛttametad vrīḍākaraṃ sajjanamānasānām // Jm_20.30 //
T09bsa032_u:2685: ye me haranti sma puraḥsaratvaṃ raṇeṣu mattadvipasaṃkaṭeṣu /
T09bsa032_u:2686: nānuvrajantyadya vanāya te māṃ kiṃsvitsa evāsmi ta eva ceme // Jm_20.32 //
T09bsa032_u:2687: smarāmi naiṣāṃ viguṇaṃ prayātuṃ snehasya yatsaṃkṣayakāraṇaṃ syāt /
T09bsa032_u:2689: mamaiva vā nirguṃṇabhāva eṣa nānuvrajantyadya vanāya yanmām /
T09bsa032_u:2690: guṇāvabaddhāni hi mānasāni kasyāsti viśleṣayituṃ prabhutvam // Jm_20.34 //
T09bsa032_u:2692: ye vā prakāśānapi gehadoṣānguṇānna paśyanti tapovane vā /
T09bsa032_u:2694: paratra caiveha ca duḥkhahetūnkāmānvihātuṃ na samutsahante /
T09bsa032_u:2695: tapovanaṃ tadviparītamete tyajanti māṃ cādya dhigastu moham // Jm_20.36 //
T09bsa032_u:2696: yairvipralabdhāḥ suhṛdo mamaite na yānti śāntiṃ nikhilāśca lokāḥ /
T09bsa032_u:2698: iti sa parigaṇayya niścitātmā praṇayamayāni suhṛdviceṣṭitāni /
T09bsa032_u:2700: tadevamabhūtaguṇasaṃbhāvanā pratodasaṃcodaneva bhavati sādhūnāmiti guṇasaṃpādane prayatitavyam /
T09bsa032_u:2701: yato bhikṣurityupāsaka iti guṇataḥ saṃbhāvyamānena sādhunā tadbhāvasādhubhirguṇairabhyalaṃkartavya evātmā /
T09bsa032_u:2709: bodhisattvaḥ kila mahāsattvaḥ kasmiṃścinmahati brāhmaṇakule guṇābhyāsamāhātmyādativṛddhayaśasi pratiniyatasamṛddhiguṇe rājasatkṛte daivatasaṃmate lokasya janma pratileme /
T09bsa032_u:2710: kālānāmatyayenābhivṛddhaḥ kṛtasaṃskārakarmā śrutaguṇābhyāsādacireṇaiva vidvatsadassu prakāśanāmā babhūva /
T09bsa032_u:2713: atha sa mahātmā pravrajyākṛtaparicayatvātpūrvajanmasu svabhyastadharmasaṃjñatvātprajñāvadātamatitvacca na gehe ratimupalebhe /
T09bsa032_u:2718: atha bodhisattvastapovanānugamanavyavasāyamasya vidtvā tapovanādhyāsanāyogyatāṃ ca strīsaukumāryasyāvocadenāṃ - bhadre darśitastvayāyamasmadanurāgasvabhāvaḥ
T09bsa032_u:2720: yatraiva tvanyāḥ pravrajitāḥ prativasanti tatra bhavatyāstābhireva sārdha pratirūpaṃ vastuṃ syāt /
T09bsa032_u:2723: niketahīnā yatayo vasanti yatraiva cāstaṃ ravirabhyupaiti // Jm_21.2 //
T09bsa032_u:2725: nivartituṃ tena matiṃ kuruṣva ko 'rthastabānena paribhrameṇa // Jm_21.3 //
T09bsa032_u:2728: kimityevaṃ prapadyeya duḥkha tava ca vipriyam // Jm_21.4 //
T09bsa032_u:2730: yattu naiva samarthāsmi vartituṃ rahitā tvayā /
T09bsa032_u:2732: iti sā dvitrirapyucyamānāyadā necchati sma nivartitum,
T09bsa032_u:2734: sa tayānugamyamānaścakravāka iva cakravākyā grāmanagaranigamānanuvicaran kadācitkṛtabhaktakṛtyaḥ
T09bsa032_u:2735: kasmiṃścitpravivikte śrimati nānātarugahanopaśobhite ghanapracchāye kṛtopakāra iva
T09bsa032_u:2737: dhyānavidhimanuṣṭhāya sāyānhasamaye vyutthāya samādheḥ pāṃsukūlāni sivyati sma /
T09bsa032_u:2738: sāpi pravrajitā tasyaiva nātīdūre vṛkṣamūlamupaśobhayamānā devateva svena vapuṣaḥ prabhāveṇa virājamānā tadupadiṣṭena manaskāravidhinā dhyāyati sma /
T09bsa032_u:2745: ākrīḍabhūtāni manobhavasya draṣṭuṃ bhavatyeva manaḥpraharṣaḥ // Jm_21.7 //
T09bsa032_u:2746: atha sa rājā savinayamabhigamya bodhisattvaṃ kṛtapratisaṃmodanakathastatraikānte nvaṣidata /
T09bsa032_u:2747: sa tāṃ pravrajitāmatimanoharadarśanāmabhivīkṣya tasyā rūpaśobhayā samākṣipyamāgahṛdayo nūnamasyeyaṃ sahadharmacāriṇītyavetya lolasvabhavatvāttadapaharaṇopāyaṃ vimamarśa /
T09bsa032_u:2750: tasya buddhirabhavat - tapaḥprabhāvamasya jñātvā śakyamatra tadyuktaṃ pravartituṃ nānyathā /
T09bsa032_u:2754: iti vicintya sa rājā tapahprabhāvajijñāsayā bodhisattvaṃ hitaiṣivaduvāca - bhoḥ pravrajita
T09bsa032_u:2757: asyāṃ hi te kaścidaparādhyamāno niyatasmānapyupakrośabhājanīkuryāt / paśya
T09bsa032_u:2758: evaṃ vivikteṣu tapaḥkṛśaṃ tvāṃ dharmeṇa sārdhaṃ paribhūya kaścit /
T09bsa032_u:2759: imāṃ prasahyāpaharedyadā te śokātparaṃ kiṃ bata tatra kuryāḥ // Jm_21.9 //
T09bsa032_u:2761: vasatviyaṃ tena janānta eva strīsaṃnikarṣeṇa ca kiṃ yatīnām // Jm_21.10 //
T09bsa032_u:2764: syādatra me yaḥ pratikūlavartī darpodbhavādapratisaṃkhyayā vā /
T09bsa032_u:2765: vyaktaṃ na mucyeta sa jīvato me dhārādhanasyeva dhanasya reṇuḥ // Jm_21.11 //
T09bsa032_u:2766: atha sa rājā tīvrāpekṣo 'yamasyāṃ tapaḥprabhāvahīna ityavajñāya taṃ mahāsattvaṃ tadapāyanirāśaṅkaḥ
T09bsa032_u:2767: kāmarāgavaśagaḥ strīsaṃdarśanādhikṛtān puruṣān samādideśa - gacchataitāṃ pravrajitāmantaḥpuraṃ praveśayateti /
T09bsa032_u:2768: tadupaśrutya sā pravrajitā vyālamṛgābhidruteva vanamṛgī bhayaviṣādaviklavamukhī bāṣpoparudhyamānanayanā gadgadāyamānakaṇṭhī tattadārtivaśādvilalāpa
T09bsa032_u:2770: sa eva yasya tvanayābahuḥ syādākrandanaṃ kasya nu tena kāryam // Jm_21.12 //
T09bsa032_u:2771: bhraṣṭādhikārā bata lokapālā na santi vā mṛtyuvaśaṃ gatā vā /
T09bsa032_u:2772: na trātumārtāniti ye sayatnā dharmo 'pi manye śrutimātrameva // Jm_21.13 //
T09bsa032_u:2774: kiṃ vā surairme bhagavān yadevaṃ madbhāgadheyairdhṛtamauna eva /
T09bsa032_u:2777: itthaṃgatāyāmapi tasya maunaṃ tathāpi jīvāmi ca mandabhāgyā // Jm_21.15 //
T09bsa032_u:2779: ārteṣu kārūṇyamayī pravṛttistapodhanānāṃ kimayaṃ na mārgaḥ // Jm_21.16 //
T09bsa032_u:2780: śaṅke tavādyāpi tadeva citte nivartyamānāsmi na yannivṛttā /
T09bsa032_u:2781: tavāpriyeṇāpi mayepsitaṃ yadātmapriyaṃhā tadidaṃ kathaṃ me // Jm_21.17 //
T09bsa032_u:2782: iti tāṃ pravrajitā karunavilāpākranditaruditamātraparāyaṇāṃ te rājasamādiṣṭāḥ puruṣā yānamāropya paśyata eva tasya mahasattvasyāntaḥpurāya ninyuḥ
T09bsa032_u:2783: bodhisattvo 'pi pratisaṃkhyānabalātpratinudya krodhabalaṃ tathaiba pāṃsukūlāni niḥsaṃkṣobhaḥ praśāntacetāḥ sīvyati sma /
T09bsa032_u:2786: hṛtāṃ ca paśyannapi tāṃ varānanāmaśaktidīnapraśamo 'syavasthitaḥ // Jm_21.18 //
T09bsa032_u:2787: taddarśaya svāṃ bhujayo ruṣaṃ vā tejastapaḥsaṃśrayasaṃbhṛtaṃ vā /
T09bsa032_u:2788: ātmapramāṇagrahaṇānabhijño vyarthapratijño hyadhikaṃ na bhāti // Jm_21.19 //
T09bsa032_u:2789: bodhisattva uvāca - avyarthapratijñameva māṃ viddhi mahārāja /
T09bsa032_u:2791: yo 'bhūnmamātra pratikūlavartī vispandamāno 'pi sa me na muktaḥ /
T09bsa032_u:2792: prasahya nītaḥ praśamaṃ mayā tu tasmādyathārthaiva mama pratijñā // Jm_21.20 //
T09bsa032_u:2793: atha sa rājā tena bodhisattvasya dhairyātiśayavyañjakena praśamena samutpāditatapasviguṇasaṃbhāvanaścintāmāpede - anyadevānena brāhmaṇenābhisaṃdhāya
T09bsa032_u:2795: ko 'nyastavābhūtpratikūlavartī yo visphuranneva na te vimuktaḥ /
T09bsa032_u:2796: reṇuḥ samudyanniva toyadena kaścopanītaḥ praśamaṃ tvayātra // Jm_21.21 //
T09bsa032_u:2798: śṛṇu mahārāja jāte na dṛśyate yasminnajāte sādhu dṛśyate /
T09bsa032_u:2799: abhūnme sa na muktaśca krodhaḥ svāśrayabādhanaḥ // Jm_21.22 //
T09bsa032_u:2801: so 'bhūnme na vimuktaśca krodhaḥ śātravanandanaḥ // Jm_21.23 //
T09bsa032_u:2804: yenābhibhūtaḥ kuśalaṃ jahāti prāptādapi bhraśyata eva cārthāt /
T09bsa032_u:2808: dahanamiva vijṛmbhamāṇaraudraṃ śamayati yo hṛdayajvaraṃ na roṣam /
T09bsa032_u:2809: laghurayamiti hīyate 'sya kīrtiḥ kumudasakhīva śaśiprabhā prabhāte // Jm_21.27 //
T09bsa032_u:2812: vikasati niyamena tasya kīrtiḥ śaśina ivābhinavasya maṇḍalaśrīḥ // Jm_21.28 //
T09bsa032_u:2815: saroṣaśalye hṛdaye ca duḥkhaṃ mahārhaśayyāṅkagato 'pi śete // Jm_21.29 //
T09bsa032_u:2821: ataḥ paraṃ kiṃ ripavaśca kuryustīvrāpakāroddhatamanyavo 'pi // Jm_21.32 //
T09bsa032_u:2824: ato na muktaḥ kopo me visphurannapi cetasi /
T09bsa032_u:2826: atha sa rājā tena tasyādbhutena praśamaguṇena hṛdayagrāhakeṇa ca vacasābhiprasāditamatiruvāca -
T09bsa032_u:2838: evaṃ cobhayorarthaṃ caratyakrodhana ityevamādiṣu kṣamānuśaṃsāpratisaṃyukteṣu sūtreṣu vācyam /
T09bsa032_u:2846: bodhisattvaḥ kila mānase mahāsarasi naikaśatasahasrasaṃkhyasya mahato haṃsayūyasyādhipatirdhṛtarāṣṭro nāma haṃsarājo babhūva /
T09bsa032_u:2849: samaravīvadhaviśāradaḥ svāmyanurāgasumukhaḥ sumukho nāma senāpatirbabhūva [āryānandasthavirastena samayena] /
T09bsa032_u:2855: evaṃ tābhyāṃ tadanugṛhyamāṇaṃ haṃsayūthaṃ jagadivaṃ dharmārthavistarābhyāṃ parāṃ vṛddhimavāpa /
T09bsa032_u:2856: tena ca tatsaraḥ parāṃ śobhāṃ babhāra /
T09bsa032_u:2861: atha tasya haṃsādhipateḥ sarvasattvahitasumukhasya ca senāpaterguṇātiśayaprabhāvavismitamanasaḥ siddharṣividyādharadaivatagaṇāstayoḥ kīrtyāśrayābhiḥ kathābhistatra tatrābhiremire /
T09bsa032_u:2863: dharmābhijāto vinayo nayaśca kāvapyamū kevalahaṃsaveṣau // Jm_22.4 //
T09bsa032_u:2867: tena ca samayena brahmadatto nāmānyatamo vārāṇasyāṃ rājā babhūva /
T09bsa032_u:2868: sa tāṃ haṃsādhipateḥ sasenādhipaterguṇātiśayāśrayāṃ kathāṃ prātyayikāmātyadvijavṛddhaiḥ
T09bsa032_u:2870: sacivānuvāca - parimṛśyatāṃ tāvadbhoḥ prasṛtanipuṇamatayaḥ kaścidupāyo yena nāstau
T09bsa032_u:2872: atha te 'mātyāḥ svaiḥ svairmatiprabhāvairanusṛtya nītipathaṃ rājānamūcuḥ -
T09bsa032_u:2875: tadyādṛśe sarabhi tāvabhiratarūpāvanuśrūyete tadutkṛṣṭaraguṇaśobhamiha saraḥ kasmiṃścidaraṇyapradeśe kārayitumarhati devaḥ,
T09bsa032_u:2879: prāyeṇa prāptivirasaṃ sukhaṃ deva na gaṇyate /
T09bsa032_u:2880: parokṣatvāttu harati śrutiramyaṃ sukhaṃ manaḥ // Jm_22.7 //
T09bsa032_u:2881: atha sa rājā astvetadityalpena kālena nātisaṃnikṛṣṭaṃ nagaropavanasya mānasasarasaḥ
T09bsa032_u:2900: rajobhiḥ kusumānāṃ ca savāsamiva kutracit // Jm_22.15 //
T09bsa032_u:2903: tadevaṃvidhaṃ saraḥ kārayitvā sarvapakṣigaṇasya cānāvṛtasukhopabhogyametaddattvā pratyahaṃ sarvapakṣiṇā viśvāsanārthamityabhayadānaghoṣaṇāṃ kārayāmāsa -
T09bsa032_u:2905: dadāti rājā pakṣibhyaḥ prītyā sābhayadakṣiṇam // Jm_22.17 //
T09bsa032_u:2908: praceyakiraṇa iva candramasi vividhasasyasaṃpadvibhūṣaṇadharāyāṃ vasuṃdharāyāṃ pravṛtte
T09bsa032_u:2914: tasya mānasasaraḥsamucitasyāpi haṃsamithunasya tāmatimanoharāṃ sarasaḥ śriyamabhivīkṣya prādurabhūt - aho bata tadapi haṃsayūthamihāgacchediti
T09bsa032_u:2915: prāyeṇa khalu lokasya prāpya sādhāraṇaṃ sukham /
T09bsa032_u:2917: atha tatra taddhaṃsamithunaṃ yathākāmaṃ vihṛtya pravṛtte jaladasamaye vidyudvisphuritaśastravikṣepeṣu
T09bsa032_u:2920: nṛttapravṛtteṣu citreṣu barhigaṇeṣu vācālatāmupagateṣu stokaśukaniṣu pravicaratsu
T09bsa032_u:2923: prayāṇavyākuleṣu haṃsayūtheṣu taddhaṃsamithunaṃ mānasameva saraḥ pratyājagāma /
T09bsa032_u:2924: samupetya ca haṃsādhipatisamīpaṃ prastutāsu digdeśakathāsu taṃ tasya saraso guṇaviśeṣaṃ varṇayāmāsa - asti deva dakṣiṇena himavato vārāṇasyāṃ brahmadatto nāma narādhipatiḥ /
T09bsa032_u:2927: ramante cātra pakṣiṇaḥ svagṛha iva prahīnabhayāśaṅkā /
T09bsa032_u:2928: tadarhati devo vyatītāsu varṣāsu tatra gantumiti /
T09bsa032_u:2929: tacchrutvā sarva eva te haṃsāstatsaṃdarśanasamutsukā babhūvuḥ /
T09bsa032_u:2930: atha bhodhisattvaḥ sumukhaṃ senāpatiṃ praśanavyaktākāraṃ pratataṃ dadarśa,
T09bsa032_u:2932: atha sumukhaḥ praṇamyainamuvāca - na prāptaṃ tatra devasya gamanamiti paśyāmi /
T09bsa032_u:2940: vaṇijo 'pi hi kurvanti lābhasiddhyāśayā vyayam // Jm_22.20 //
T09bsa032_u:2941: yato naitāvatā deva visrambhaḥ kṣamate kvacit /
T09bsa032_u:2942: kāryārthamapi na śreyaḥ sātyayāpanayaḥ kramaḥ // Jm_22.21 //
T09bsa032_u:2944: gatvānubhūya ca tasya saraso guṇavibhūtirasaṃ na nastatra ciraṃ vicarituṃ kṣamaṃ nivāsāya vā cittamabhināmayitumiti paśyāmi /
T09bsa032_u:2945: atha bodhisattvaḥ prāptāyāṃ vimalacandrakṣatratārāvibhūṣaṇāyāṃ rajanyāṃ śaradi tena
T09bsa032_u:2947: punaḥ punarvijñāpyamānasteṣāṃ haṃsānāmanuvṛttyā sumukhapramukheṇa mahatā haṃsagaṇena
T09bsa032_u:2949: dṛṣṭvaiva lakṣmī sarasastu tasya teṣāṃ praharṣākulavismayānām /
T09bsa032_u:2952: ataściraṃ tadgatamānasānāṃ na mānase mānasamāsa teṣām // Jm_22.23 //
T09bsa032_u:2953: tatra te tāmabhayaghoṣaṇāmupalabhya svacchandatāṃ ca pakṣigaṇasya tasya ca saraso vibhūtsā pramuditahṛdayāstatrodyānayātrāmivānubhavantaḥ parāṃ prītisaṃpadamupajagmuḥ /
T09bsa032_u:2954: atha tasmin sarasyadhikṛtāḥ puruṣāsteṣāṃ haṃsānāṃ tatrāgamanaṃ rājñe pratyavedayanta - yādṛśaguṇarūpau (Vaidya 139)
T09bsa032_u:2957: atha sa rājā śākunikakarmaṇi prasiddhaprakāśanaipuṇaṃ śākunikagaṇe samanvipya tadgrahaṇārthaṃ sādaramanvādideśa /
T09bsa032_u:2958: sa tatheti pratiśrutya taryorhaṃsayorgocaravihārapradeśaṃ samyagupalabhya tatra tatra dṛḍhānnigūḍhān pāśān nyadadhāt /
T09bsa032_u:2959: atha teṣāṃ haṃsānāṃ viśvāsādapāyanirāśaṅkānāṃ pramododdhatamanasāṃ vicaratāṃ sa haṃsādhipatiḥ pāśena caraṇe nyabadhyata /
T09bsa032_u:2962: atha bodhisattvo mā bhūdanyasyāpi kasyacittatraivaṃvidho vyasanopanipāta iti rutaviśeṣeṇa sapratibhayatāṃ sarasaḥ prakāśayāmāsa /
T09bsa032_u:2964: haṃsādhipatibandhādvyathitahṛdayā bhayavirasavyākulavirāvāḥ parasparanirapekṣā hatapravīrā iva sainikā divaṃ samutpetuḥ /
T09bsa032_u:2966: snehāvabaddhāni hi mānasāni prāṇatyayaṃ svaṃ na vicintayanti /
T09bsa032_u:2967: prāṇātyayād duḥkhataraṃ yadeṣāṃ suhṛjjanasya vyasanārtidainyam // Jm_22.25 //
T09bsa032_u:2969: gaccha gacchaiva sumukha kṣamaṃ neha vilambitum /
T09bsa032_u:2972: naikāntiko mṛtyuriha sthitasya na gacchataḥ syādajarāmaratvam /
T09bsa032_u:2973: sukheṣu ca tvāṃ samupāsya nityamāpadgataṃ mānada kena jahyām // Jm_22.27 //
T09bsa032_u:2976: naiṣa dharmo mahārāja tyajeyaṃ tvāṃ yadāpadi /
T09bsa032_u:2977: yā gatistava sā mahyaṃ rocate vihagādhipa // Jm_22.29 //
T09bsa032_u:2980: kā nu pāśena baddhasya gatiranyā mahānasāt /
T09bsa032_u:2981: sā kathaṃ svasthacittasya muktasyābhimatā tava // Jm_22.30 //
T09bsa032_u:2982: paśyasyevaṃ kamarthaṃ vā tvaṃ mamātmana eva vā /
T09bsa032_u:2985: tādṛśe saṃtyajan prāṇān kamarthaṃ dyotayedbhavān // Jm_22.32 //
T09bsa032_u:2987: kathaṃ nu patatāṃ śreṣṭha dharme 'rthaṃ na samīkṣase /
T09bsa032_u:2989: so 'haṃ dharmaṃ ca saṃpaśyan dharmāccārthaṃ samutthitam /
T09bsa032_u:2990: tava mānada bhaktyā ca nābhikāṅkṣāmi jīvitam // Jm_22.34 //
T09bsa032_u:2996: api caivaṃgate kārye yadūnaṃ suhṛdāṃ mayā /
T09bsa032_u:3000: atha tau haṃsavaryau niṣādamāpatantamālokya tūṣṇīṃ babhūvatuḥ /
T09bsa032_u:3001: sa ca taddhaṃsayūthaṃ vidrutamālokya nūnamatra kaścidvaddha iti niścitamatiḥ pāśasthānānyanuvicaraṃstau haṃsavaryau dadarśa /
T09bsa032_u:3002: sa tadrūpaśobhayā vismitamanā baddhāviti manyamānastatsamāpannau pāśāvudghaṭṭayāmāsa /
T09bsa032_u:3007: kasmātprāpte 'pi mayyevaṃ vegānna bhajase nabhaḥ // Jm_22.40 //
T09bsa032_u:3009: tadupaśrutya sumukhaḥ pravyaktākṣarapadavinyāsena svabhāvavarṇanādhairyaguṇaujasvinā svareṇa mānuṣīṃ vācamuvāca -
T09bsa032_u:3010: śaktisthaḥ sanna gacchāmi yadidaṃ tatra kāraṇam /
T09bsa032_u:3014: atha sa naiṣādaḥ paramavismitamatiḥ saṃhṛṣitatanūruhaḥ sumukhaṃ punaruvāca -
T09bsa032_u:3016: tvaṃ punarna tyajasyenaṃ ko nvayaṃ bhavato dvija // Jm_22.43 //
T09bsa032_u:3018: rājā mama prāṇasamaḥ sakhā ca sukhasya dātā viṣamasthitaśca /
T09bsa032_u:3020: atha sumukhaḥ prasādavismayāvarjitamānasaṃ taṃ naiṣādamavetya punaruvāca -
T09bsa032_u:3024: naiva te duḥkhamicchāmi na ca baddho bhavān mayā /
T09bsa032_u:3025: sa tvaṃ gaccha yathākāmaṃ paśya bandhūṃśca nandaya // Jm_22.46 //
T09bsa032_u:3027: no cedicchasi me duḥkhaṃ tatkuruṣva mamārthanām /
T09bsa032_u:3028: ekena yadi tuṣṭo 'si tattyajainaṃ gṛhāṇaṃ mām // Jm_22.47 //
T09bsa032_u:3030: viddhi niṣkraya ityasya na te 'haṃ lābhahānaye // Jm_22.48 //
T09bsa032_u:3032: māṃ badhnātu bhavān pūrvaṃ paścānmuñceda dvijādhipam // Jm_22.49 //
T09bsa032_u:3033: tāvāneva ca lābhaste kṛtā syānmama cārthanā /
T09bsa032_u:3034: haṃsayūthasya ca prītirmaitrī tena tathaiva ca // Jm_22.50 //
T09bsa032_u:3036: paśyantu tāvadbhavatā vimuktaṃ haṃsādhipaṃ haṃsagaṇāḥ pratītāḥ /
T09bsa032_u:3038: atha sa naiṣādaḥ krūratābhyasakaṭhinahṛdayo 'pi tena tasya jīvitanirapekṣeṇa svāmyanurāgaślāghinā
T09bsa032_u:3044: ko hi prāṇāpriyatare tavāsmin vipriyaṃ carat // Jm_22.53 //
T09bsa032_u:3045: ityuktvā sa naiṣādastasya nṛapteḥ saṃdeśamanādṛtya haṃsarājaṃ samanumānayan dayāsumukhaṃ pāśānmumoca /
T09bsa032_u:3048: evaṃ suhṛjjñātigaṇena bhadra śaratsahastrāṇi bahūni nanda // Jm_22.54 //
T09bsa032_u:3049: tanmā tavāyaṃ viphalaḥ śramo bhūdādāya māṃ haṃsagaṇādhipaṃ ca /
T09bsa032_u:3051: asaṃśayaṃ prītamanāḥ sa rājā haṃsāvipaṃ sānucaraṃ samīkṣya /
T09bsa032_u:3053: atha naiṣādastasya nirbandhāt paśyatu tāvadatyadbhutamidaṃ haṃsayutaṃ sa rājeti kṛtvā te haṃsamukhyau kācenādaya svasthāvabaddhau rājñe darśayāmāsa
T09bsa032_u:3057: atha sa rājā praharṣavismayāpūrṇamatirdṛṣṭvā tī haṃsapradhānī kāñcanapuñjāvivaśriyābhijvalanmanohararūpau taṃ naiṣādamuvāca -
T09bsa032_u:3059: tava hastamanuprāptau kathaṃ kathaya vistaram // Jm_22.58 //
T09bsa032_u:3066: ātmānaṃ tiṣkrayaṃ kṛtvā haṃsarājasya jīvitam // Jm_22.61 //
T09bsa032_u:3069: tenāsya vākyena supeśalena svāmyarthadhīreṇa ca ceṣṭitena /
T09bsa032_u:3070: tathā prasanno 'smi yathāsya bhartā mayā samaṃ krūratayaiva muktaḥ // Jm_22.63 //
T09bsa032_u:3072: tvadabhiṃgama iti nyayojayanmāṃ viphalaguruḥ kila mā mama śramo bhūt // Jm_22.64 //
T09bsa032_u:3074: mamāpi hṛdi mārdavaṃ janitavān kṣaṇenaiva yaḥ /
T09bsa032_u:3077: tadupaśrutya sa rājā sapramodavismayena manasā vividharatnaprabhodbhāsurasurucirapādaṃ
T09bsa032_u:3082: atha bodhisattvaḥ kāla idānīṃ pratisaṃmoditumiti nūpurārāvamadhureṇa svareṇa rājānamābabhāṣe -
T09bsa032_u:3083: dyutikāntiniketane śarīre kuśalaṃ te kuśalārha kaccidasmin /
T09bsa032_u:3084: api dharmaśarīramavraṇaṃ te vipulairucchvasitīva vākpradānaiḥ // Jm_22.66 //
T09bsa032_u:3086: abhivardhayase svakīrtiśobhamanurāgaṃ jagato hitodayaṃ ca // Jm_22.67 //
T09bsa032_u:3088: samavekṣayase hitaṃ prajānāṃ na ca tatrāsi parokṣabuddhireva // Jm_22.68 //
T09bsa032_u:3090: upayāsi dayānuvṛttiśobhāṃ na ca viśvāsamayīṃ pramādanidrām // Jm_22.69 //
T09bsa032_u:3092: vitatā iva dikṣu kīrtisiddhyā ripubhirniśvasitairasatkriyante // Jm_22.70 //
T09bsa032_u:3094: adya me kuśalaṃ haṃsa sarvatra ca bhaviṣyati /
T09bsa032_u:3114: ubhayeṣāṃ priyaṃ kṛtvā mahadarhatyayaṃ priyam // Jm_22.79 //
T09bsa032_u:3115: ityuktvā sa rājā taṃ naiṣādaṃ mahatā dhanavistarapradānena samānya punarhaṃsarājamuvāca -
T09bsa032_u:3116: imaṃ svamāvāsamupāgatau yuvāṃ visṛjyatāṃ tanmayi yantraṇāvratam /
T09bsa032_u:3117: prayojanaṃ yena yathā taducyatāṃ bhavatsahāyā hi vibhūtayo mama // Jm_22.80 //
T09bsa032_u:3118: aśaṅkitoktaiḥ praṇayākṣaraiḥ suhṛt karoti tuṣṭiṃ vibhavasthitasya yām /
T09bsa032_u:3119: na tadvidhāṃ lambhayate sa tāṃ dhanairmahopakāraḥ praṇayaḥ suhṛtsvataḥ // Jm_22.81 //
T09bsa032_u:3120: atha sa rājā sumukhasaṃbhāṣaṇakutūhalahṛdayaḥ savismayabhivīkṣya sumukhamuvāca -
T09bsa032_u:3121: alabdhagādhā navasaṃstave jane na yānti kāmaṃ praṇayapragalbhatām /
T09bsa032_u:3122: vacastu dākṣiṇyasamāhitākṣaraṃ na te na jalpantyupacāraśībharam // Jm_22.82 //
T09bsa032_u:3129: saṃbhāṣamāṇe tu narādhipe ca sauhārdaramyaṃ vihagādhipe ca /
T09bsa032_u:3131: na heyṣa mārgo vinayabhijātastaṃ caiva jānan kathamabhyupeyām /
T09bsa032_u:3132: tūṣṇīṃ mahārāja yataḥ sthito 'haṃ tanmarṣaṇīyaṃ yadi marṣaṇīyam // Jm_22.86 //
T09bsa032_u:3133: ityukte sa rājā sapraharṣavismayavadanaḥ saṃrādhayan sumukhamuvāca -
T09bsa032_u:3134: sthāne bhavadguṇakathā ramayanti lokaṃ sthāne 'si haṃsapatinā gamitaḥ sakhitvam /
T09bsa032_u:3135: evaṃvidhaṃ hi vinayaṃ nayasauṣṭhavaṃ ca naivākṛtātmahṛdayāni samudvahanti // Jm_22.87 //
T09bsa032_u:3136: tadiyaṃ prastutā prītirvicchidyeta yathā na naḥ /
T09bsa032_u:3137: tathaiva mayi visrambha ajaryaṃ hyāryasaṃgatam // Jm_22.88 //
T09bsa032_u:3138: atha bodhisattvastasya rājñaḥ parāṃ prītikāmatāmavetya snehapravṛttisumukhatāṃ ca saṃrādhayannavocadenam -
T09bsa032_u:3143: prayojanaṃ nāma kiyatkimeva vā madāśrayaṃ mānada yattvamīkṣase /
T09bsa032_u:3144: priyātithitva guṇavatsalasya te pravṛttamabhyāsaguṇāditi dhruvam // Jm_22.91 //
T09bsa032_u:3146: na citrametattvayi vā jitātmani prajāhitārthaṃ dhṛtapārthivavrate /
T09bsa032_u:3147: tapaḥsamādhānapare munāviva svabhāvavṛttyā hi guṇāstvayi sthitāḥ // Jm_22.92 //
T09bsa032_u:3148: iti praśaṃsāsubhagāḥ sukhā guṇā na doṣadurgeṣu vasanti bhūtayaḥ /
T09bsa032_u:3149: imāṃ viditvā guṇadoṣadharmatāṃ sacetanaḥ kaḥ svahitotpathaṃ bhacet // Jm_22.93 //
T09bsa032_u:3150: na deśamāpnoti parākrameṇa taṃ na kośavīryeṇa na nitīsaṃpadā /
T09bsa032_u:3151: śramavyayābhyāṃ nṛpatirvinaiva yaṃ guṇābhijātena pathadhigacchati // Jm_22.94 //
T09bsa032_u:3152: surādhipaśrīrapi vīkṣate guṇān guṇoditāneva paraiti saṃnati /
T09bsa032_u:3153: guṇebhya eva prabhavanti kīrtayaḥ prabhāvamāhātmyamiti śritaṃ guṇān // Jm_22.95 //
T09bsa032_u:3155: prasādayantyeva manāṃsi vidviṣāṃ śaśiprakāśādhikakāntayo guṇāḥ // Jm_22.96 //
T09bsa032_u:3158: prajāhitaṃ kṛtyatamaṃ mahīpatestadanya panthā hyubhayatra bhūtaye /
T09bsa032_u:3159: bhavecca tadrājani dharmavatsale nṛpasya vṛttaṃ hi jano 'nuvartate // Jm_22.98 //
T09bsa032_u:3161: praśādhi dharmeṇa vasuṃdharāmataḥ karotu rakṣāṃ tridaśādhipaśca te /
T09bsa032_u:3162: tvadantikātsaṃśritabhāvanādapi svayūthyaduḥkhaṃ tu vikarṣatīva mām // Jm_22.99 //
T09bsa032_u:3163: atha sa rājā samabhinandya tattasya vacanaṃ saparṣatkaḥ saṃmānapriyavacanaprayogapuraḥsaraṃ tau haṃsamukhyau visasarja /
T09bsa032_u:3164: atha bodhisattvaḥ samutpatya vimalakhaḍgābhinīlaṃ śaratprasannaśobhaṃ gaganatalaṃ
T09bsa032_u:3165: pratibimbenevānugamyamānaḥ sumukhena haṃsasenāpatinā samupetya haṃsayūthaṃ saṃdarśanādeva
T09bsa032_u:3167: kālena copetya nṛpaṃ sa haṃsaḥ parānukampavyasanī sahaṃsaḥ /
T09bsa032_u:3168: jagāda dharmaṃ kṣitipena tena pratyarcyamāno vinayānatena // Jm_22.100 //
T09bsa032_u:3169: tadevaṃ vinipātagatānāmapi satāṃ vṛttaṃ nālamanugantumasatpuruṣāḥ prāgeva sugatiṣṭhānāmiti /
T09bsa032_u:3174: evamayaṃ sthaviraḥ sahacaritacaraṇo bodhisattvena cirakālābhyastapremabahumāno bhavatīti /
T09bsa032_u:3178: asatkṛtānāmapi satpuruṣāṇāṃ pūrvopakāriṣvanukampā na śithilībhavati kṛtajñatvāt kṣamāsātmyācca /
T09bsa032_u:3180: bodhisattvabhūtaḥ kilāyaṃ bhagavān mahābodhirnāma parivrājako babhūva /
T09bsa032_u:3181: sa gṛhasthabhāva eva parividitakramavyāyāmo lokābhimatānāṃ vidyāsthānānāṃ kṛtajñānakautūhalaścitrāsu
T09bsa032_u:3182: ca kalāsu pravrajyāśrayāllokahitodyogācca viśeṣavattaraṃ dharmaśāstreṣvavahitamatisteṣvācāryakaṃ padamavāpa /
T09bsa032_u:3184: gacchati sma tatra tatraiva viduṣāṃ vidvatpriyāṇāṃ ca rājñāṃ brāhmaṇagṛhapatīnāmanyatīrthikānāṃ
T09bsa032_u:3186: guṇā hi puṇyāśrayalabdhadīptayo gatāḥ priyatvaṃ pratipattiśobhayā /
T09bsa032_u:3187: api dviṣadbhyaḥ svayaśonurakṣayā bhavanti satkāraviśeṣabhāginaḥ // Jm_23.1 //
T09bsa032_u:3188: atha sa mahātmā lokānugrahārthamanuvicaran grāmanagaranigamajanapadarāṣṭrarājadhāṇīranyatamasya rājño viṣāyāntaramupajāgāma /
T09bsa032_u:3189: śrutagunavistaraprabhavastu sa rājā tasyāgamanaṃ dūrata evopalabhya prītamanā ramaṇīye svasminnudyānavanapradeśe tasyāvasathaṃ kārayāmāsa /
T09bsa032_u:3190: abhyudgamanādisatkārapuraḥsaraṃ cainaṃ praveśya svaviṣayaṃ śiṣya ivācāryaṃ paricaraṇaparyupāsanavidhinā saṃmānayāmāsa /
T09bsa032_u:3193: bodhisattvo 'pi cainaṃ śrutihṛdayahlādinībhirdharmyābhiḥ kathābhiḥ śreyomārgamanupratipādayamānaḥ pratyahamanujagrāha /
T09bsa032_u:3195: ka eva vādaḥ śucibhājanopame hitārthini premaguṇotsuke jane // Jm_23.3 //
T09bsa032_u:3196: atha tasya rājño 'mātyā labdhavidvatsaṃbhāvanā labdhasaṃmānāśca sadasyāḥ pratyahamabhivardhamānasatkārāṃ bodhisattvasya guṇasamṛddhimīrṣyopahatabuddhitvānna sehire /
T09bsa032_u:3201: tena krameṇa rājānaṃ bodhisattvaṃ prati vigrāhayāmāsuḥ - nārhati devo bodhiparivrājake viśvāsamupagantum /
T09bsa032_u:3202: vyaktamayaṃ devasya guṇapriyatāṃ dharmābhimukhatāṃ copalabhya vyasanapratāraṇaślakṣṇaṭhamadhuravacanaḥ
T09bsa032_u:3203: pravṛttisaṃcāraṇaheturabhūtaḥ kasyāpi pratyarthino rājño nipuṇaḥ praṇidhiprayogaḥ /
T09bsa032_u:3204: tathā hi dharmātmako nāma bhūtvā devamekāntena kāruṇyapravṛttau hrīdainye ca samanuśāsti,
T09bsa032_u:3205: arthakāmoparodhiṣu ca kṣatradharmabāhyeṣvāsannāpanayeṣu dharmasamādāneṣu dayānuvṛttyā ca nāma te kṛtyapakṣamāśvāsanavidhinopagṛṇīte priyasaṃstavaścānyarājadūtaiḥ
T09bsa032_u:3208: atha tasya rājñaḥ punaḥ punarbhedopasaṃhitaṃ hitamiva bahubhirucyamānasya bodhisattvaṃ prati pariśaṅkāsaṃkocitasnehagauravaprasaramanyādṛśaṃ cittamabhavat /
T09bsa032_u:3210: visrambhavānmānuṣamātradhairyaḥ syānnirvikāro yadi nāma kaścit // Jm_23.5 //
T09bsa032_u:3211: atha sa rājā visrambhavirahanmandībhutapremabahumānastasmin mahāsattve na yathāpūrvaṃ satkāraprayogasumukho babhūva /
T09bsa032_u:3212: bodhisattvo 'pi śuddhasvabhāvatvāt bahukāryavyāsaṅgā rājāna iti tanmanasi cakāra /
T09bsa032_u:3213: tatsamīpavartināṃ tu vinayopacāraśaithilyasaṃdarśanādviraktahṛdayamavetya rājānaṃ samādāya tridaṇḍāduṇḍikādyāṃ parivrājakabhāṇḍikāṃ prakramaṇasavyāpāraḥ samabhavat /
T09bsa032_u:3214: tadupaśrutya sa rājā sāvaśeṣasnehatayā dākṣiṇyavinayanuvṛttyā cainamabhigamya pradarśitasaṃbhramo vinivartayitukāma iva tamuvāca -
T09bsa032_u:3216: vyalīkaśaṅkājanakaṃ nu kiṃcid dṛṣṭaṃ pramādaskhalitaṃ tvayā naḥ // Jm_23.6 //
T09bsa032_u:3220: abhajanatvaṃ tu gato 'si śāṭhyāddharmasya tenāhamito vrajāmi // Jm_23.7 //
T09bsa032_u:3221: athāsya sarabhasabhaṣitamativivṛtavadanamabhidravantaṃ vallabhaṃ śvānaṃ tatrāgatamabhipradarśayan punaruvāca - ayaṃ cātra mahārāja amānuṣaḥ sākṣinirdeśo dṛśyatām /
T09bsa032_u:3222: ayaṃ hi pūrvaṃ paṭucāṭukarmā bhūtvā mayi śvā bhavato 'nuvṛttyā /
T09bsa032_u:3223: ākāraguptyajñatayā tvidānīṃ tvadbhāvasūcāṃ bhaṣitaiḥ karoti // Jm_23.8 //
T09bsa032_u:3224: tvattaḥ śrutaṃ kiṃcidanena nūnaṃ madantare bhaktivipattirukṣam /
T09bsa032_u:3226: atha sa rājā tatpratyadeśād vrīḍāvanāmitavadanastena cāsya matinaipuṇyena samāvarjitamatirjātasaṃvego nedānīṃ śāṭhyānuvṛttikāla iti bodhisattvamabhipraṇamyovāca
T09bsa032_u:3227: tvadāśrayā kacidabhūtkathaiṣā saṃprastutā naḥ sadasi pragalbhaiḥ /
T09bsa032_u:3228: upekṣitā kāryavaśānmayā ca tatkṣamyatāṃ tiṣṭha ca sādhu mā gāḥ // Jm_23.10 //
T09bsa032_u:3229: bodhisattva uvāca - naiva khalvahaṃ mahārāja asatkāraprakṛtatvādakṣamayā vā praṇudyamāṇo gacchāmi /
T09bsa032_u:3230: na tvayaṃ mahārāja avasthānakāla iti na tiṣṭhāmi /
T09bsa032_u:3232: vimadhyabhāvādapi hīnaśobhe yāyāṃ na satkāravidhau svayaṃ cet /
T09bsa032_u:3235: ekāvamānābhihatā hi satsu pūrvopakārā na samībhavanti // Jm_23.12 //
T09bsa032_u:3240: sukhārthinaḥ kleśaparāṅmukhasya lokaprasiddhaḥ sphuṭa eṣa mārgaḥ // Jm_23.14 //
T09bsa032_u:3243: asevanā cātyupasevanā ca yācñābhiyogāśca dahanti maitrīm /
T09bsa032_u:3244: rakṣyaṃ yataḥ prītyavaśeṣametannivāsadoṣāditi yāmi tāvat // Jm_23.16 //
T09bsa032_u:3248: bodhisattva uvāca - bahvantarāyo mahārāja bahūpadravapratyarthikatvāllokasaṃniveśa iti na śakyametadavadhāraṇayā pratijñātumāgamiṣyāmīti /
T09bsa032_u:3250: ityanunīya sa māhatmā taṃ rājānaṃ kṛtābhyanujñāsatkārastena rājñā tadviṣayātpracakrāma /
T09bsa032_u:3251: sa tena gṛhijanasaṃstavenākulitahṛdayo 'nyatamadaraṇyāyatanamupaśritya dhyānābhiyuktamatistatra viharannacireṇeva catvāri dhyānāni pañcābhijñāḥ pratilebhe /
T09bsa032_u:3252: tasya samasvāditapraśamasukharasasya smṛtiranukampanusāriṇī taṃ rājānaṃ prati prādurabhūt - kā nu khalu tasya rājño 'vastheti /
T09bsa032_u:3253: athainaṃ dadarśa tairamātyairyathābhiniviṣṭāni dṛṣṭigatāni prait pratāryamāṇam /
T09bsa032_u:3256: patrāṇi citrayati ko 'tra patatriṇāṃ vā svābhāvikaṃ jagadidaṃ niyataṃ tathaiva // Jm_23.17 //
T09bsa032_u:3259: nākasmikaṃ bhavitumarhati sarvametadastyatra sarvamadhi kaścidananta ekaḥ /
T09bsa032_u:3260: svecchāviśeṣaniyamādya imaṃ vicitraṃ lokaṃ karoti ca punaśca samīkaroti // Jm_23.18 //
T09bsa032_u:3263: evaṃ kariṣyati kathaṃ nu samānakālaṃ bhinnāśrayān bahuvidhānamitāṃśca bhāvān /
T09bsa032_u:3264: sarvaṃ tu pūrvakṛtakarmanimittametat saukhyaprayatnanipuṇo 'pi hi duḥkhameti // Jm_23.19 //
T09bsa032_u:3266: dārūṇi naikavidhavarṇaguṇākṛtīni karmātmakāni na bhavanti bhavanti caiva /
T09bsa032_u:3267: naṣṭāni naiva ca yathā punarudbhavanti lokastathāyamiti saukhyaparāyaṇaḥ syāt // Jm_23.20 //
T09bsa032_u:3268: apara enaṃ kṣatravidyāparidṛṣṭeṣu nītikauṭilyaprasaṅgeṣu nairghṛṇyamalineṣu dharmavirodhiṣvapi rājadharmo 'yamiti samanuśaśāsa -
T09bsa032_u:3269: chāyādrumeṣviva nareṣu kṛtāśrayeṣu tāvatkṛtajñacaritaiḥ svayaśaḥ parīpset /
T09bsa032_u:3270: nārtho 'ti yāvadupabhoganayena teṣāṃ kṛtye tu yajña iva te paśavo niyojyāḥ // Jm_23.21 //
T09bsa032_u:3271: iti te 'mātyāstaṃ rājānaṃ tena tena dṛṣṭikṛtonmārgeṇa netumīṣuḥ /
T09bsa032_u:3275: atha bodhisattvaḥ idamatra prāptakālamiti viniścitya svasminnāśramapade mahāntaṃ vānaramabhinirmāya ṛddhiprabhāvāttasya carmāpanīya śeṣamantardhāpayāmāsa
T09bsa032_u:3282: tena rājñā kautūhalānuvṛttyā vānaracarmapratilambhaṃ pratyanuyuktaḥ - kenedamāryāya
T09bsa032_u:3284: bodhisattva uvāca - mayaivedaṃ mahārāja svayamadhigataṃ nānyena kenacidupahṛtam /
T09bsa032_u:3285: kuśatṛṇamātrāstīrṇāyāṃ hi pṛthivyāṃ svabhāvakaṭhināyāṃ niṣaṇṇena svapatā vā pratapyamānaśarīreṇa na sukhaṃ dharmavidhiranuṣṭhiyate /
T09bsa032_u:3286: ayaṃ ca mayāśramapade mahān vānaro dṛṣṭaḥ /
T09bsa032_u:3287: tasya me buddhirabhavat - upapannaṃ bata me dharmasādhanamidamasya vānarasya carma /
T09bsa032_u:3288: śakyamatra niṣaṇṇena svapatā vā parārdhyāstaraṇāstīrṇebhyo rājaśayanebhyo 'pi nivṛttaspṛheṇa svadharmavidhiranuṣṭhātumiti mayā tasyedaṃ carma pragṛhītam /
T09bsa032_u:3290: tacchrutvā sa rājā dākṣiṇyavinayānuvṛttyā na bodhisattvaṃ kiṃcitpratyuvāca /
T09bsa032_u:3292: atha te 'mātyāḥ pūrvamapi tasmin mahāsattve sāmarṣahṛdayā labdhavacanāvakāśatvātpravikasitavadanā
T09bsa032_u:3293: rājānamūdīkṣya bodhisattvamupadarśayanta ūcuḥ - aho bhagavato dharmanurāgaikarasā matiḥ /
T09bsa032_u:3296: āśramapadamabhigata eva mahānnāma vānara ekākinā tapaḥkṣāmaśarīreṇa praśamita ityāścaryam /
T09bsa032_u:3298: athainānasaṃrabdha eva bodhisattvaḥ pratyuvāca - nārhantyatrabhavantaḥ svavādaśobhānirapekṣamityasmān vigarhitum /
T09bsa032_u:3303: iti sa mahātmā tānamātyān sāmānyenopālabhya pratyekaśaḥ punarupālabdhukāmastamahetuvādinamāmantryovāca -
T09bsa032_u:3304: svābhāvikaṃ jagaditi pravikathase tvaṃ tattvaṃ ca tadyadi vikutsayasi kimasmān /
T09bsa032_u:3305: śākhāmṛge nidhanamāpatite svabhāvāt pāpaṃ kṛto mama yataḥ suhato mayāyam // Jm_23.24 //
T09bsa032_u:3307: atha pāpamasti mama tasya vadhānnanu hetutastaditi siddhamidam /
T09bsa032_u:3308: tadahetuvādamidamutsṛja vā vada vātra yattava na yuktamiva // Jm_23.25 //
T09bsa032_u:3309: yadi padmanālaracanādi ca yattadahetukaṃ nanu sadaiva bhavet /
T09bsa032_u:3310: salilādībījakṛtameva tu tat sati tatra saṃbhavati na hyasati // Jm_23.26 //
T09bsa032_u:3313: na heturastīti vadan sahetukaṃ nanu pratijñā svayameva hāpayet /
T09bsa032_u:3314: athāpi hetupraṇayālaso bhavet pratijñayā kevalayāsya kiṃ bhavet // Jm_23.27 //
T09bsa032_u:3315: ekatra kvacidanavekṣya yaśca hetuṃ tenaiva pravadati sarvahetvabhāvam /
T09bsa032_u:3316: prtyakṣaṃ nanu tadavetya hetusāraṃ taddveṣī bhavati virodhaduṣṭavākyaḥ // Jm_23.28 //
T09bsa032_u:3317: na lakṣyate yadi kuhacicca kāraṇaṃ kathaṃ nu tad dṛḍhamasadeva bhāṣase /
T09bsa032_u:3318: na dṛśyate sadapi hi kāraṇāntarāddinātyaye vimalavivārkamaṇḍalam // Jm_23.29 //
T09bsa032_u:3320: sukhārthamiṣṭān viṣayān prapadyase niṣevituṃ necchasi tadvirodhinaḥ /
T09bsa032_u:3321: nṛpasya sevāṃ ca karoṣi tatkṛte na heturastīti ca nāma bhāṣase // Jm_23.30 //
T09bsa032_u:3323: ahetorvānaravadhe siddhe kiṃ māṃ vigarhase // Jm_23.31 //
T09bsa032_u:3324: iti sa mahātmā tamahetuvādinaṃ viśadairhetubhirniṣpratibhaṃ kṛtvā tamīśvakāraṇikamamantrayovāca - (Vaidya 156)
T09bsa032_u:3326: īśvaraḥ sarvasya hi te kāraṇamabhimataḥ / paśya -
T09bsa032_u:3327: kurute yadi sarvamīśvaro nanu tenaiva hataḥ sa vānaraḥ /
T09bsa032_u:3328: tava keyamamaitracittatā paradoṣān mayi yanniṣiñcasi // Jm_23.32 //
T09bsa032_u:3329: atha vānaravīravaiśasaṃ na kṛtaṃ tena dayānurodhinā /
T09bsa032_u:3333: sa svayaṃ svayaṃbhūste yatkaroti tatkarma // Jm_23.34 //
T09bsa032_u:3335: ātmano hi vibhūtyā yaḥ karoti sa karjā // Jm_23.35 //
T09bsa032_u:3337: tatr abhaktiniveśaḥ kaṃ guṇaṃ nu samīkṣya // Jm_23.36 //
T09bsa032_u:3341: dharmato yadi na prāgīśvaraḥ sa tato 'bhūt // Jm_23.38 //
T09bsa032_u:3342: dāsataiva ca sā syādyā kriyeta pareṇa /
T09bsa032_u:3343: syādathāpi na hetoḥ kasyaneśvaratā syat // Jm_23.39 //
T09bsa032_u:3345: yadi kāraṇamīśvara eva vibhurjagato nikhilasya tavābhimataḥ /
T09bsa032_u:3346: nanu nārhasi mayyadhiropayituṃ vihitaṃ vibhunā kapirājavadham // Jm_23.40 //
T09bsa032_u:3348: iti sa mahātmā tamīśvakāraṇikaṃ suśliṣṭairhetubhirmūkatāmivopanīya taṃ pūrvakarmakṛtavādinamāmantraṇāsauṣṭhavenābhimukhīkṛtyovāca - bhavānapyasmānna śobhate vikutsayamānaḥ /
T09bsa032_u:3351: syātsarvameva yadi pūrvakṛtaprabhāvācchākhāmṛgaḥ suhata eva mayaiṣa tasmāt /
T09bsa032_u:3352: dagdhe hi pūrvakṛtakarmadavāgnināsmin pāpaṃ kimatra mama yena vigarhase mām // Jm_23.41 //
T09bsa032_u:3353: athāsti pāpaṃ mama vānaraṃ ghnataḥ kṛtaṃ mayā tarhi na pūrvakarmaṇā /
T09bsa032_u:3354: yadiṣyate karma ca karmahetukaṃ na kaścidevaṃ sati mokṣameṣyati // Jm_23.42 //
T09bsa032_u:3355: bhavecca saukhyaṃ yadi duḥkhahetuṣu sthitasya duḥkhaṃ sukhasādhaneṣu vā /
T09bsa032_u:3356: ato 'numīyeta sukhāsukhaṃ dhruvaṃ pravartate pūrvakṛtaikahetukam // Jm_23.43 //
T09bsa032_u:3357: na dṛṣṭamevaṃ ca yataḥ sukhāsukhaṃ na pūrvakarmaikamato 'sya kāraṇam /
T09bsa032_u:3358: bhavedabhāvaśca navasya karmaṇastadaprasiddhau ca purātanaṃ kutaḥ // Jm_23.44 //
T09bsa032_u:3361: iti sa mahātmā niranuyojyairhetubhistasya maunavratamivopadiśya tamucchedavādinaṃ smitapūrvakamuvāca - āyuṣmataḥ ko 'yamatyādaro 'smadvigarhāyāṃ yadi tattvamucchedavādaṃ manyase?
T09bsa032_u:3362: lokaḥ paro yadi na kaścana kiṃ vivarjyaṃ pāpaṃ śubhaṃ prati ca kiṃ bahumānamohaḥ /
T09bsa032_u:3363: svacchandaramyacarito 'tra vicakṣaṇaḥ syādevaṃ gate suhata eva ca vānaro 'yam // Jm_23.46 //
T09bsa032_u:3367: svakṛtāntapathāgataṃ sukhaṃ na samāpnoti ca lokaśaṅkayā /
T09bsa032_u:3368: iti niṣphalavādavibhramaḥ paramo 'yaṃ nanu bāliśādhamaḥ // Jm_23.48 //
T09bsa032_u:3370: dārūṇi naikavidhavarṇaguṇākṛtīni karmātmakāni na bhavanti bhavanti caiva /
T09bsa032_u:3371: naṣṭāni naiva ca yathā punarudbhavanti lokastathāyamiti ko 'tra ca nāma hetuḥ // Jm_23.49 //
T09bsa032_u:3373: vigarhaṇīyaḥ kiṃ hantā vānarasya narasya vā // Jm_23.50 //
T09bsa032_u:3375: kṛtvā taṃ kṣatravidyāvidagdhamamātyamuvāca - bhavānapyasmān kasmāditi vikutsayate
T09bsa032_u:3380: prayojanaṃ prāpya na cedavekṣyaṃ snigdheṣu bandhuṣvapi sādhuvṛttam /
T09bsa032_u:3381: hate mayā carmaṇi vānare 'smin kā śāstradṛṣṭe 'pi naye vigarhā // Jm_23.52 //
T09bsa032_u:3382: dayāviyogādatha garhaṇīyaṃ karmedṛśaṃ dūḥkhaphalaṃ ca dṛṣṭam /
T09bsa032_u:3383: yatrābhyanujñātamidaṃ na tantre prapadyase kena mukhena tattvam // Jm_23.53 //
T09bsa032_u:3385: iyaṃ vibhūtiśca nayasya yatra tatrānayaḥ kidṛśavibhramaḥ syāt /
T09bsa032_u:3386: aho pragalbhaiḥ paribhūya lokamunnīyate śāstrapathairadharmaḥ // Jm_23.54 //
T09bsa032_u:3388: śāstraprasiddhena nayena gacchan na garhaṇīyo 'smi kapervadhena // Jm_23.55 //
T09bsa032_u:3389: iti sa mahātmā jitaparṣatkān paricitaprāgalbhyānapi ca tānamātyān prasahyābhibhūya
T09bsa032_u:3390: samāvarjitahṛdayāṃ ca sarājikāṃ parṣadamavetya teṣāṃ vānaravadhahṛllekhavinayanārthaṃ
T09bsa032_u:3391: rājānamābabhāṣe - naiva ca khalvahaṃ mahārāja prāṇinaṃ vānaraṃ hatavān /
T09bsa032_u:3393: nirmitasya hi vānarasyedaṃ carma mayā gṛhītamasyaiva kathākramasya prastāvārtham /
T09bsa032_u:3395: ityuktvā tamṛddhyābhisaṃskāraṃ pratisaṃhṛtya parayā ca mātrayābhiprasāditamānasaṃ rājānaṃ saparṣatkamavetyovāca -
T09bsa032_u:3397: sādhupratijñaḥ saghṛṇaḥ prāṇinaṃ ko haniṣyati // Jm_23.56 //
T09bsa032_u:3400: kuryānna yannāma yaśolavārthaṃ tannyāyavādī kathamabhyupeyāt // Jm_23.57 //
T09bsa032_u:3402: dṛṣṭyanvayaṃ hi pravikalpya tattadvāgbhiḥ kriyābhiśca vidarśayanti // Jm_23.58 //
T09bsa032_u:3407: vinirdahantaḥ khalu bāliśaṃ janaṃ kudṛṣṭibhirdṛṣṭiviṣā ivoragāḥ // Jm_23.60 //
T09bsa032_u:3409: ato na tānarhati sevituṃ budhaścarettadarthaṃ tu parākrame sati // Jm_23.61 //
T09bsa032_u:3410: loke virūḍhayaśasāpi tu naiva kāryā kāryārthamapyasadṛśena janena maitrī /
T09bsa032_u:3413: svāṃ kirtimujjvalaya saṃjanayan prajānāṃ doṣānurāgavilayaṃ guṇasauhṛdaṃ ca // Jm_23.63 //
T09bsa032_u:3414: tvayi ca carati dharma bhūyasāyaṃ nṛlokaḥ sucaritasumukhaḥ syātsvargamārgapratiṣṭhaḥ /
T09bsa032_u:3416: śīlaṃ viśodhaya samarjaya dātṛkīrtiṃ maitraṃ manaḥ kuru jane svajane yathaiva /
T09bsa032_u:3417: dharmeṇa pālaya mahīṃ ciramapramādādevaṃ sameṣyasi sukhaṃ tridivaṃ yaśaśca // Jm_23.65 //
T09bsa032_u:3419: apālayañjānapadān balipradān nṛpo hi sarvauṣadhibhirvirudhyate // Jm_23.66 //
T09bsa032_u:3421: na pāti yaḥ śulkapathopakāriṇaṃ virodhamāyāti sa kośasaṃpadā // Jm_23.67 //
T09bsa032_u:3422: adṛṣṭadoṣaṃ yudhi dṛṣṭavikramaṃ tathā balaṃ yaḥ prathitāsrakauśalam /
T09bsa032_u:3424: vimānayed bhūpatiradhyupekṣayā dhruvaṃ viruddhaḥ sa raṇe jayaśriyā // Jm_23.68 //
T09bsa032_u:3427: drumadyathāmaṃ pracinoti yaḥ phalaṃ sa hanti bījaṃ na rasaṃ ca vindati /
T09bsa032_u:3428: adharmyamevaṃ balimuddharannṛpaḥ kṣiṇoti deśaṃ na ca tena nandati // Jm_23.70 //
T09bsa032_u:3429: yathā tu saṃpūrṇaguṇo mahoruhaḥ phalodayaṃ pākavaśātprayacchati /
T09bsa032_u:3430: tathaiva deśaḥ kṣitipābhirakṣito yunakti dharmārthasukhairnarādhipam // Jm_23.71 //
T09bsa032_u:3431: hitānamātyānnipuṇārthadarśinaḥ śucīni mitrāṇi janaṃ svameva ca /
T09bsa032_u:3432: badhāna cetassu tadiṣṭayā girā dhanaiśca saṃmānanayopapāditaiḥ // Jm_23.72 //
T09bsa032_u:3433: tasmāddharmaṃ tvaṃ puraskṛtya nityaṃ śreyaḥprāptau yuktacetāḥ prajānām /
T09bsa032_u:3434: rāgadveṣonmuktayā daṇḍanītyā rakṣaṃllokānātmano rakṣa lokān // Jm_23.73 //
T09bsa032_u:3435: iti sa mahātmā taṃ rājānaṃ dṛṣṭikṛtakāpathādvivecya samavatārya ca sanmārgaṃ saparṣatkaṃ
T09bsa032_u:3436: tata eva gaganatalaṃ samutpatya prāñjalinā tena janena sabahumānapraṇatena pratyarcyamānastadevāraṇyāyatanaṃ pratijagāma /
T09bsa032_u:3437: tadevamasatkṛtānāmapi satpuruṣāṇāṃ pūrvopakāriṣvanukampā na śithilībhavati kṛtajñatvātkṣamāsātmyācca /
T09bsa032_u:3439: evaṃ sa bhagavānanabhisaṃbuddho 'pi paravādānabhibhūya sattvavinayaṃ kṛtavāniti buddhavarṇe 'pi vācyam /
T09bsa032_u:3445: nātmaduḥkhena tathā santaḥ saṃtapyante yathāpakāriṇāṃ kuśalapakṣahānyā /
T09bsa032_u:3447: bodhisattvaḥ kila śrīmati himavatpārśve vividhadhāturuciracitrāṅgarāge nīlakauśeyaprāvārakṛtottarāsaṅga
T09bsa032_u:3451: tadavasthamapi cainamapariluptadharmasaṃjñaṃ kṛtajñamakṣudrasvabhāvaṃ dhṛtyā mahatyā samanvitamanurāgavaśādiva karuṇā naiva mumoca /
T09bsa032_u:3452: sakānanā sādrivarā sasāgarā gatā vināśaṃ śataśo vasuṃdharā /
T09bsa032_u:3454: atha sa mahātmā tāpasa iva vanaruparṇaphalamātravṛttiranukampamānastena tena vidhinā gocarapatitān prāṇinastamaraṇyapradeśamadhyavasati sma
T09bsa032_u:3455: athānyatamaḥ puruṣo gāṃ pranaṣṭāmanveṣituṃ kṛtodyogaḥ samantato 'nuvicaran mārgāpranaṣṭo digbhāgasaṃmūḍhamatiḥ paribhramaṃstaṃ deśamupajagāma
T09bsa032_u:3457: vṛkṣamūle niṣaṇṇo dadarśa paripākavaśādvicyutāni paripiñjarāṇi katicittindukīphalāni /
T09bsa032_u:3458: sa tānyāsvādya kṣutparikṣāmatayā paramasvādūni manyamānastatprabhavānveṣaṇaṃ pratyabhivṛddhotsāhaḥ
T09bsa032_u:3460: sa tatphalatṛṣṇayākṛṣyamāṇastaṃ giritaṭamadhiruhya tasya tindukīvṛkṣasya phaliniṃ śākhāṃ prapātābhinatāmadhyāruroha phalalobhena cāsyāḥ prāntamupajagāma
T09bsa032_u:3461: śākhātha sā tasya mahīruhasya bhārātiyogānnamitā kṛśatvāt /
T09bsa032_u:3462: paraśvadheneva nikṛttamūlā saśabdabhaṅgaṃ sahasā papāta // Jm_24.2 //
T09bsa032_u:3463: sa tayā sārdhaṃ mahati giridurge samantataḥ śailabhittiparikṣipte kūpa iva nyapatat /
T09bsa032_u:3465: sa tasmāduttīrya salilātsamantataḥ parisarpanna kutaściduttaraṇamārgaṃ dadarśa /
T09bsa032_u:3466: sa nispratīkāraṃ martavyamiha mayā nacirāditi visrasyamānajīvitāśaḥ śokāśrupariṣiktadīnavadanastrīvreṇa daurmanasyaśalyena pratudyamānaḥ kātarahṛdayastattadārtivaśād vilalāp /
T09bsa032_u:3469: yatnādapi parimṛgayan mṛtyoranyaḥ ka iva paśyet // Jm_24.3 //
T09bsa032_u:3473: tāmisrapakṣarajanīva ghanāndhakārā kaṣṭaṃ jaganmama tiraskurute 'ntarātriḥ // Jm_24.5 //
T09bsa032_u:3474: iti sa puruṣastattadvilapaṃstena salilena taiśca sahanipatitaistindukaphalairvartayamānaḥ katiciddināni tatrāvasat /
T09bsa032_u:3475: atha sa mahākapirāhārahetostadvanamanuvicarannāhūyamān iva mārutākampitābhistasya tindukīvṛkṣasyāgraśākhābhistaṃ pradeśamabhijagāma /
T09bsa032_u:3476: abhiruhya cainaṃ tatprapātamavalokayan dadarśa taṃ puruṣaṃ kṣutparikṣāmanayanavadanaṃ paripāṇḍukṛśadīnagātraṃ paryutsukaṃ tatra viceṣṭamānam
T09bsa032_u:3477: sa tasya paridyūnatayā samāvajitānukampo mahākapirnikṣiptāhāravyāpārastaṃ puruṣaṃ pratataṃ bikṣamāṇo mānuṣīṃ vācamuvāca -
T09bsa032_u:3479: vaktumahaṃsi tatsādhu ko bhavāhina vā kutaḥ // Jm_24.6 //
T09bsa032_u:3480: atha sa puruṣastaṃ mahākapimārtatayā samabhipraṇamyodvīkṣamāṇaḥ sāñjaliruvāca -
T09bsa032_u:3484: nātha vānarayūthānāṃ mamāpi śaraṇaṃ bhava // Jm_24.8 //
T09bsa032_u:3487: karoti śatrūnapi sānukampānākampayatyeva tu sānukampān // Jm_24.9 //
T09bsa032_u:3488: athainaṃ bodhisattvaḥ karuṇāyamāṇastatkāladurlabhena snigdhena vacasā samāśvāsayāmāsa -
T09bsa032_u:3491: yadbandhukṛtyaṃ tava kiṃcidatra kartāsmi tatsarvamalaṃ bhayena // Jm_24.10 //
T09bsa032_u:3492: iti sa mahāsattvastaṃ puruṣamāśvāsya tataścāsmai tindukānyaparāṇi ca phalāni samupahṛtya taduddharaṇayogyayā puruṣabhāragurvyā śilayānyatra yogyāṃ cakāra /
T09bsa032_u:3493: tataścātmano balapramāṇamavagamya śakto 'hamenametasmātprapātādurddhartumiti niścitamatiravatīrya prapātaṃ karuṇayā paricodyamānastaṃ puruṣamuvāca
T09bsa032_u:3494: ehi pṛṣṭhaṃ mamāruhya sulagno 'stu bhavān mayi /
T09bsa032_u:3496: asārasya śarīrasya sāro hyeṣa mataḥ satām /
T09bsa032_u:3499: athābhirūḍhaḥ sa nareṇa tena bharātiyogena vihanyamānaḥ /
T09bsa032_u:3503: atha bodhisattvaḥ śuddhasvabhāvatayā kṛtopakāratvācca tasmātpuruṣādapāyanirāśaṅko visrambhādenamuvāca -
T09bsa032_u:3505: khedaprasuptaṃ sahasā nihanti kaścitpurā māṃ svahitodayaṃ ca // Jm_24.15 //
T09bsa032_u:3506: yato bhavān dikṣuṃ vikīrṇacakṣuḥ karotu rakṣāṃ mama cātmanaśca /
T09bsa032_u:3509: atha sa mithyāvinayapragalbhaḥ - svapitu bhavān yathākāmaṃ sukhaprabodhāya,
T09bsa032_u:3511: atha sa puruṣastasmin mahāsattve śramabalānnidrāvaśamupagate cintāmaśivāmāpede -
T09bsa032_u:3513: evaṃ parikṣīṇatanoḥ kathaṃ syādyātrāpi tāvatkuta eva puṣṭiḥ // Jm_24.17 //
T09bsa032_u:3514: idaṃ ca kāntāramasupratāraṃ kathaṃ tariṣyāmi balena hīnaḥ /
T09bsa032_u:3515: paryāptarūpaṃ tvidamasya māṃsaṃ kāntāradurgottaraṇāya me syāt // Jm_24.18 //
T09bsa032_u:3516: kṛtopakāro 'pi ca bhakṣya eva nisargayogaḥ sa hi tādṛśo 'sya /
T09bsa032_u:3517: āpatprasiddhaśca kilaiṣa dharmaḥ pātheyatāmityupaneya eṣaḥ // Jm_24.19 //
T09bsa032_u:3519: imaṃ hi yuddhābhimukhaṃ sametya siṃho 'pi saṃbhāvyaparājayaḥ syāt // Jm_24.20 //
T09bsa032_u:3520: tannāyaṃ vilambituṃ me kāla iti viniścitya sa durātmā lobhadoṣavyāmohitamatirakṛtajño
T09bsa032_u:3525: sarvātmanā sā na samāsasāda mūrdhānamasmānna vinispipeṣa /
T09bsa032_u:3526: koṭyekadeśena tu taṃ rujantī śīlā tale sāśanivatpapāta // Jm_24.22 //
T09bsa032_u:3529: kenāhato 'smīti dadarśa nānyaṃ tameva tu hrītamukhaṃ dadarśa // Jm_24.23 //
T09bsa032_u:3532: atha sa mahākapirasyaiva tatkarmeti niscitamatiḥ svamabhighātaduḥkhamacintayitvā
T09bsa032_u:3536: kathaṃ nāma vyavasitaṃ prārabdhaṃ kathameva vā // Jm_24.25 //
T09bsa032_u:3549: dunoti māṃ naiva tathā tviyaṃ rujā yathaitadevātra manaḥ kṣiṇoti mām /
T09bsa032_u:3550: gato 'smi pāpe tava yannimittatāṃ na cāhamenastadapohituṃ prabhuḥ // Jm_24.32 //
T09bsa032_u:3552: saṃdṛśyamānavapureva tu pārśvato māṃ tatsādhvanuvraja dṛḍhaṃ hyasi śaṅkanīyaḥ /
T09bsa032_u:3554: ekākinaṃ kṣāmaśarīrakaṃ tvāṃ mārganabhijñaṃ hi vane bhramantam /
T09bsa032_u:3555: kaścitsamāsādya purā karoti tvatpīḍaṇādvyarthapariśramaṃ mām // Jm_24.34 //
T09bsa032_u:3556: iti sa mahātmā taṃ puruṣamanuśocañjanāntamānīya pratipādya cainaṃ tanmārgaṃ punaruvāca -
T09bsa032_u:3557: prāpto janāntamasi kānta vanāntametat kāntāradurgabhayamutsṛja gaccha sādhu /
T09bsa032_u:3558: pāpaṃ ca karma parivarjayituṃ yatethā duḥkho hi tasya niyamena vipākakālaḥ // Jm_24.35 //
T09bsa032_u:3559: iti sa mahākapistaṃ puruṣamanukampayā śiṣyamivānuśiṣya tameva vanapradeśaṃ pratijagāma /
T09bsa032_u:3560: atha sa puruṣastadatikasṭaṃ pāpaṃ kṛtvā paścāttāpavahninā saṃpradīpyamānacetāmahatā
T09bsa032_u:3563: sa yaṃ yaṃ deśamabhijagāma tatastata evainamatibībhatsavikṛtataradarśanaṃ mānuṣa
T09bsa032_u:3564: ityaśraddheyarūpaṃ bhinnadīnasvaramabhivīkṣya puruṣāḥ sākṣadayaṃ pāṣmeti manyamānāḥ
T09bsa032_u:3566: athainamanyatamo rājā mṛgayāmanuvicaran pretamivāraṇye paribhramantaṃ prakṣīṇamalinavasanaṃ nātipracchannakaupīnamatidurdaśanamabhivīkṣya sasādhvasakautūhalaḥ papraccha -
T09bsa032_u:3569: kastvaṃ pretaḥ piśāco vā mūrtaḥ pāṣmātha pūtanaḥ /
T09bsa032_u:3571: sa taṃ dīnena kaṇṭhena samabhipraṇamannuvāca - mānuso 'smi mahārāja,
T09bsa032_u:3573: tatkathamimāmavasthāmanuprāpto 'sīti ca paryanuyukto rājñā tadasmai svaṃ duścaritamāviṣkṛtyovāca -
T09bsa032_u:3581: vātsalyasaumyahṛdayastu suhṛtsu kīrtiṃ viśvāsabhāvamupakārasukhaṃ ca tebhyaḥ /
T09bsa032_u:3582: prāpnoti saṃnatiguṇaṃ manasaḥ praharṣaṃ durdharṣatāṃ ca pirubhistridaśālayaṃ ca // Jm_24.41 //
T09bsa032_u:3583: imaṃ viditvā nṛpa mitrapakṣe prabhāvasiddhī sadasatpravṛttyoḥ /
T09bsa032_u:3584: bhajasva mārga sujanābhipannaṃ tena prayātamanuyāti bhūtiḥ // Jm_24.42 //
T09bsa032_u:3585: tadevaṃ nātmaduḥkhena tathā santaḥ saṃtapyante yathāpakāriṇāṃ kuśalapakṣahānyā /
T09bsa032_u:3587: satkṛtya dharmaśravaṇe kṣāntikathāyāṃ mitrānabhidrohe pāpakarmādinavapradarśane ceti /
T09bsa032_u:3597: sa kāruṇyābhyāsādanabhidrugdhacittaḥ sattveṣu tṛṇaparṇasalilamātravṛttiḥ saṃtoṣaguṇādaraṇyavāsaniratamatiḥ pravivekakāma iva yogī tamaraṇyapradeśamabhyalaṃcakāra
T09bsa032_u:3599: cacāra tasmin sa vane vivikte yogīva saṃtuṣṭamatistṛṇāgraiḥ // Jm_25.1 //
T09bsa032_u:3601: jijñāsamānaḥ saṃrāgavaśājjavena mṛgānanupatannuttamajavena vājinā dūrādapasṛtahastyaśvarathapadātikāyastaṃ pradeśamupajagāma /
T09bsa032_u:3602: dūradeva cālokya taṃ mahāsattvaṃ hantumutpatitaniścayaḥ samutkṛṣṭaniśitasāyako yataḥ sa mahātmā tena turagavaraṃ saṃcodayāmāsa /
T09bsa032_u:3603: atha bodhisattvaḥ samālokyaiva turagavaragataṃ sāyudhamabhipatantaṃ taṃ rājānaṃ śaktimānapi pratyavasthātuṃ nivṛttasāhasasaṃrambhatvātpareṇa javātiśayena samutpapāta /
T09bsa032_u:3604: so 'nugamyamānastena turaṃgameṇānumārgāgataṃ mahacchvabhraṃ goṣpadamiva javena laṅghayitvā pradudrāva /
T09bsa032_u:3605: atha turagavarastenaiva mārgeṇa taṃ śarabhamanupatannuttamena javapramāṇena tacchvabhramāsādya laṅgayitumanadhyavasitamatiḥ sahasā vyatiṣṭhata
T09bsa032_u:3607: papāta mahati svabhre daityayodha ivodadhau // Jm_25.2 //
T09bsa032_u:3608: nibaddhacakṣuḥ śarabhe sa tasmin saṃlakṣayāmāsa na taṃ prapātam /
T09bsa032_u:3610: atha bodhisattvasturagakhuraśabdapraśamātkiṃ nu khalu pratinivṛttaḥ syādayaṃ rājeti
T09bsa032_u:3611: samutpannavitarkaḥ paścādāvarjitāvadanaḥ samālokayan dadarśa tamaśvamanārohakaṃ tasmin
T09bsa032_u:3613: tasya buddhirabhavat - niyatamatra prapāte nipatitaḥ sa rājā /
T09bsa032_u:3614: na hyatra kiṃcidviśramahetoḥ saṃśrayaṇīyarūpaṃ ghanapracchāyaṃ vṛkṣamūlamasti nīlotpaladalanīlavimalasalilamavagāhayogyaṃ vā saraḥ /
T09bsa032_u:3615: na caiva vyālamṛgānuvicaritamaraṇyavanamavagāḍhena yatra kvacidupasṛjya turagavaraṃ (Vaidya 170)
T09bsa032_u:3617: na cātra kiṃcittṛṇagahanamapi tadvidhaṃ yatra nilīnaḥ syāt /
T09bsa032_u:3618: tadvyaktamātra śvabhre nipatitena tena rājñā bhavitavyamiti /
T09bsa032_u:3619: tataḥ sa mahātmā niścayamupetya vadhake 'pi tasmin parāṃ karuṇāmupajagāma /
T09bsa032_u:3625: murchānvitaḥ śokaparāyaṇo vā kaṣṭaṃ bata kleśamayaṃ prapannaḥ // Jm_25.6 //
T09bsa032_u:3626: kiṇāṅkitānīva manāṃsi duḥkhairna hīnavargasya tathā vyathante /
T09bsa032_u:3629: yadyapi sāvaśeṣaprāṇastannāyamupekṣituṃ yuktamiti vitarkayan sa mahātmā karuṇayā samākṛṣyamāṇahṛdayastaṃ prapātataṭāntamupajagāma /
T09bsa032_u:3630: dadarśa cainaṃ tatra reṇusaṃsargānmṛditavārabāṇaśobhaṃ vyākulitoṣṇīṣavasanasaṃnāhaṃ prapātapatananighātasaṃjānītābhirvedanābhirāpīḍyamānahṛdayamāpatitavaitānyaṃ viceṣṭamānam /
T09bsa032_u:3631: dṛṣṭvāya taṃ tatra viceṣṭamānaṃ narādhipaṃ bāṣpaparītanetraḥ /
T09bsa032_u:3634: āśvāsayan spaṣṭapadena sāmnā śiṣṭopacāreṇa manohareṇa // Jm_25.9 //
T09bsa032_u:3637: kaccinna te vikṣatamatra gātraṃ kaccidrujaste tanutāṃ gacchanti // Jm_25.10 //
T09bsa032_u:3640: prapātapātādadhṛtiṃ ca mā gāḥ śakto 'hamuddhartumito bhavantam /
T09bsa032_u:3641: visrambhitavyaṃ mayi manyase cettatkipramājñāpaya yāvadaimi // Jm_25.12 //
T09bsa032_u:3642: atha sa rājā tena tasyādbhatenābhivyāhāreṇa vismayāvarjitahṛdayaḥ saṃjāyamānavrīḍo niyatamiti cintāmāpede -
T09bsa032_u:3643: dṛṣṭāvadāne dviṣati kā nāmāsya dayā mayi /
T09bsa032_u:3646: ahameva mṛgo gaurvā ko 'pyayaṃ śarabhākṛtiḥ // Jm_25.14 //
T09bsa032_u:3649: prapātaniṣpeṣakṛtāḥ sahyā eva ca me rujaḥ // Jm_25.15 //
T09bsa032_u:3653: avijñāya svabhāvaṃ te tacca mā hṛdaye kṛthāḥ // Jm_25.17 //
T09bsa032_u:3654: atha śarabhastasya rājñaḥ prītisūcakena tenābhivyāhāreṇānumatamuddharaṇamavetya puruṣabhāragurvyā
T09bsa032_u:3655: śīlayā taduddharaṇayogyāṃ kṛtvā viditātmabalapramāṇastaṃ nṛpatimuddhartuṃ vyavasitamatiravatīrya
T09bsa032_u:3659: yāvatkaromi svahitābhipattyā prītiprasādābhimukhaṃ mukhaṃ te // Jm_25.18 //
T09bsa032_u:3660: tadārohatu matpuṣṭhaṃ mahārājaḥ sulagnaśca mayi bhavatviti /
T09bsa032_u:3664: uddhṛtya durgādatha taṃ narendraṃ prītaḥ samānīya turaṃgameṇa /
T09bsa032_u:3665: nivedya cāsmai svapurāya mārgaṃ vanaprayāṇābhimukho babhūva // Jm_25.20 //
T09bsa032_u:3666: atha sa rājā kṛtajñatvāttena tasya vinayamadhureṇopacāreṇa samāvartitahṛdayaḥ saṃpariṣvajya śarabhamuvāca -
T09bsa032_u:3667: prāṇā amī me śarabha tvadīyāḥ prāgeva yatrāsti mama prabhutvam /
T09bsa032_u:3668: tadarhasi draṣṭumidaṃ puraṃ me satyāṃ rucau tatra ca te 'stu vāsaḥ // Jm_25.21 //
T09bsa032_u:3670: hitvā bhavantaṃ mama nanvayuktamekasya gehābhimukhasya gantum // Jm_25.22 //
T09bsa032_u:3674: abhyāsayogena hi sajjanasya svabhāvatāmeva guṇā vrajanti // Jm_25.23 //
T09bsa032_u:3676: tenālamanyaddhi sukhaṃ narāṇāmanyādṛśaṃ jātyucitaṃ mṛgāṇām // Jm_25.24 //
T09bsa032_u:3678: cikīrṣite te yadi matpriyaṃ tu vyādhavrataṃ vīra vimuñca tasmāt /
T09bsa032_u:3679: tiryaktvabhavājjaḍacetaneṣu kṛpaiva śocyeṣu mṛgeṣu yuktā // Jm_25.25 //
T09bsa032_u:3681: ityātmanaḥ syādanabhīpsitaṃ yanna tatpareṣvācarituṃ kṣamaṃ te // Jm_25.26 //
T09bsa032_u:3682: kīrtikṣayaṃ sādhujanādvigarhāṃ duḥkhaṃ ca pāpaprabhavaṃ viditvā /
T09bsa032_u:3683: pāpaṃ dviṣatpakṣamivoddharasva nopekṣituṃ vyādhiriva kṣamaṃ te // Jm_25.27 //
T09bsa032_u:3685: tānyeva puṇyāni vivardhayethā na karśanīyo hyupakāripakṣaḥ // Jm_25.28 //
T09bsa032_u:3687: bhūteṣu cātmani yathā hitabuddhisiddhyā puṇyāni saṃcinu yaśaḥ sukhasādhanāni // Jm_25.29 //
T09bsa032_u:3688: iti sa mahātmā taṃ rājānaṃ dṛḍhaṃ sāṃparāyikeṣvartheṣvanugṛhya saṃpratigṛhītavacanastena rājñā sabahumānamabhivīkṣyamāṇastameva vanāntaṃ praviveśa
T09bsa032_u:3689: tadevaṃ jighāṃsumapyāpadgatamanukampanta eva mahākārūṇikā nopekṣanta iti karuṇāvarṇe 'pi vācyam /
T09bsa032_u:3692: evaṃ tiryaggatānāmapi mahātmanāṃ vadhakeṣvapi sānukrodhā pravṛttirdṛṣṭā /
T09bsa032_u:3693: ko manuṣyabhūtaḥ pravrajitapratijño vā sattveṣvanukrośavikalaṃ śobheteti prāṇiṣu sānukrośenāryeṇa bhavitavyam /
T09bsa032_u:3706: paramadarśanīyarūpo ratnākara iva pādacārī rurumṛgo babhūva /
T09bsa032_u:3707: sa jānānaḥ svasya vapuṣo 'tilobhanīyatāṃ tanukāruṇyatāṃ ca janasya nirjanasaṃpāteṣu vanagahaneṣvabhireme,
T09bsa032_u:3709: samyak pariharannanugāminaṃ ca mṛgasārthamavabodhayannācārya iva piteva ca mṛgāṇāmādhipatyaṃ cakāra /
T09bsa032_u:3711: svahitānveṣiṇi jane kutra nāma na pūjyate // Jm_26.1 //
T09bsa032_u:3712: atha sa kadācinmahātmā tasmin vanagahane vāsopagatastatsamīpavāhinyā navāmbupurṇayā mahavegayā nadyā hriyamāṇasya puruṣasyākranditaśabdaṃ śuśrāva
T09bsa032_u:3714: abhidhāvata dīnavatsalāḥ kṛpaṇaṃ tārayituṃ javena mām // Jm_26.2 //
T09bsa032_u:3716: na ca gādhamavāpyate kvacittadayaṃ māṃ samayo 'bhidhāvitum // Jm_26.3 //
T09bsa032_u:3717: atha bodhisattvastena tasya karuṇenākranditaśabdena hṛdiva samabhihanyamāno mā bhairmā
T09bsa032_u:3720: dūrata eva ca taṃ puruṣamiṣṭamivopāyanamānīyamānaṃ salilaughena dadarśa /
T09bsa032_u:3723: sa tāṃ nadīṃ bhīmarayāṃ jagāhevimokṣobhayan vīra ivārisenām // Jm_26.4 //
T09bsa032_u:3724: āvṛtya mārga vapuṣātha tasya māmāśrayasveti tamabhyuvāca /
T09bsa032_u:3727: sattvocchrayādaskhalitoruvīryaḥ kūlaṃ yayau tasya manonukūlam // Jm_26.6 //
T09bsa032_u:3728: prāpayya tīramatha taṃ puruṣaṃ pareṇa prītyudgamena vinivartitakhedaduḥkham /
T09bsa032_u:3729: svenoṣmaṇā samapanīya ca śītamasya gaccheti taṃ sa visasarja nivedya mārgam // Jm_26.7 //
T09bsa032_u:3730: atha sa puruṣaḥ snigdhabāndhavasuhṛjjanadurlabhena tena tasyādbhutenābhyupapattisaumukheyan
T09bsa032_u:3731: samāvarjitahṛdayastayā cāsya rūpaśobhayā samutthāpyamānavismayabahumānaḥ praṇamyainaṃ tattatpriyamuvāca -
T09bsa032_u:3733: nālaṃ kartumidaṃ karma madarthe yatkṛtaṃ tvayā // Jm_26.8 //
T09bsa032_u:3735: svalpe 'pi viniyujyeran sa me syadatyanugrahaḥ // Jm_26.9 //
T09bsa032_u:3739: na citrarūpā sujane kṛtajñatā nisargasiddhaiva hi tasya sā sthitiḥ /
T09bsa032_u:3740: jagattu dṛṣṭvā samudīrṇavikriyaṃ kṛtajñatāpyadya guṇeṣu gaṇyate // Jm_26.11 //
T09bsa032_u:3742: yatastvāṃ bravīmi kṛtamidamanusmaratā bhavatā nāyamarthaḥ kasmaicinnivedyaḥ īdṛśenāsmi sattvaviśeṣeṇottārita iti /
T09bsa032_u:3747: na hi mitreṣvabhidrohaḥ kvacidbhavati bhūtaye // Jm_26.12 //
T09bsa032_u:3753: sa tatheti pratiśrutya praṇamya pradakṣiṇīkṛtya ca taṃ mahāsattvaṃ svagṛhamabhyajagāma /
T09bsa032_u:3754: tena khalu samayena tatrānyatamasya rājño devī satyasvapnā babhūva /
T09bsa032_u:3757: sā kathācinnidrāvaśamupagatā pratyuṣasamaye svapnaṃ paśyati sma sarvaratnasamāhāramiva
T09bsa032_u:3758: śriyā jvalantaṃ siṃhāsanasthaṃ rurumṛgaṃ sarājikayā parṣadā parivṛtaṃ vispaṣṭākṣarapadanyasena
T09bsa032_u:3760: vismayā kṣiptahṛdayā ca bhartuḥ prabodhapaṭahadhvaninā saha sā vyabudhyata /
T09bsa032_u:3764: nivedya ca taṃ svapnātiśayaṃ rājñe sādaraṃ punaruvāca -
T09bsa032_u:3765: tatsādhu tāvatkiryatāṃ mṛgasya tasyopalambhaṃ prati deva yatnaḥ /
T09bsa032_u:3766: antaḥpuraṃ ratnamṛgeṇa tena tārāmṛgeṇeva nabho virājet // Jm_26.15 //
T09bsa032_u:3767: atha sa rājā dṛṣṭapratyayastasyāḥ svapnadarśanasya pratigṛhya tadvacanaṃ tatpriyakāmyayā ratnamṛgādhigamalobhācca tasya mṛgasyānveṣaṇārthaṃ sarvaṃ vyādhagaṇaṃ samādideśa /
T09bsa032_u:3770: hemacchavirmaṇiśatairiva citragātraḥ khyāto mṛgaḥ śrutiṣu dṛṣṭacaraśca kaiścit /
T09bsa032_u:3771: yastaṃ pradarśayati tasya dadāti rājā grāmottamaṃ paridaśā rucirāḥ striyaśca // Jm_26.16 //
T09bsa032_u:3772: atha sa puruṣastāṃ ghoṣaṇāṃ punaḥ punarupaśrutya -
T09bsa032_u:3773: dāridryaduḥkhagaṇanaparikhinnacetāḥ smṛtvā ca taṃ rurumṛgasya mahopakāram /
T09bsa032_u:3774: lobhena tena ca kṛtena vikṛṣyamāṇo dolāyamānahṛdayo vimamarśa tattat // Jm_26.17 //
T09bsa032_u:3782: athāsya lobhākulitamaterevamabhūt - śakyamadhigatavipuladhanasamṛddhinā svajanamitrātithipraṇayijanasaṃmānanapareṇa sukhānyanubhavatā paro 'pi lokaḥ saṃpādayitum /
T09bsa032_u:3783: iti niścitamatirvismṛtya taṃ rurumṛgasyopakāraṃ samupetya rājānamuvāca - ahaṃ deva taṃ mṛgavaramadhivāsaṃ cāsya jānāmi /
T09bsa032_u:3785: tacchrutvā sa rājā pramuditamanāḥ - mamaivainaṃ bhadra pradarśayetyuktvā mṛgayāprayāṇānurūpaṃ
T09bsa032_u:3786: veṣamāsthāya mahatā balakāyena parivṛtaḥ puravarānnirgamya tena puruṣeṇādeśyamānamārgastaṃ
T09bsa032_u:3788: parikṣipya ca tadvanagahanaṃ samagreṇa balakāyena dhanvī hastāvāpi vyavasitāptapuruṣaparivṛtaḥ sa rājā tenaiva puruṣeṇādeśyamānamārgastadvanagahanamanupraviveśa
T09bsa032_u:3789: atha sa puruṣastaṃ rurumṛgaṃ viśvastasthitamālokya pradarśayāmāsa rājñe - ayamayaṃ deva sa mṛgavaraḥ /
T09bsa032_u:3795: labdhaprayāmāṇi vipakṣamāndyātkarmāṇi sadyaḥ phalatāṃ vrajanti // Jm_26.19 //
T09bsa032_u:3796: atha sa rājā tatpradarśitena mārgeṇa rurusaṃdarśanakutūhale nayane vicikṣepa /
T09bsa032_u:3799: guṇairuruṃ taṃ sa ruruṃ dadarśa śātahnadaṃ vahnimivābhramakṣe // Jm_26.20 //
T09bsa032_u:3802: atha bodhisattvaḥ samantato janakolāhalamupaśrutya vyaktaṃ samantātparivṛtto 'smīti
T09bsa032_u:3803: niścitamatirvyaddhukāmamupārūḍhaṃ cāvetya rājānaṃ nāyamapayānakāla iti viditvā viśadapadākṣareṇa
T09bsa032_u:3808: asāvatra mṛgo 'stīti ko nu te māṃ nyavedayat // Jm_26.23 //
T09bsa032_u:3809: atha sa rājā tasyādbhūtena mānuṣeṇābhivyāhāreṇa bhṛśataramāvarjitahṛdayastamasmai puruṣaṃ śarāgreṇa nirdideśa - ayamasyātyadbhutasya no darśayiteti
T09bsa032_u:3810: atha bodhisattvastaṃ puruṣaṃ pratyabhijñāya vigarhamāṇa uvāca - kaṣṭaṃ bhoḥ /
T09bsa032_u:3814: ātmano 'pi na dṛṣṭo 'yaṃ hitasyāpanayaḥ katham // Jm_26.25 //
T09bsa032_u:3815: atha sa rājā kiṃ nu khalvayamevaṃ vijugupsata iti samutpannakautūhalaḥ sāvegastaṃ rurumuvāca -
T09bsa032_u:3817: tvadidaṃ samupaśrutya sākampamiva me manaḥ // Jm_26.26 //
T09bsa032_u:3819: manuṣyamamanuṣyaṃ vā pakṣiṇaṃ mṛgameva vā // Jm_26.27 //
T09bsa032_u:3821: nāyaṃ vigarhādara eva rājan kutsārhametattvavagamya karma /
T09bsa032_u:3822: nāyaṃ punaḥ kartumiti vyavasyettīkṣṇākṣaraṃ tena mayaivamuktam // Jm_26.28 //
T09bsa032_u:3824: ko hi kṣate kṣāramivāvasiñced rūkṣākṣaraṃ viskhaliteṣu vākyam /
T09bsa032_u:3825: priye tu putre 'pi cikitsakasya pravartate vyādhivaśāccikitsā // Jm_26.29 //
T09bsa032_u:3827: tato bhayaṃ māṃ nṛvaredamāgataṃ na khalvasatsaṃgatamasti bhūtaye // Jm_26.30 //
T09bsa032_u:3828: atha sa rājā taṃ puruṣaṃ tīkṣṇayā dṛṣṭyā nirbhartsanarūkṣamavekṣyovāca - satyamare re purā tvamanenaivamāpanno 'bhyuddhṛta iti?
T09bsa032_u:3829: atha sa puruṣaḥ samāpatitabhayaviṣādasvedavaivarṇyadainyo hrīmandaṃ satyamityavocat /
T09bsa032_u:3830: atha sa rājā dhik tvāmityenamavabhartysayan dhanuṣi śaraṃ saṃdhāyābravīt - mā tāvadbhoḥ
T09bsa032_u:3831: evaṃvidhenāpi pariśrameṇa mṛdūkṛtaṃ yasya na nāma cetaḥ /
T09bsa032_u:3834: atha bodhisattvaḥ karuṇayā mahatyā samuparudhyamānahṛdayastadantarā sthitvā rājānamuvāca - alamalaṃ mahārāja hataṃ hatvā /
T09bsa032_u:3836: hatastadeveha yaśaḥparikṣayād dhruvaṃ paratrāpi ca dharmasaṃkṣayāt // Jm_26.32 //
T09bsa032_u:3838: pralobhyamānāḥ phalasampadāśayā pataṃgamūrkhā iva dīpaśobhayā // Jm_26.33 //
T09bsa032_u:3839: ataḥ kṛpāmatra kurūṣva mā ruṣaṃ yadīpsitaṃ caivamanena kiṃcana /
T09bsa032_u:3840: kiruṣva tenainamavandhyasāhasaṃ sthitaṃ tvadājñāpravaṇaṃ hi me śiraḥ // Jm_26.34 //
T09bsa032_u:3842: atha sa rājā tena tasyāpakāriṇyapi sadayatvenākṛtakena ca tatpratyupakārādareṇa paramavismitamatirjātaprasādaḥ sabahumānamudīkṣamāṇastaṃ ruruvaramuvāca - sādhu sādhu mahābhāga
T09bsa032_u:3845: yenānukampyastu tavaiṣa jālmo hetuśca naḥ sajjanadarśanasya /
T09bsa032_u:3846: dadāmi tenepsitamarthamasmai rājye tavāsmiṃśca yatheṣṭacāram // Jm_26.36 //
T09bsa032_u:3848: tadājñāpaya yāvadiha saṃgamanaprayojanena tavopayogaṃ gacchāma iti /
T09bsa032_u:3849: atha sa rājā taṃ ruruṃ gurumiva rathavaramāropya mahatā satkāreṇa puravaraṃ praveśya
T09bsa032_u:3850: kṛtātithisatkāraṃ mahati siṃhāsane niveśya samutsāhayamānaḥ sāntaḥpuro 'mātyagaṇaparivṛtaḥ
T09bsa032_u:3852: dharmaṃ prati manuṣyāṇāṃ bahudhā buddhayo gatāḥ /
T09bsa032_u:3853: niścayastava dharme tu yathā taṃ vaktumarhasi // Jm_26.37 //
T09bsa032_u:3854: atha bodhisattvastasya rājñaḥ saparṣatkasya sphuṭamadhuracitrākṣareṇa vacasā dharmaṃ deśayāmāsa -
T09bsa032_u:3855: dayāṃ sattveṣu manye 'haṃ dharmaṃ saṃkṣepato nṛpa /
T09bsa032_u:3858: ātmanīva dayā syāccetsvajane vā yathā jane /
T09bsa032_u:3863: suvṛṣṭiriva sasyāni guṇān sā hi prasūyate // Jm_26.41 //
T09bsa032_u:3865: śucau tasmin vāṇī vrajati vikṛtaṃ naiva ca tanuḥ /
T09bsa032_u:3870: dayāvān viśvāsyo bhavati jagatāṃ bāndhava iva /
T09bsa032_u:3872: na kopāgniścitte jvalati hi dayātoyaśiśire // Jm_26.43 //
T09bsa032_u:3873: saṃkṣepeṇa dayāmataḥ sthiratayā paśyanti dharmaṃ buddhāḥ
T09bsa032_u:3874: ko nāmāsti guṇaḥ sa sādhudayito yo nānuyāto dayām /
T09bsa032_u:3875: tasmātputra ivātmanīva ca dayāṃ nītvā prakarṣaṃ jane
T09bsa032_u:3877: atha sa rājā samabhinandya tattasya vacanaṃ sayaurajānapado dharmaparāyaṇo babhūva /
T09bsa032_u:3892: sa tatra mahāntaṃ nyagrodhapādapaṃ parvataśikharamiva vyomollikhantamadhipatimiva
T09bsa032_u:3897: tasya tu vanaspaterekā śākhā tatsamīpagāṃ nimnagāmabhi praṇatābhavat /
T09bsa032_u:3898: atha bodhisattvo dīrghadarśitvāttadvānarayūthaṃ samanuśaśāsa - asyāṃ nyogrodhaśākhāyāmaphalāyāmakṛtāyāṃ na vaḥ kena cidanyataḥ phalamupabhoktavyamiti
T09bsa032_u:3899: atha kadācittasyāṃ śākhāyāṃ pipīlikābhiḥ parṇapuṭāvacchāditaṃ taruṇatvānnātimahadekaṃ phalaṃ na te vānarā dadṛśuḥ /
T09bsa032_u:3900: tatkrameṇābhivardhamānaṃ varṇagandharasamārdavopapannaṃ paripākavaśācchithilabandhanaṃ tasyāṃ nadyāṃ nipapāta /
T09bsa032_u:3901: anupūrveṇa vāhyamāna nadīstrotasā 'nyatamasya rājñaḥ sāntaḥpurasya tasyāṃ nadyāṃ salilakrīḍāmanubhavato jālakaraṇḍakapārśve vyāsajyata /
T09bsa032_u:3903: visarpiṇā svena tiraścakāra ghrāṇābhirāmeṇa guṇodayena // Jm_27.2 //
T09bsa032_u:3908: jālakaraṇḍakapārśvato vilagnamavekṣya kimidamiti tadāvarjitanayanāḥ samapdyanta saha rājñā /
T09bsa032_u:3909: atha sa rājā tatphalamānāyya prātyayikavaidyajanaparidṛṣṭaṃ svayamāsvādayāmāsa /
T09bsa032_u:3914: atha tasya rājñaḥ svādurasabhojanasamucitasyāpi tadrasasaṃrāgavaśagasyaitada bhavat -
T09bsa032_u:3915: yo nāma nāmūni phalāni bhuṅkte sa kāni rājyasya phalāni bhuṅkte /
T09bsa032_u:3916: yasyānnametattu ca eva rājā vinaiva rājatvapariśrameṇa // Jm_27.6 //
T09bsa032_u:3917: sa tatprabhavānveṣaṇakṛtamatiḥ svabuddhyā vimamarśavyaktamayaṃ taruvara ito nātidūre
T09bsa032_u:3919: ca yataḥ śakyamasya prabhavo 'dhigantumiti niścayamupetya tadrasatṛṣṇayā ākṛṣyamāṇo
T09bsa032_u:3920: viramya jalakrīḍāyāḥ samyak puravare sve rakṣāvidhānaṃ saṃdiśya yātrāsajjena mahatā
T09bsa032_u:3922: krameṇa cotsādayan saśvāpadagaṇāni vanagahanāni samanubhavaṃ ścatrāṇi rasāntarāṇi
T09bsa032_u:3927: paripakvasahakāraphalasurabhitareṇa ca nirhāriṇā atimanojñena gandhena pratyudgata iva tasya pādapasya ayaṃ sa vanaspatiriti niścayamupajagāma
T09bsa032_u:3929: atha sa rājā samabhilaṣitārthavipralopinastān vānarān pratyabhikruddhamatiḥ - hata hataitān /
T09bsa032_u:3930: vidhvaṃsayata vināśayata sarvān vānarajālmāniti saparuṣākṣaraṃ svān puruṣānādideśa /
T09bsa032_u:3931: atha te rājapuruṣāḥ sajyacāpabāṇavyagrakarāgrā vānarāvabhartsanamukharāḥ samudyataloṣṭadaṇḍaśastrāścāpare (Vaidya 184)
T09bsa032_u:3936: samāśvāsya tadvānarayūthaṃ tatparitrāṇavyavasitamatirabhiruhya tasya vanaspateḥ śikharaṃ
T09bsa032_u:3938: athānekapraskandanakramaprāpyamapi taṃ giritaṭaṃ sa mahāsattvaḥ svavīryātiśayātkhaga ivādhiruroha /
T09bsa032_u:3941: kṛpayābhivivardhitaḥ sa tasya vyavasāyaḥ paṭutāṃ jagāma śauryāt /
T09bsa032_u:3942: sa ca yatnaviśeṣamasya cakre manasaivātha jagāma yatnataikṣṇyāt // Jm_27.9 //
T09bsa032_u:3943: adhiruhya ca gireruccataraṃ tātapradeśaṃ tadantarālādhikapramāṇayā mahatyā virūḍhayā 'śithilamūlayā dṛḍhayā vetralatayā gāḍhamābadhya caraṇau punastaṃ vanaspatiṃ pracaskandaḥ /
T09bsa032_u:3944: viprakṛṣṭatvāttu tasyāntarālasya caraṇabandhanavyākulatvācca sa mahāsattvaḥ kathaṃcittasya vanaspateragraśākhāṃ karābhyāṃ samāsasāda /
T09bsa032_u:3945: tataḥ samālambya dṛḍhaṃ sa śākhāmātatya tāṃ vetralatāṃ ca yatnāt /
T09bsa032_u:3949: gātraṃ yayau svaiḥ piśitairviyogaṃ na tveva dhairyātiśayena cetaḥ // Jm_27.11 //
T09bsa032_u:3951: taddṛṣṭvā sa rājā te ca rājapuruṣāḥ parāṃ vismayavaktavyatāmupajagmuḥ /
T09bsa032_u:3953: āścaryabuddhiṃ janayecchrutāpi pratyakṣataḥ kiṃ punarīkṣyamāṇā // Jm_27.12 //
T09bsa032_u:3955: dṛḍhaṃ pariśrānto vyaktamayaṃ vānarādhipatiḥ na cāya mataḥ śakṣyati svayamātmānaṃ saṃhartum,
T09bsa032_u:3956: tacchrīghramasyādhaḥ paṭavitānaṃ vitatya vitralateyaṃ ca nyagrodhaśākhā śārābhyāṃ yugapatpracchidyetāmiti /
T09bsa032_u:3958: athainaṃ sa rājā śanakairvitānādavatārya murchayā vraṇavedanāklamopajātayā samākramyamāṇacetasaṃ mṛduni śayanīye saṃveśayāmāsa /
T09bsa032_u:3959: sadyaḥkṣatapraśamanayogyaiśca sarpirādibhirasya vraṇānyabhyajya mandībhūtapariśramaṃ samāśvastamenamabhyupagamya sa rājā sakautūhalavismayabahumānaḥ kuśalaparipraśnapūrvakamuvāca -
T09bsa032_u:3960: gatvā svayaṃ saṃkramatāmamīṣāṃ svajīvite tyaktadayena bhutvā /
T09bsa032_u:3961: samuddhṛtā ye kapayastvayeme ko nu tvameṣāṃ tava vā ka ete // Jm_27.13 //
T09bsa032_u:3963: na hyalpasauhārdanibandhanānāmevaṃ manāṃsi prataranti kartum // Jm_27.14 //
T09bsa032_u:3964: atha bodhisattvastasya rājñastadabhyupapattisaumukhyaṃ pratipūjayannātmanivedanamanuguṇena krameṇa cakāra -
T09bsa032_u:3968: samānajātitvamayī ca maitrī jñāteyajātā sahavāsayogāt // Jm_27.16 //
T09bsa032_u:3970: tacchrutvā sa rājā paraṃ vismayamupetya punarenamuvāca -
T09bsa032_u:3977: prāgeva bhaktyunmukhamānasamya gatasya bandhupriyatāṃ janasya // Jm_27.18 //
T09bsa032_u:3978: idaṃ ca dṛṣṭvā vyasanārtidainyaṃ śākhāmṛgān pratyabhivardhamānam /
T09bsa032_u:3985: tataḥ karābhyāṃ samavāpamasya prasāritaṃ prasāritaṃ pāṇimivāgraśākhām // Jm_27.22 //
T09bsa032_u:3986: samātatāṅgaṃ latayā tayā ca śākṣāgrahastena ca pādapasya /
T09bsa032_u:3987: amī madadhyākramaṇe viśaṅkā niśritya māṃ svasti gatāḥ svayūthyāḥ // Jm_27.23 //
T09bsa032_u:3988: atha sa rājā pramodyajātaṃ tasyāmapyavasthāyāṃ taṃ mahāsattvamavekṣya paraṃ vismayamudvahan punarenamuvāca -
T09bsa032_u:3991: ityātmani samāropya prāptaḥ ko bhavatā guṇaḥ // Jm_27.24 //
T09bsa032_u:3993: kāmaṃ śarīraṃ kṣitipa kṣataṃ me manaḥ parasvāsthyamupāgataṃ tu /
T09bsa032_u:3994: akāri yeṣāṃ ciramādhipatyaṃ teṣāṃ mayārtirvinivartiteti // Jm_27.25 //
T09bsa032_u:3996: vīrā yathā vikramacihnaśobhāṃ prītyā tathemāṃ rujamudvahāmi // Jm_27.26 //
T09bsa032_u:3999: tanmāṃ tapatyeṣa na duḥkhayogaḥ suhṛdviyogaḥ sukhaviplavo vā /
T09bsa032_u:4000: krameṇa cānena amabhyupeto mahotsavābhyāgama eṣa mṛtyuḥ // Jm_27.28 //
T09bsa032_u:4002: pūjā nṛpānnirbhayatā ca mṛtyoḥ kṛtajñabhāvād grahaṇaṃ ca satsu // Jm_27.29 //
T09bsa032_u:4003: ete guṇāḥ sadguṇavāsavṛkṣa prāptā mayaitad vyasanaṃ prapadya /
T09bsa032_u:4004: eṣāṃ vipakṣāṃstu samabhyupaiti dayāvihīno nṛpatiḥ śriteṣu // Jm_27.30 //
T09bsa032_u:4006: gatirbhavettasya ca nama kānyā jvālākulebhyo narakānalebhyaḥ // Jm_27.31 //
T09bsa032_u:4009: dharmeṇa tasmādanuśādhi rājyaṃ strīcañcalapremaguṇā hi lakṣmīḥ // Jm_27.32 //
T09bsa032_u:4011: sarvān sukhena prayateta yoktuṃ hitānukūlena piteva rājā // Jm_27.33 //
T09bsa032_u:4012: evaṃ hi dharmārthayaśaḥsamṛddhiḥ syātte sukhāyeha paratra caiva /
T09bsa032_u:4014: iti nṛpamanuśiṣya śisyavad bahumatavākprayatena tena saḥ /
T09bsa032_u:4018: na samarthāstathā svārthamapi pratipattuṃ sattvā yathā parārthaṃ pratipannavān sa bhagavāniti tathāgatavarṇe 'pi vācyam /
T09bsa032_u:4032: tamaskhalitasamādānaṃ kṣāntivarṇavādinaṃ tadanurūpadharmākhyānakramaṃ vyatītya sve nāmagotre kṣāntivādinamityeva lokaḥ svabuddhipūrvakaṃ saṃjajñe
T09bsa032_u:4036: cakāra yatkṣāntikathāḥ prasaktaṃ tatkṣāntivādīti tato vijajñe // Jm_28.2 //
T09bsa032_u:4038: tadarthayuktāśca kathāviśeṣāḥ kīrtyā muniṃ taṃ prathayāṃbabhūvuḥ // Jm_28.3 //
T09bsa032_u:4041: tanmaṅgalyaṃ manojñaṃ ca tattīrthaṃ tattapovanam // Jm_28.4 //
T09bsa032_u:4045: atha kadācittatastyo rājā grīṣmakālaprabhāvādabhilaṣaṇīyatarāṃ salilakrīḍāṃ prati samutsukamatirudyānaguṇātiśayaniketabhūtaṃ taṃ vanapradeśaṃ sāntaḥpuraḥ samabhijagāma /
T09bsa032_u:4048: alaṃcakāreva caran vilāsī vibhūtimatyā lalitānuvṛttyā // Jm_28.5 //
T09bsa032_u:4054: tṛptiryathāsītkusumairna tāsāṃ tathaiva nāsāṃ lalitairnṛpasya // Jm_28.8 //
T09bsa032_u:4056: dadarśa rājā bhramarāyamāṇāḥ puṣpadrumeṣu pramadākṣimālāḥ // Jm_28.9 //
T09bsa032_u:4057: madapragalbhānyapi kokilānāṃ rutāni nṛtyāni ca barhiṇānām /
T09bsa032_u:4060: natā iva svena kalaguṇena cakrurmayūrāḥ kṣitipasya sevām // Jm_28.11 //
T09bsa032_u:4061: sa tatra sāntaḥpura udyānavanavihārasukhaṃ prakāmamanubhūya krīḍāprasaṅgaparikhedānmadapariṣvaṅgācca śrīmati vimānapradeśe mahārhaśayanīyavaragato nidrāvaśamupajagāma /
T09bsa032_u:4067: tāḥ prāpya rūpāṇi mahīruhāṇāṃ puṣpāṇi cārūṇi ca pallavāni /
T09bsa032_u:4070: paryāptapuṣpābharaṇasrajo 'pi lobhādanālupya na tā vyatīyuḥ // Jm_28.14 //
T09bsa032_u:4071: atha tā vanaramaṇīyatayākṣipyamāṇahṛdayā rājayoṣitastadvanamanuvicarantyaḥ kṣāntivādina āśramapadamupajagmuḥ /
T09bsa032_u:4072: viditatapaḥprabhāvamāhātmyāstu tasya muneḥ strījanādhikṛtā rājño vāllabhyād durāsadatvācca tāsāṃ naināstato vārayituṃ prasehire /
T09bsa032_u:4073: abhisaṃskāraramaṇīyatarayā cāśramapadaśriyā samākṛṣyamāṇā iva tā yoṣitaḥ praviśyāśramapadaṃ
T09bsa032_u:4077: atha tā rājastriyastasya tapastejasākrāntasattvāḥ saṃdarśanādeva tyaktavibhramavilāsauddhatyā vinayanibhṛtamabhigamyainaṃ paryupāsāṃcakrire
T09bsa032_u:4081: avaśyamṛtyurna karoti yaḥ śubhaṃ pramādabhākpratyahameṣa vañcyate // Jm_28.15 //
T09bsa032_u:4082: kulena rūpeṇa vayoguṇena vā balaprakarṣeṇa dhanodayena vā /
T09bsa032_u:4083: paratra nāpnoti sukhāni kaścana pradānaśīlādiguṇairasaṃskṛtaḥ // Jm_28.16 //
T09bsa032_u:4086: paratra saukhyairabhisāryate dhruvaṃ ghanāgame sindhujalairivārṇavaḥ // Jm_28.17 //
T09bsa032_u:4087: kulasya rūpasya vayoguṇasya vā balaprakarṣasya dhanocchrayasya vā /
T09bsa032_u:4092: janasya ceyaṃ na khalu svabhāvataḥ parāśrayādvā trividhā tu karmaṇaḥ // Jm_28.20 //
T09bsa032_u:4093: avetya caivaṃ niyatāṃ jagatsthitiṃ calaṃ vināśapravaṇaṃ ca jīvitam /
T09bsa032_u:4094: jahīta pāpāni śubhakramāśayādayaṃ hi panthā yaśase sukhāya ca // Jm_28.21 //
T09bsa032_u:4096: ataḥ prayatnena sa pāpabhīruṇā janena varjyaḥ pratipakṣaśaṃśrayāt // Jm_28.22 //
T09bsa032_u:4103: prayātyante ca dyāṃ svagṛhamiva puṇyāśrayaguṇāt // Jm_28.24 //
T09bsa032_u:4105: śubhasvabhāvātiśayaḥ prasiddhaḥ puṇyena kīrtyā ca parā vivṛddhiḥ /
T09bsa032_u:4113: hantīti yā dharmavipakṣamāyāṃ prāhuḥ sukhaṃ civa vimokṣamāyām /
T09bsa032_u:4114: tasmānna kuryātka iva kṣamāyāṃ prayatnamekāntahitakṣamāyām // Jm_28.29 //
T09bsa032_u:4115: iti sa mahātmā tāsāṃ dharmātithyaṃ cakāra /
T09bsa032_u:4116: atha sa rājā nidrāklamavinodanātprativibuddhaḥ sāvaśeṣamadagurunayano madanānuvṛttyā kutra devya iti śayanapālikāḥ sabhrūkṣepaṃ paryapṛcchat
T09bsa032_u:4117: etā deva vanāntarāṇyupaśobhayamānāstadvibhūtiṃ paśyantīti copalabhya śayanapālikābhyaḥ
T09bsa032_u:4122: dṛṣṭaiva tu sa rājā kṣāntivādinaṃ tamṛṣivaraṃ devijanaparivṛtaṃ pūrvavairānuśayadoṣānmadaparibhramitasmṛtitvādīrṣyāparābhūtamatitvācca paraṃ kopamupajagāma /
T09bsa032_u:4129: tacchrutvā varṣavarāḥ sasaṃbhramāvegā rājanamūcuḥ - deva mā maivam /
T09bsa032_u:4131: upahatādhyāśayatvāttu sa rājā tatteṣāṃ vacanamapratigṛhṇannuvāca - kaṣṭaṃ bhoḥ
T09bsa032_u:4134: tadayamasya tāpasanepathyāvacchāditaṃ māyaśāṭhyasaṃbhṛtaṃ kuhakasvabhāvaṃ prakāṣayāmītyuktvā pratihārīhastādasimādāya hantumutpatitaniścayastamṛṣivaraṃ sapatnavacabhijagāma /
T09bsa032_u:4135: atha tā devyaḥ parijananiveditābhyagamanamālokya rājānaṃ krodhasaṃkṣiptasaumyabhāvaṃ
T09bsa032_u:4139: na tasya śamayāmāsa krodhāgnijvalitaṃ manaḥ // Jm_28.32 //
T09bsa032_u:4141: tamudīkṣya rājānaṃ tamṛṣivaraṃ prati vivartitābhinivisṭadṛṣṭiṃ samāvṛṇvatya ūcuḥ
T09bsa032_u:4142: - deva mā mā khalu sāhasaṃ kārṣīḥ /
T09bsa032_u:4144: praduṣṭabhāvāttu sa rājā samāvarjitabhāvā nūnamanenemā iti suṣṭhutaraṃ kopamupetya
T09bsa032_u:4149: tathā hi yoṣitsaṃparkatṛṣṇā na kṣāntavānayam // Jm_28.33 //
T09bsa032_u:4153: atha tā devyastasmin rājani krodhasaṃrambhakarkaśahṛdaye pratyāhatapraṇayāḥ prajānānāśca
T09bsa032_u:4157: ko vetti kāmapi vivṛtya vikāralīlaṃ kenāpi yāsyapi pathā kṣitipasya roṣaḥ // Jm_28.35 //
T09bsa032_u:4158: kṣitīśavṛttiṃ pratilabdhakīrtiṃ tanuṃ munerasya tapastanuṃ ca /
T09bsa032_u:4159: amūnyanāgāṃsi ca no manāṃsi tulyaṃ hi hanyādapi nāma rājā // Jm_28.36 //
T09bsa032_u:4160: iti tāsu devīṣvanuśocitaviniḥśvasitamātraparāyaṇāsvapayātāsu sa rājā tamṛṣīvaraṃ saṃtarjayan roṣavaśanniṣkṛṣya khaṅgaṃ svayameva cchettumupacakrame
T09bsa032_u:4167: bhāgyāparādhajanito 'pyapamānayogaḥ saṃdṛśyate jagati tena na me 'tra cintā /
T09bsa032_u:4168: dūḥkhaṃ tu me yaducitābhigatesu vṛttirvācāpi na tvayi mayā kriyate yathārham // Jm_28.38 //
T09bsa032_u:4171: na yuktarūpaṃ sahasā pravartituṃ vimarśamārgo 'pyanugamyatāṃ yataḥ // Jm_28.39 //
T09bsa032_u:4174: na kāryatattvaṃ sahasaiva lakṣyate vimarśamaprāpya viśeṣahetubhiḥ // Jm_28.40 //
T09bsa032_u:4175: vimṛśya kāryaṃ tvavagamya tattvataḥ prapadya dharmeṇa ca nītivartmanā /
T09bsa032_u:4176: mahānti dharmārthasukhāni sādhayajanasya taireva na hīyate nṛpaḥ // Jm_28.41 //
T09bsa032_u:4179: tapovane tvadbhujavīryarakṣite pareṇa yannāma kṛtaṃ na marṣayeḥ /
T09bsa032_u:4180: hitakramonmāthi yadāryagarhitaṃ svayaṃ mahīnātha kathaṃ vyavasyasi // Jm_28.43 //
T09bsa032_u:4181: striyo 'bhiyātā yadi te mamāśramaṃ yadṛcchayāntaḥpuraraikṣibhiḥ saha /
T09bsa032_u:4182: vyatikramastatra ca no bhavetkiyān ruṣāyadevaṃ gamito 'si vikriyām // Jm_28.44 //
T09bsa032_u:4183: athāpyayaṃ syādaparādha eva me kṣamā tu śobheta tathāpi te nṛpa /
T09bsa032_u:4184: kṣamā hi śaktasya paraṃ vibhūṣaṇaṃ guṇānurakṣānipūnatvasūcanāt // Jm_28.45 //
T09bsa032_u:4188: tapodhaneṣvabhyuditā hi vṛttayaḥ kṣitīśvarāṇāṃ bahumānapeśalāḥ // Jm_28.47 //
T09bsa032_u:4191: na tāpasacchadma bibharti cedbhavān sthito 'si vā sve niyamavrate yadi /
T09bsa032_u:4193: bodhisattva uvāca - śrūyatāṃ mahārāja yadartho 'yaṃ mama prayatnaḥ /
T09bsa032_u:4195: iti te matkṛte mā bhūdyaśo vācyavijarjaram // Jm_28.49 //
T09bsa032_u:4197: iti me na bhayaṃ tasmātsvaṃ vṛttaṃ canupaśyataḥ // Jm_28.50 //
T09bsa032_u:4198: sukhodarkasya dharmasya pīḍā mā bhuttathaiva tu /
T09bsa032_u:4202: atha sa rājā sūnṛtānyapi tānyanādṛtya tasya munervacanakusumāni sāsūyaṃ tamṛṣivaramuvāca
T09bsa032_u:4204: tasya munerdakṣiṇaṃ pāṇiṃ niśitenāsinā kamalamiva nāladeśād vyayojayat /
T09bsa032_u:4205: chinne 'grahaste 'pi tu tasya nāsīdduḥkhaṃ tathā kṣāntidṛḍhavratasya /
T09bsa032_u:4207: atha bodhisattvaḥ kaṣṭamatikrānto 'yaṃ svahitamaryādāmapātrībhūto 'nunayasyeti vaidya pratyākhyātamānuramivainaṃ samanuśocaṃstūṣṇīṃbabhūva /
T09bsa032_u:4211: bodhisattvastvanunayākṣamamenaṃ viditvāyaṃ ca nāmāsya nirbandha iti nainaṃ kiṃciduvāca /
T09bsa032_u:4212: atha sa rājā tasya mahātmano dvitīyaṃ pāṇibhūmau bāhu karṇanāsaṃ caraṇau tathaiva nicakarta /
T09bsa032_u:4213: patati tu niśite 'pyasau śarīre na munivaraḥ sa śuśoca no cukopa /
T09bsa032_u:4214: parividitaśarīrayantraniṣṭhaḥ paricitayā ca jane kṣamānuvṛttyā // Jm_28.55 //
T09bsa032_u:4217: nāsīd duḥkhaṃ prītiyogānnṛpaṃ tu bhraṣṭaṃ dharmādvikṣya saṃtāpamāpa // Jm_28.56 //
T09bsa032_u:4220: ghoraṃ tu tatkarmaḥ nṛpaḥ sa kṛtvā sadyo jvareṇānugato 'gnineva /
T09bsa032_u:4221: vinirgataścopavanāntadeśād gāṃ cāvadīrṇāṃ sahasā viveśa // Jm_28.58 //
T09bsa032_u:4222: nimagne tu tasmin rājani bhīmaśabdamavadīrṇāyāṃ vahnijvālākulāyāṃ samudbhūte mahati
T09bsa032_u:4223: kolāhale samantataḥ prakṣubhite vyākule rājakule tasya rājño 'mātyā jānānāstasya
T09bsa032_u:4224: munestapaḥprabhāvamāhātmyaṃ tatkṛtaṃ ca rājño dharaṇītalanimajjanaṃ manyamānāḥ purāyamṛṣivarastasya
T09bsa032_u:4225: rājño doṣātsarvamidaṃ janapadaṃ nirdahatīti jātabhayāśaṅkāḥ samabhigamya tamṛṣivaramabhipraṇamya
T09bsa032_u:4228: śāpānalasyendhanatāṃ sa eva prayātu te mā puramasya kṣākṣīḥ // Jm_28.59 //
T09bsa032_u:4230: tatsādhu deśaṃ kṣitipasya tasya svaṃ caiva dharmaṃ guṇapakṣa rakṣa // Jm_28.60 //
T09bsa032_u:4231: athaitān bodhisattvaḥ samāśvāsayannuvāca - mā bhaiṣṭa āyuṣmantaḥ /
T09bsa032_u:4233: chinnavān yo 'pi tāvanme vane nivasata sataḥ // Jm_28.61 //
T09bsa032_u:4235: ciraṃ jīvatvasau rājā mā cainaṃ pāpamāgamat // Jm_28.62 //
T09bsa032_u:4237: dagdhe duścaritaiḥ śocye kaḥ kopaṃ kartumarhati // Jm_28.63 //
T09bsa032_u:4238: syāllabhyarūpastu yadi kramo 'yaṃ mayyeva pacyeta tadasya pāpam /
T09bsa032_u:4241: trātuṃ na śakyastu mayā yadevaṃ vinirdahannātmahitaṃ sa rājā /
T09bsa032_u:4242: utsṛjya tāmātmagatāmaśaktiṃ rājñe kariṣyāmi kimityasūyām // Jm_28.65 //
T09bsa032_u:4243: ṛte 'pi rājño maraṇādiduḥkhaṃ jātena sarveṇa niṣevitavyam /
T09bsa032_u:4244: janmaiva tenātra na marṣaṇīyaṃ tannāsti cetkiṃ ca kutaśca duḥkham // Jm_28.66 //
T09bsa032_u:4246: jahyāṃ kathaṃ tatpralaye titikṣāṃ tṛṇasya hetoriva ratnajāṭam // Jm_28.67 //
T09bsa032_u:4248: kimakṣamāyāṃ praṇayaṃ kariṣye tadbhaiṣṭa mā svasti ca vo 'stu yāt // Jm_28.68 //
T09bsa032_u:4249: iti sa munivaro 'nuśiṣya tān samamupanīya ca sādhuśiṣyatām /
T09bsa032_u:4251: tadevaṃ sātmībhūtakṣamāṇāṃ pratisaṃkhyānamahatāṃ nāviṣahyaṃ nāmāstīti kṣāntiguṇasaṃvarṇane munimupanīya vācyam /
T09bsa032_u:4252: cāpalākṣāntidoṣanidarśane rājānamupanīya kāmādinavakathāyāmapi vācyam - evaṃ kāmahetorduścaritamāsevya vinipātabhāgino bhavantīti /
T09bsa032_u:4259: bodhisattvaḥ kilāyaṃ bhagavān dhyānābhyāsopacitasya kuśalasya karmaṇo vipākaprabhāvād brahmaloke janma pratilebhe /
T09bsa032_u:4260: tasya tanmahadapi dhyānaviśeṣādhigataṃ brāhmaṃ sukhaṃ pūrvajanmasu kāruṇyaparicayānnaiva parahitakaraṇavyāpāranirutsukaṃ manaścakāra /
T09bsa032_u:4262: dhyānasukhairapi tu satāṃ na tiraskriyate parahitecchā // Jm_29.1 //
T09bsa032_u:4267: kutaḥ śubhaśubhānāṃ karmaṇāṃ vipāka ityevaṃ sa niścayamupetya praśāntadharmakriyautsukyaḥ
T09bsa032_u:4271: śubhāśubhaṃ karma sukhāsukhodayaṃ dhruvaṃ paratreti virūḍhaniścayaḥ /
T09bsa032_u:4272: apāsya pāpa yatate śubhāśrayo yatheṣṭamaśraddhatayā tu gamyate // Jm_29.2 //
T09bsa032_u:4273: atha sa mahātmā devarṣistasya rājñastena dṛṣṭivyasanopanipātenāpāyikena lokānarthākarabhūtena
T09bsa032_u:4274: samāvarjitānukampastasya rājño viṣayasukhākalitamateḥ śrīmati pravivikte vimānadeśe
T09bsa032_u:4276: atha sa rājā tamagniskandhamiva jvalantaṃ vidyutsamūhamiva cāvabhāsamānaṃ dinakarakīraṇasaṃghātamiva
T09bsa032_u:4277: ca parayā dīptyā virocamānamabhivīkṣya tattejasābhibhūtamatiḥ sasaṃbhramaḥ prāñjalirena
T09bsa032_u:4279: karoti te bhūriva saṃparigrahaṃ nabho 'pi padmopamapāda pādayoḥ /
T09bsa032_u:4280: vibhāsi saurīmiva codvahan prabhāṃ vilocanānandanarūpa ko bhavān // Jm_29.3 //
T09bsa032_u:4282: jitvā dṛptau śāstravamukhyāviva saṃkhye rāgadveṣau cittasamādānabalena /
T09bsa032_u:4284: brāhmaṃ lokaṃ ye 'bhigatā bhūmipa teṣāṃ devarṣīṇāmanyatamaṃ māṃ tvamavehi // Jm_29.4 //
T09bsa032_u:4285: ityukte sa rājā svāgatādipriyavacanapuraḥsaraṃ pādyārghyasatkāramasmai samupahṛtya savismayamenamabhivīkṣamāṇa uvāca - āścaryarūpaḥ khalu te maharṣe ṛddhiprabhāvaḥ /
T09bsa032_u:4289: dhyānasya śīlasya ca nirmalasya varasya caivendriyasaṃvarasya /
T09bsa032_u:4294: rājovāca - kathaṃ punaridaṃ mārṣa śakyamasmābhirapi śraddhātuṃ syāt?
T09bsa032_u:4298: pratyakṣarūpaḥ paraloka eṣa mā te 'tra saṃdehajaḍā matirbhūt // Jm_29.7 //
T09bsa032_u:4299: jātismarāḥ santi ca tatra tatra dhyānābhiyogātsmṛtipāṭavācca /
T09bsa032_u:4300: ato 'pi lokaḥ parato 'numeyaḥ sākṣyaṃ ca nanvatra kṛtaṃ mayaiva // Jm_29.8 //
T09bsa032_u:4302: ādyā hi yā garbhagatasya buddhiḥ sānantaraṃ pūrvakajanmabuddheḥ // Jm_29.9 //
T09bsa032_u:4303: jñeyāvabodhaṃ ca vadanti buddhiṃ janmādibuddherviṣayo 'sti tasmāt /
T09bsa032_u:4305: na caihiko 'sau nayanādyabhāvātsiddhau yadiyastu paraḥ sa lokaḥ // Jm_29.10 //
T09bsa032_u:4306: pitryaṃ svabhāvaṃ vyatiricya dṛṣṭaḥ śīlādibhedaśca yataḥ prajānām /
T09bsa032_u:4307: nākasmikasyāsti ca yatprasiddhirjātyantarābhyāsamayaḥ sa tasmāt // Jm_29.11 //
T09bsa032_u:4311: abhyāsasiddhirhi paṭukaroti śikṣāgaṇaṃ karmasu teṣu teṣu // Jm_29.13 //
T09bsa032_u:4313: yatsaṃkucanti vikasanti ca apṅkajāti kāmaṃ tadanyabhavaceṣṭisiddhireṣā /
T09bsa032_u:4314: no cettadiṣṭamatha kiṃ stanapānayatnaṃ jātyantarīyakapariśramajaṃ karoṣi // Jm_29.14 //
T09bsa032_u:4316: dṛṣṭo hi kālaniyamaḥ kamalaprabodhe saṃmīlane ca na punaḥ stanapānayatne /
T09bsa032_u:4317: yatnaśca nāsti kamale stanape tu dṛṣṭaḥ sūryaprabhāva iti padmavikāsahetuḥ // Jm_29.15 //
T09bsa032_u:4318: tadevaṃ mahārāja samyagupaparīkṣamāṇena śakyametacchraddhātum - asti paraloka iti /
T09bsa032_u:4319: atha sa rājā mithyādṛṣṭiparigrahābhiniviṣṭabuddhitvādupacitapāpatvācca tāṃ paralokakathāṃ śrutvā asukhāyamāna uvāca - bho maharṣe,
T09bsa032_u:4320: lokaḥ paro yadi na bālavibhīṣikaiṣā grāhyaṃ mayaitaditi vā yadi manyase tvam /
T09bsa032_u:4321: teneha naḥ pradiśa niṣkaśatāni pañca tatte sahasramahamanyabhave pradāsye // Jm_29.16 //
T09bsa032_u:4323: atha bodhisattvastadasya prāgalbhyaparicayanirviśaṅkaṃ mithyādṛṣṭiviṣodgārabhūtamasamudācāravacanaṃ yukteneva krameṇa pratyuvāca -
T09bsa032_u:4324: ihāpi tāvaddhanasaṃpadarthinaḥ prayuñjate naiva dhanaṃ durātmani /
T09bsa032_u:4325: na ghasmare nānipuṇe na cālase gataṃ hi yattatra tadantameti tat // Jm_29.17 //
T09bsa032_u:4326: yameva paśyanti tu savyapatrapaṃ śamābhijātaṃ vyavahāranaipuṇam /
T09bsa032_u:4327: ṛṇaṃ prayacchanti raho 'pi tadvidhe tadarpaṇaṃ hyabhyudayāvahaṃ dhanam // Jm_29.18 //
