T09bsa032_u:4328: kramaśca tāvadvidha eva gamyatāmṛṇaprayoge nṛpa pāralaukike /
T09bsa032_u:4329: tvayi tvasaddarśanaduṣṭaceṣṭite dhanaprayogasya gatirna vidyate // Jm_29.19 //
T09bsa032_u:4333: na caiva tārāgaṇabhūṣaṇaṃ nabhaḥ saraḥ prabuddhaiḥ kumudairivekṣyate // Jm_29.21 //
T09bsa032_u:4334: paratra yasminnivasanti nāstikā ghanaṃ tamastatra himaśca mārutaḥ /
T09bsa032_u:4335: karoti yo 'stīnyapi dārayan rujaṃ tamātmavān kaḥ praviśeddhanepsayā // Jm_29.22 //
T09bsa032_u:4340: diśaḥ pradhāvanti tadunmumukṣayā na cāntamāyāntyaśubhasya nāyuṣaḥ // Jm_29.24 //
T09bsa032_u:4341: ātakṣya takṣāṇa ivāpareṣāṃ gātrāni raudrā viniyamya yāmyāḥ /
T09bsa032_u:4342: nistakṣṇuvantyeva śitāgraśastrāḥ sārdreṣu dāruṣviva labdhaharṣāḥ // Jm_29.25 //
T09bsa032_u:4344: na cāyānti nāśaṃdhṛtā duṣkṛtaiḥ svaistathā cāpare khaṇḍaśaśchidyamānāḥ // Jm_29.26 //
T09bsa032_u:4349: duḥkhe mahatyavikale 'pi ca no mriyante yāvatparikṣayamupaiti na karma pāpam // Jm_29.28 //
T09bsa032_u:4351: samāni pañcāpi samāśatāni saṃcūrṇyamānā visṛjanti nāsūn // Jm_29.29 //
T09bsa032_u:4353: pāṭyanta ūrdhvamadha eva ca kṛṣyamāṇāḥ krūrai ravairapuruṣaiḥ puruṣairyamasya // Jm_29.30 //
T09bsa032_u:4358: rāraṭyante tīvrarujāviṣṭaśarīrāḥ pratyāyyante te ca tadānīṃ paralokam // Jm_29.32 //
T09bsa032_u:4360: kecittīkṣṇaiḥ śastravarṣaiḥ kṣatāṅgā nistvaṅmāṃsā vyālasaṃghaiḥ kriyante // Jm_29.33 //
T09bsa032_u:4361: kecitklāntā vahnisaṃsparśatīkṣṇaṃ kṣāraṃ toyaṃ vaitaraṇyāṃ viśanti /
T09bsa032_u:4362: saṃśīryante yatra māṃsāni teṣāṃ no tu prāṇā duṣkṛtairdhāryamāṇā // Jm_29.34 //
T09bsa032_u:4364: atulamanubhavanti tatra duḥkhaṃ krimiśatajarjaritāsthibhiḥ śarīraiḥ // Jm_29.35 //
T09bsa032_u:4366: jvalanaparigatāyasaprakāśāḥ svakṛtadhṛtā na ca bhasmasādbhavanti // Jm_29.36 //
T09bsa032_u:4370: pāyyante jvalitāgnivarṇamapare lauhaṃ rasanto rasam // Jm_29.37 //
T09bsa032_u:4376: śokāturaṃ śramaviṣādaparītacittaṃ yācedṛṇaṃ ka iva nāma tadā bhavantam // Jm_29.39 //
T09bsa032_u:4378: prakvāthavegavaśagaṃ vivaśaṃ bhramantaṃ yācedṛṇaṃ ka iva nāma tadā bhavantam // Jm_29.40 //
T09bsa032_u:4380: nirdahyamānavapuṣaṃ karuṇaṃ rudantaṃ yācedṛṇaṃ ka iva nāma tadā bhavantam // Jm_29.41 //
T09bsa032_u:4381: prāptaṃ parābhavaṃ taṃ duḥkhāni mahānti kastadānubhavantam /
T09bsa032_u:4384: vidāryamāṇa bhṛśamārtinādinaṃ paratra kastvārhati yācituṃ dhanam // Jm_29.43 //
T09bsa032_u:4386: śvavāyasairvyāhṛtamāṃsaśoṇitaṃ paratra kastvā dhanayācñayā tudet // Jm_29.44 //
T09bsa032_u:4388: viśasanairvividhaiśca sadāturaḥ kathamṛṇaṃ pratidāsyasi me tadā // Jm_29.45 //
T09bsa032_u:4390: tāṃ nirayakathāmatibhīṣaṇāṃ samupaśrutya jātasaṃvegastyaktamithyādṛṣṭyanurāgo labdhasaṃpratyayaḥ paraloke,
T09bsa032_u:4392: niśamya tāvannareṣu yātanāṃ bhayādidaṃ vidravatīva me manaḥ /
T09bsa032_u:4393: kathaṃ bhaviṣyāmi na tāṃ sameyivān vitakravahnirdahatīva māṃ punaḥ // Jm_29.46 //
T09bsa032_u:4396: tadatra me sādhugatirgatirbhavān parāyaṇaṃ tvaṃ śaraṇaṃ ca me mune // Jm_29.47 //
T09bsa032_u:4397: yathaiva me dṛṣṭitamastvayoddhṛtaṃ divākareṇeva samudyatā tamaḥ /
T09bsa032_u:4398: tathaiva mārgaṃ tvamṛṣe pracakṣva me bhajeya yenāhamito na durgatim // Jm_29.48 //
T09bsa032_u:4399: athainaṃ bodhisattvaḥ saṃvignamānasamṛjūbhūtadṛṣṭiṃ dharmapratipattipātrabhūtamavekṣya piteva putramācārya iva ca śiṣyamanukampamāna iti samanuśaśāsa
T09bsa032_u:4400: suśiṣyavṛttyā śramaṇadvijeṣu pūrve guṇaprema yathā vicakruḥ /
T09bsa032_u:4401: nṛpāḥ svavṛttyā ca dayāṃ prajāsu kīrtikṣamaḥ sa tridivasya panthāḥ // Jm_29.49 //
T09bsa032_u:4402: adharmamasmād bhṛśadurjayaṃ jayan kadaryabhāvaṃ ca durutaraṃ taran /
T09bsa032_u:4403: upaihi ratnātiśayojjvalaṃ jvalan divaspateḥ kāñcanagopuraṃ puram // Jm_29.50 //
T09bsa032_u:4405: jahīhi taṃ bāliśarañjanaijanaiḥ pravedito 'dharmaviniścayaśca yaḥ // Jm_29.51 //
T09bsa032_u:4406: tvayā hi saddarśanasādhunādhunā narendra vṛttena yiyāsatā satā /
T09bsa032_u:4407: yadaiva citte guṇarūkṣatā kṣatā tadaiva te mārgakṛtāspadaṃ padam // Jm_29.52 //
T09bsa032_u:4408: kuruṣva tasmād guṇasādhanaṃ dhanaṃ śivāṃ ca loke svahitodayāṃ dayām /
T09bsa032_u:4409: sthiraṃ ca śīlendriyasaṃvaraṃ varaṃ paratra hi syādaśivaṃ na tena te // Jm_29.53 //
T09bsa032_u:4412: carātmano 'rthapratisaṃhitaṃ hitaṃ jagadvyathāṃ kīrtimanoharaṃ haran // Jm_29.54 //
T09bsa032_u:4413: tvamatra sanmānasasārathī rathī sva eva deho guṇasūratho rathaḥ /
T09bsa032_u:4420: caran parātmārthamamohabhāsvatā na jātu rājannirayaṃ gamiṣyasi // Jm_29.58 //
T09bsa032_u:4421: iti sa mahātmā tasya rājñastadasaddarśanāndhakāraṃ bhāsvarairvacanakiraṇairvyavadhūya prakāśya cāsmai sugatimārgaṃ tatraivāntardadhe /
T09bsa032_u:4422: atha sa rājā samupalabdhaparalokavṛttāntatattvaḥ pratilabdhasamyagdarśanacetāḥ sāmātyapaurajānapado dānadamasaṃyamaparāyaṇo babhūva /
T09bsa032_u:4426: evamāsādanāmapi santastaddhitopadeśena pratinudanti kṣamāparicayānna pāruṣyeṇeti satpraśaṃsāyāṃ kṣāmāvarṇe 'pi vācyam /
T09bsa032_u:4431: parahitodarkaṃ duḥkhamapi sādhavo lābhamiva bahu manyante /
T09bsa032_u:4436: nirvṛkṣakṣupasalilena kāntāreṇa samantatastiraskṛtajanānte mahākāya ekacaro hastī babhūva /
T09bsa032_u:4437: sa tatra taruparṇena bisena salilena ca /
T09bsa032_u:4438: abhireme tapasvīva saṃtoṣeṇa śamena ca // Jm_30.1 //
T09bsa032_u:4439: atha kadācitsa mahāsattvastasya vanasya paryante vicaran yatastatkāntāraṃ tato janaśabdamupaśuśrāva /
T09bsa032_u:4440: tasya cintā prādurabhūt - kiṃ nu khalvidam?
T09bsa032_u:4442: evaṃ mahatkāntāraṃ ca vyatītya mṛgayāpi na yujyate prāgeva mahāsamārambhaparikhedamasmatsayūthyagrahaṇam /
T09bsa032_u:4444: nirvāsitā vā kruddhena rājñā svenānayena vā // Jm_30.2 //
T09bsa032_u:4447: tajjñāsyāmi tāvadenamiti sa mahāsattvaḥ karuṇayā samākṛṣyamāṇo yataḥ sa jananirghoṣo babhūva tataḥ prasasāra /
T09bsa032_u:4448: viṣpaṣṭataravilāpaṃ ca viṣādadainyavirasaṃ tamākranditaśabdamupaśṛṇvan kāruṇyaparyutsukamanāḥ sa mahātmā drutataraṃ tato 'bhyagacchat /
T09bsa032_u:4449: nirgamya ca tasmādvanagahanānnirvṛkṣakṣupatvāttasya deśasya dūra evāvalokayan dadarśa saptamātrāṇi puruṣaśatāni kṣuttarṣapariśramamandāni tadvanamabhimukhāni prārthayamānāni /
T09bsa032_u:4450: te 'pi ca puruṣāstaṃ mahāsattvaṃ dadṛśurjaṅgamamiva himagiriśikharaṃ hīnārapuñjamiva śaradvalāhakamiva pavanabalāvarjitamabhimukhamāyāntam /
T09bsa032_u:4451: dṛṣṭvā ca viṣādadainyaparītā hantedānīṃ naṣṭā vayamiti bhayagrastamanaso 'pi kṣuttarṣapariśramavihatotsāhā nāpayānaprayatnaparā babhūvuḥ /
T09bsa032_u:4455: bhaiṣṭa na vo bhayamasti matta iti samucchritena snigdhābhitāmrapṛthupuṣkareṇa kareṇa samāśvāsayannabhigamya karuṇāyamāṇaḥ papraccha - ke 'trabhavantaḥ?
T09bsa032_u:4459: śokaklamārtāḥ ke yūyamiha cābhigatāḥ kutaḥ // Jm_30.5 //
T09bsa032_u:4460: atha te puruṣāstasya tena mānuṣeṇābhivyāhāreṇābhayapradānābhivyañjakena cābhyupapattisaumukhyena pratyāgatahṛdayāḥ samabhipraṇamyainamūcuḥ -
T09bsa032_u:4464: suhṛdvandhuviśiṣṭena yad dṛṣṭā bhavatā vayam // Jm_30.7 //
T09bsa032_u:4466: svapne 'pi tvadvidhaṃ dṛṣṭvā ko hi nāpadamuttaret // Jm_30.8 //
T09bsa032_u:4467: athainān sa dviradavara uvāca - atha kiyanto 'trabhavanta iti?
T09bsa032_u:4471: etāni tu syurdviradapradhāna saptāvaśeṣāṇi nṛṇāṃ śatāni /
T09bsa032_u:4472: nimajjatāṃ mṛtyumukhe tu yeṣāṃ mūrtastvamāśvāsa ivābhyupetaḥ // Jm_30.10 //
T09bsa032_u:4475: ghṛṇāvimuktā bata nirvyapatrapā nṛpasya buddhiḥ paralokanirvyathā /
T09bsa032_u:4476: aho taḍiccañcalayā nṛpaśriyā hṛtendriyāṇāṃ svahitānavekṣitā // Jm_30.11 //
T09bsa032_u:4477: avaiti manye na sa mṛtyumagrataḥ śṛṇoti pāpasya na vā durantatām /
T09bsa032_u:4478: aho batānāthatamā narāḍhipā vimarśamāndyādvacanakṣamā na ye // Jm_30.12 //
T09bsa032_u:4481: idaṃ sattveṣu nairghṛṇyaṃ dhigaho bata mūḍhatām // Jm_30.13 //
T09bsa032_u:4482: atha tasya dviradapatestān puruṣān karuṇāsnigdhamavekṣamāṇasya cintā prādurabhūt
T09bsa032_u:4485: nāgavane 'pi ca kiṃ tadasti yenaiṣāmekāhamapi tāvadaparikleśena vārtā syāt?
T09bsa032_u:4486: śakyeyuḥ punarete madīyāni māṃsāni pātheyatāmupanīya dṛtibhiriva ca mamāntraiḥ salilamādāya kāntārametannistarituṃ nānyathā /
T09bsa032_u:4490: durlabhaṃ ca tadeteṣāṃ maivaṃ vilayamāgamat // Jm_30.15 //
T09bsa032_u:4492: āpadgatā bandhuvivarjitāśca mayā viśeṣeṇa yato 'nukampyāḥ // Jm_30.16 //
T09bsa032_u:4495: athainamanye kṣuttarṣaśramadharmaduḥkhāturaśarīrāḥ kṛtāñjalayaḥ sāśrunayanāḥ samabhipraṇamyārtatayā hastasaṃjñābhiḥ pānīyamayācanta /
T09bsa032_u:4496: tvaṃ no bandhurabandhūnāṃ tvaṃ gatiḥ śaraṇaṃ ca naḥ /
T09bsa032_u:4497: yathā vetsi mahābhāga tathā nastrātumarhasi // Jm_30.18 //
T09bsa032_u:4499: apare tvenaṃ dhīrataramanasaḥ salilapradeśaṃ kāntāradurgottāraṇāya ca mārgaṃ papracchuḥ -
T09bsa032_u:4500: jalāśayaḥ śītajalā saridvā yadyatra vā nairjharamasti toyam /
T09bsa032_u:4501: chāyādrumaḥ śādvalamaṇḍalaṃ vā tannod vipānāmadhipa pracakṣva // Jm_30.19 //
T09bsa032_u:4504: anukampāṃ puraskṛtya tāṃ diśaṃ sādhu nirdiśa // Jm_30.20 //
T09bsa032_u:4505: saṃbahulāni hi dinānyatra naḥ kāntāre paribhramatām /
T09bsa032_u:4507: atha sa mahātmā taiḥ karuṇaiḥ prayācitaisteṣāṃ bhṛśataramākleditahṛdayo yatastatkāntāraṃ śakyaṃ nistartu babhūva,
T09bsa032_u:4508: tata esāṃ parvatasthalaṃ saṃdarśayannabhyucchritena bhujagavarabhogapīvareṇa kareṇovāca - asya parvatasthalasyādhastātpadmotpalālaṃkṛtavimalasalilamasti mahatsaraḥ /
T09bsa032_u:4510: tatna ca vyapanītagharmatarṣaklamāstasyaiva nātīdūre 'smātparvatasthalātpatitasya hastinaḥ śarīraṃ drakṣyatha /
T09bsa032_u:4511: tasya māṃsāni pātheyatāmānīya dṛtibhiriva tasyāntraiḥ salilamupagṛhyānayaiva diśā yātavyam /
T09bsa032_u:4513: iti sa mahātmā tān puruṣān samāśvāsanapūrvakaṃ tataḥ prasthāpya tato drutataramanyena
T09bsa032_u:4514: mārgeṇa tadgiriśikharamāruhya tasya janakāyasya nistāraṇāpekṣayā svaśarīraṃ tato
T09bsa032_u:4516: nāyaṃ prayatnaḥ sugatiṃ mamāptuṃ naikātapatrāṃ manujendralakṣmīm /
T09bsa032_u:4517: sukhaprakarṣaikarasāṃ na ca dyāṃ brāhmīṃ śriyaṃ naiva na mokṣasaukhyam // Jm_30.21 //
T09bsa032_u:4518: yatvasti puṇyaṃ mama kiṃcidevaṃ kāntāramagnaṃ janamujjihīrṣoḥ /
T09bsa032_u:4519: saṃsārakāntāragatasya tena lokasya nistārayitā bhaveyam // Jm_30.22 //
T09bsa032_u:4520: iti viniścitya sa mahātmā pramodādagaṇitaprapātaniṣpeṣamaraṇaduḥkhaṃ svaśarīraṃ tasmād giritaṭādyathoddeśaṃ mumoca -
T09bsa032_u:4521: reje tataḥ sa nipatañcharadīva meghaḥ paryastabimba iva cāstagireḥ śaśāṅkaḥ /
T09bsa032_u:4522: tārkṣyasya pakṣapavanograjavāpaviddhaṃ śṛṇgaṃ gireriva ca tasya himottarīyam // Jm_30.23 //
T09bsa032_u:4523: ākampayannatha dharāṃ dharaṇīdharāṃśca mārasya ca prabhumadādhyuṣitaṃ ca cetaḥ /
T09bsa032_u:4524: nirghātapiṇḍitaravaṃ nipapāta bhūmāvāvarjayan vanalatā vanadevatāśca // Jm_30.24 //
T09bsa032_u:4534: tamarcituṃ bhaktivaśena kecana vyarāsayan dyāṃ suradundubhisvanaiḥ /
T09bsa032_u:4536: diśaḥ saratkāntimayīṃ dadhuḥ śriyaṃ raveḥ karāḥ prāṃśutarā ivābhavan /
T09bsa032_u:4538: atha te puruṣāḥ krameṇa tatsaraḥ samupetya tasmin vinītadharmatarṣaklamā yathākathitaṃ tena mahātmanā tadavidūre hastiśarīraṃ naciramṛtaṃ dadṛśuḥ
T09bsa032_u:4539: teṣāṃ buddhirabhavat - aho yathāyaṃ sadṛśastasya dviradapaterhastī /
T09bsa032_u:4540: bhrātā nu tasyaiṣa mahādvipasya syād bāndhavo vānyatamaḥ suto vā /
T09bsa032_u:4542: tasyaiva khalvasya sitādriśobhaṃ saṃcūrṇitasyāpi vibhāti rūpam // Jm_30.31 //
T09bsa032_u:4545: atha tatraikeṣāṃ nipuṇataramanupaśyatāṃ buddhirabhavat - yathā paśyāmaḥ sa eva khalvayaṃ
T09bsa032_u:4549: vyaktamasyaiva patataḥ sa cāsmābhirdhvaniḥ śrutaḥ // Jm_30.33 //
T09bsa032_u:4550: etadvapuḥ khalu tadeva mṛṇālagauraṃ candraṃśuśuklatanujaṃ tanubinducitram /
T09bsa032_u:4551: kūrmopamāḥ sitanakhāścaraṇāsta ete vaṃśaḥ sa eva ca dhanurmadhurānato 'yam // Jm_30.34 //
T09bsa032_u:4555: ādeśayan mārgamimaṃ ca yenaḥ sa eṣa dīrghāṅgalipuṣkaraḥ karaḥ // Jm_30.36 //
T09bsa032_u:4558: suhṛttvamasmāsu batedamīdṛśaṃ suhṛtsu vā bandhuṣu vāsya kīdṛśam // Jm_30.37 //
T09bsa032_u:4562: ko 'pyeṣa manye dviradāvabhāsaḥ siṣatsatāmudvahatīva vṛttam // Jm_30.38 //
T09bsa032_u:4564: na rūpaśobhā ramate vinā guṇairjano yadityāha tadetadīkṣyate // Jm_30.39 //
T09bsa032_u:4566: himādriśobhena mṛto 'pi khalvayaṃ kṛtātmatuṣṭirhasatīva varṣmaṇā // Jm_30.40 //
T09bsa032_u:4569: atha tān bandhuvyasan eva śokānuvṛttipravaṇahṛdayān sāśrunayanān gadgadāyamānakaṇṭhānavekṣya
T09bsa032_u:4570: kāryāntaramavekṣamāṇā dhīrataramanasa ūcuranye - na khalvevamasmābhirayaṃ dviradavaraḥ
T09bsa032_u:4576: anyathā hi bhavedvyartho nanu tasyāyamudyamaḥ // Jm_30.42 //
T09bsa032_u:4580: satkriyāṃ kartumarhāmaḥ kṣemamātmana eva ca // Jm_30.44 //
T09bsa032_u:4581: nistīrya cedaṃ vyasanaṃ samagraiḥ pratyekaśo vā punarasya pūjā /
T09bsa032_u:4582: kariṣyate nāgavarasya sarvaṃ bandhoratītasya yathaiva kṛtyam // Jm_30.45 //
T09bsa032_u:4585: tasya mahāsattvasya māṃsānyādāya dṛtibhiriva ca tadantraiḥ salilaṃ tatpradarśitayā
T09bsa032_u:4587: tadevaṃ parihitodarkaṃ duḥkhamapi sādhavo lābhamiva bahu manyante,
T09bsa032_u:4590: satkṛtya dharmaśravaṇe ca bhadraprakṛtiniṣpādanavarṇe 'pi vācyam - evaṃ bhadrā prakṛtirabhyastā janmāntareṣvanuvartata iti /
T09bsa032_u:4592: yaccoktaṃ bhagavata parinirvāṇasamaye samupasthiteṣu divyakusumavāditrādiṣu - na khalu punarānanda etāvatā tathāgataḥ satkṛto bhavatīti,
T09bsa032_u:4598: śreyaḥ samādhatte yathātathāpyupanataḥ satsaṃgama iti sajjanāpāśrayeṇa śreyo 'rthinā bhavitavyam /
T09bsa032_u:4600: bodhisattvabhūtaḥ kilāyaṃ bhagavān yaśaḥprakāśavaṃśe guṇaparigrahaprasaṅgātsātmībhūtaprajānurāge pratāpānatadṛptasāmante śrīmati kauravyarājakule janma pratilebhe tasya /
T09bsa032_u:4601: guṇaśatakiraṇamālinaḥ somapriyadarśanasya sutasya sutasoma ityevaṃ pitā nāma cakre /
T09bsa032_u:4603: sāṅgeṣu sopavedeṣu ca vedeṣu vaicakṣaṇyaṃ dṛṣṭakramaḥ sottarakalānāṃ kalānāṃ lokyānāṃ
T09bsa032_u:4608: teṣāṃ ca teṣāṃ sa guṇodayānāmalaṃkṛtānāmiva yauvanena /
T09bsa032_u:4611: vidvattayā tvāsuratīva tasya priyāṇi dharmyāṇi subhāṣitāni /
T09bsa032_u:4620: cacāra puṣpānatacitrapādape priyāsahāyaḥ sukṛtīva nandane // Jm_31.4 //
T09bsa032_u:4622: strīṇāṃ madopahṛtayā ca vilāsalakṣmyā reme sa tatra vanacārutayā tayā ca // Jm_31.5 //
T09bsa032_u:4626: eva tasmin brāhmaṇe subhāṣitaśravaṇādanavāptāgamanaphale sahasaivotpatitaṃ gītavāditrasvanoparodhi
T09bsa032_u:4629: athāsya dauvārikā bhayaviṣādadinavadanāḥ sasaṃbhramaṃ drutataramupetya nyavedayanta
T09bsa032_u:4630: - eṣa sa deva puruṣādaḥ kalmāṣavādaḥ saudāsaḥ sākṣādivāntako naraśatakadanakaraṇaparicayādrākṣasādhikakrūrataramatiratimānuṣabalavīryadarpo
T09bsa032_u:4635: atha sutasomo jānāno 'pi tānuvāca - bhoḥ ka eṣa saudāso nāma?
T09bsa032_u:4636: te taṃ procuḥ - kimetaddevasya na viditaṃ yathā sudāso nāma rājā babhūva /
T09bsa032_u:4637: sa mṛgayānirgato 'śvenāpahṛto vanagahanamanupraviṣṭaḥ siṃhyā sārdhaṃ yogamagamat /
T09bsa032_u:4642: pitari ca surapuramupagate svaṃ rājyaṃ pratilebhe /
T09bsa032_u:4644: idamidaṃ rasavaraṃ māṃsamiti sa mānuṣaṃ māṃsamāsvādya svapaurāneva ca hatvā hatvā bhakṣayitumupacakrame /
T09bsa032_u:4646: yato 'sau bhītaḥ saudāso nararudhirapiśitabalibhugbhyo bhutebhya upaśuśrāva - asmātsaṃkaṭānmukto 'haṃ rājñāṃ kumāraśatena bhūtayajñaṃ kariṣyāmīti
T09bsa032_u:4651: atha sa bodhisattvaḥ pūrvameva viditaśīladoṣavibhramaḥ saudāsasya kāruṇyāttaccikitsāvahitamatirāśaṃsamānaścātmani
T09bsa032_u:4652: tacchīlavikṛtapraśamanasāmarthyaṃ priyākhyāna iva ca saudāsābhiyānanivedane prītiṃ
T09bsa032_u:4659: gatvāpi yo nāma mayānukampyo madgocaraṃ sa svayamabyupetaḥ /
T09bsa032_u:4660: yuktaṃ mayātithyamato 'sya kartumevaṃ hi santo 'tithiṣu pravṛttāḥ // Jm_31.8 //
T09bsa032_u:4663: mārgāvaraṇasodyamamāśvāsanapūrvakaṃ vinivartya yuvatijanaṃ yatastatkolāhalaṃ tataḥ prasasāra /
T09bsa032_u:4666: saudāsaṃ vidravadanupatantaṃ rājabalaṃ vigatabhayasādhvasaḥ samājuhāva - ayamahamare sutasomaḥ /
T09bsa032_u:4669: tatsamāhvānaśabdākalitadarpastu saudāsaḥ siṃha iva tato nyavartata /
T09bsa032_u:4671: tvāmeva mṛgayāmītyuktvā niviśaṅka sahasā saṃrambhadrutataramabhisṛtyainaṃ skandhamāropya pradudrāva /
T09bsa032_u:4672: bodhisattvo 'pi cainaṃ saṃrambhadarpoddhatamānasaṃ sasaṃbhramākulitamatiṃ rājabalavidrāvaṇāduparūḍhapraharṣāvalepaṃ sābhiśaṅkamavetya nāyamasyānuśiṣṭikāla ityupekṣāṃcakre /
T09bsa032_u:4673: saudāso 'pyabhimatārthaprasiddhyā paramiva lābhabhadhigamya pramuditamanāḥ svamāvāsadurgaṃ praviveśa /
T09bsa032_u:4678: rakṣaḥpretānartanabibhatsamaśāntaṃ dūrād dṛṣṭaṃ trāsajaḍaiḥ sārthikanetraiḥ // Jm_31.10 //
T09bsa032_u:4679: samavatārya ca tatra bodhisattvaṃ tadrūpasaṃpadā vinibadhyamānanayanaḥ pratataṃ vīkṣamāṇo viśaśrāma /
T09bsa032_u:4680: atha bodhisattvasya subhāṣitopāyanābhigataṃ brāhmaṇamakṛtasatkāraṃ tadudyānavinivartanapratīkṣiṇamāśāvabaddhahṛdayamanusmṛtya cintā prādurabhūt - kaṣṭaṃ bhoḥ
T09bsa032_u:4682: sa maṃ hṛtamupaśrutya vipraḥ kiṃ nu kariṣyati // Jm_31.11 //
T09bsa032_u:4684: viniśvasiṣyatyanuśocya vā māṃ svabhāgyanindāṃ pratipatsyate vā // Jm_31.12 //
T09bsa032_u:4685: iti vicintayatastasya mahāsattvasya tadīyaduḥkhābhitaptamanasaḥ kāruṇyaparicayādaśrūṇi prāvartanta /
T09bsa032_u:4686: atha saudāsaḥ sāśrūnayanamabhivīkṣya bodhisattvaṃ samabhiprahasannuvācamā tavadbhoḥ /
T09bsa032_u:4688: atha cāsmadvaśaṃ prāpya tvamapyaśrūṇi muñcasi // Jm_31.13 //
T09bsa032_u:4691: na hi tadvidyate bhūtamāhataṃ yuanna kampate // Jm_31.14 //
T09bsa032_u:4693: prāṇān priyānatha dhanaṃ sukhasādhanaṃ vā bandhūnnarādhipatitāmathavānuśocan /
T09bsa032_u:4694: putrapriyaṃ pitaramaśrumukhān sutān vā smṛtveti sāśrūnayanatvamupāgato 'si // Jm_31.15 //
T09bsa032_u:4696: na prāṇān pitarau na caiva tanayān bandhūnna dārānna ca
T09bsa032_u:4698: āśāvāṃstu subhāṣitairabhigataḥ śrutvā hṛtaṃ māṃ dvijo
T09bsa032_u:4699: nairāśyena sa dahyate dhruvamiti smṛtvāsmi sāsrekṣaṇaḥ // Jm_31.16 //
T09bsa032_u:4706: anyo hi mārgo nṛpa madvidhānāmanyādṛśastvanyajanābhipannaḥ // Jm_31.19 //
T09bsa032_u:4708: idaṃ tvayā hyādṛtamucyamānaṃ śraddheyatāṃ naiva kathaṃcideti /
T09bsa032_u:4709: ko nāma mṛtyorvadanādvimuktaḥ svasthaḥ sthitastatpunarabhyupeyām // Jm_31.20 //
T09bsa032_u:4710: duruttaraṃ mṛtyubhayaṃ vyatītya sukhe sthitaḥ śrīmati veśmani sve /
T09bsa032_u:4711: kiṃ nāma tatkāraṇamasti yena tvaṃ matsamīpaṃ punarabhyupeyāḥ // Jm_31.21 //
T09bsa032_u:4716: lobhena mṛtyośca bhayena satyaṃ satyaṃ yadeke tṛṇavattyajanti /
T09bsa032_u:4717: satāṃ tu satyaṃ vasu jīvitaṃ ca kṛcchre 'pyatastanna parityajanti // Jm_31.22 //
T09bsa032_u:4718: na jīvitaṃ yatsukhamaihikaṃ vā satyāccyutaṃ rakṣati durgatibhyaḥ /
T09bsa032_u:4719: satyaṃ vijahyāditi kastadarthaṃ yaccākaraḥ stutiyaśaḥsukhānām // Jm_31.23 //
T09bsa032_u:4722: śraddheyatāṃ naiti śubhaṃ tathā ca kiṃ vīkṣya śaṅkā tava mayyapīti // Jm_31.24 //
T09bsa032_u:4723: tvatto bhayaṃ yadi ca nāma mamābhaviṣyat saṅgaḥ sukheṣu karuṇāvikalaṃ mano vā /
T09bsa032_u:4725: tvatsaṃstavastvayamabhīpsita eva me syāt tasya dvijasya saphalaśramatāṃ vidhāya /
T09bsa032_u:4726: eṣyāmyahaṃ punarapi svayamantikaṃ te nāsmadvidhā hi vitathāṃ giramudgiranti // Jm_31.26 //
T09bsa032_u:4727: atha saudāsastad bodhisattvavacanaṃ vikalpitamivāmṛṣyamāṇaścintāmāpede - suṣṭhu khalvayaṃ satyavāditayā ca dharmikatayā ca vikatthate /
T09bsa032_u:4730: asti hi me svabhujavīryapratāpādvaśīkṛtaṃ śatamātraṃ kṣatriyakumārāṇām /
T09bsa032_u:4731: tairyathopayācitaṃ bhūtayajñaṃ kariṣyāmīti vicintya bodhisattvamuvāca - tena hi gaccha /
T09bsa032_u:4733: gatvā kṛtvā ca tasya tvaṃ dvijasya yadabhīpsitam /
T09bsa032_u:4735: atha bodhisattvastathetyasmai pratiśrutya svabhavanamabhigataḥ pratinandyamānaḥ svena janena tamāhūya brāhmaṇaṃ tasmād gāthācatuṣṭayaṃ śuśrāva
T09bsa032_u:4736: tacchrutvā subhāṣitābhiprasāditamanāḥ sa mahāsattvaḥ saṃrādhayan priyavacanasatkārapuraḥsaraṃ sāhasrikīṃ gāthāṃ kṛtvā samabhilaṣitenārthena taṃ brāhmaṇaṃ pratipūjayāmāsa /
T09bsa032_u:4737: athainaṃ tasya pitā asthānātivyayanivāraṇodyatamatiḥ prastāvakramāgataṃ sānunayamityuvāca - tāta subhāṣitapratipūjane sādhu mātrāṃ jñātumarhasi
T09bsa032_u:4741: śatena saṃpūjayituṃ subhāṣitaṃ paraṃ pramāṇaṃ na tataḥ paraṃ kṣamam /
T09bsa032_u:4743: samarthamarthaḥ paramaṃ hi sādhanaṃ na tadvirodhena yataścaretpriyam /
T09bsa032_u:4745: narādhipaṃ śrīrna hi kośasaṃpadā vivarjitaṃ veśavadhūrivekṣate // Jm_31.29 //
T09bsa032_u:4747: arghapramāṇaṃ yadi nāmaṃ kartuṃ śakyaṃ bhaveddeva subhāṣitānām /
T09bsa032_u:4748: vyaktaṃ na te vācyapathaṃ vrajeya tanniṣkrayaṃ rājyamapi prayacchan // Jm_31.30 //
T09bsa032_u:4749: śrutvaiva yannāma manaḥ prasādaṃ śreyo 'nurāgaḥ sthiratāṃ ca yāti /
T09bsa032_u:4750: prajñā vivṛddhyā vitamaskatāṃ ca krayyaṃ nanu syādapi tatsvamāṃsaiḥ // Jm_31.31 //
T09bsa032_u:4751: dīpaḥ śrutaṃ mohatamaḥpramāthī caurādyahāryaṃ paramaṃ dhanaṃ ca /
T09bsa032_u:4752: saṃmohaśatruvyathanāya śastraṃ nayopadeṣṭā paramaśca mantrī // Jm_31.32 //
T09bsa032_u:4754: balaṃ mahaddoṣabalāvamardi paraṃ nidhānaṃ yaśasaḥ śriyaśca // Jm_31.33 //
T09bsa032_u:4767: śaktaḥ kathaṃ nāma na pūjayamājñāṃ kathaṃ vā tava laṅghayeyam // Jm_31.38 //
T09bsa032_u:4770: athainaṃ pitā snehātsamutpatitasaṃbhramaḥ sādaramuvāca - tavaiva khalu tāta hitāvekṣiṇā mayaivamabhihitam /
T09bsa032_u:4776: apātakaṃ hi svaprāṇaparirakṣānimittaṃ gurujanārthaṃ cānṛtamārgo vedavihita iti /
T09bsa032_u:4778: arthakāmābhyāṃ ca virodhidṛṣṭaṃ dharmasaṃśrayamanayamiti vyasanamiti ca rājñāṃ pracakṣate nītikuśalāḥ /
T09bsa032_u:4780: athāpyayaśasyaṃ mārṣa dharmavirodhi ceti pratijñāvisaṃvādanamanucitatvānna vyavasyati te matiḥ,
T09bsa032_u:4781: evamapīdaṃ tvadvimokṣaṇārthaṃ samudyaktaṃ sajjameva no hastyaśvarathapattikāyaṃ saṃpannamanuraktaṃ kṛtāstraśūrapuruṣamanekasamaranīrājitaṃ mahanmahaughabhīmaṃ balam /
T09bsa032_u:4785: bodhisattva uvāca - notsahe deva anyathā pratijñātumanyathā kartuṃ śocyeṣu vā vyasanapaṅkanimagneṣu narakābhimukheṣu suhṛtsu svajanapartiyakteṣvanātheṣu ca tadvidheṣu prahartum /
T09bsa032_u:4791: upakārī viśeṣeṇa so 'nukampyo mayā yataḥ // Jm_31.42 //
T09bsa032_u:4793: kā hi tasya śaktirasti māmevamabhigataṃ vihiṃsitumiti /
T09bsa032_u:4794: evamanunīya ca mahatmā pitaraṃ vinivāraṇasodyamaṃ ca vinivartya praṇayyijanamanuraktaṃ
T09bsa032_u:4795: ca balakāyamekākī vigatabhayadainayaḥ satyānurakṣī lokahitārthaṃ saudāsamabhivineṣyaṃstanniketamabhijagāma /
T09bsa032_u:4800: iti svayamupeto 'yaṃ hī dhairyaṃ sādhu satyatā // Jm_31.44 //
T09bsa032_u:4802: iti prāṇān svarājyaṃ ca satyārthaṃ yo 'yamatyajat // Jm_31.45 //
T09bsa032_u:4804: prāptaṃ subhāṣitadhanaṃ pratipūjito 'rthī prītiṃ manaśca gamitaṃ bhavataḥ prabhāvāt /
T09bsa032_u:4805: prāptastadasmyayamaśāna yathepsitaṃ māṃ yajñāya vā mama paśuvratamādiśa tvam // Jm_31.46 //
T09bsa032_u:4807: nātyeti kālo mama khādituṃ tvāṃ dhūmākulā tāvadiyaṃ citāpi /
T09bsa032_u:4808: vidhūmapakvaṃ viśitaṃ ca hṛdyaṃ śṛṇmastadetāni subhāṣitāni // Jm_31.47 //
T09bsa032_u:4811: imāśca dharmaṃ pravadanti gāthāḥ sametyadharmeṇa yato na dharmaḥ // Jm_31.48 //
T09bsa032_u:4813: nāṣti satyaṃ kuto dharmaḥ kiṃ śrutena kariṣyasi // Jm_31.49 //
T09bsa032_u:4816: ko 'sau nṛpaḥ kathaya yo na samudyatāstraḥ krīḍāvane vanamṛgīdayitānnihanti /
T09bsa032_u:4817: tdvannihanmi manujān yadi vṛttihetorādharmikaḥ kila tato 'smi na te mṛgaghnāḥ // Jm_31.50 //
T09bsa032_u:4819: dharme sthitā na khalu te 'pi namanti yeṣāṃ bhītadruteṣvapi mṛgeṣu śarāsanāni /
T09bsa032_u:4820: tebhyo 'pi nindyatama eva narāśanastu jātyucchritā hi puruṣā na ca bhakṣaṇīyāḥ // Jm_31.51 //
T09bsa032_u:4821: atha saudāsaḥ parikarkaśākṣaramapyabhidhīyamāno bodhisattvena tanmaitrīguṇaprabhāvādabhibhūtaraudrasvabhāvaḥ sukhāyamāna eva tadvacanamabhiprahasannuvāca - bhoḥ sutasoma
T09bsa032_u:4822: mukto mayā nāma sametya gehaṃ samantato rājyavibhūtiramyam /
T09bsa032_u:4823: yanmatsamīpaṃ punarāgatastvaṃ na nītimārge kuśalo 'si tasmāt // Jm_31.52 //
T09bsa032_u:4825: ahameva tu kuśalo nītimārge yadenaṃ na pratipattumicchāmi /
T09bsa032_u:4827: na tu prasiddhiḥ saukhyasya tatra kiṃ nāma kauśalam // Jm_31.53 //
T09bsa032_u:4829: ye nītimārgapratipattidhīrāḥ prāyeṇa te pretya patantyapāyān /
T09bsa032_u:4830: apāsya jihmāniti nītimārgān satyānurakṣī punarāgato 'smi // Jm_31.54 //
T09bsa032_u:4831: ataśca nītau kuśalo 'hameva tyaktvānṛtaṃ yo 'bhirato 'smi satye /
T09bsa032_u:4832: na tatsunītaṃ hi vadanti rajjñā yannānubadhnanti yaśaḥsukhārthāḥ // Jm_31.55 //
T09bsa032_u:4834: prāṇān priyān svajanamaśrumukhaṃ ca hitvā rājyāśrayāṇi ca sukhāni mahoharāṇi /
T09bsa032_u:4836: kāmarthasiddhimanupaśyasi satyavākye tadrakṣaṇārthamapi māṃ yadupāgato 'si // Jm_31.56 //
T09bsa032_u:4839: malyaśriyaṃ hṛdyatayātiśete sarvān rasān svādutayā ca satyam /
T09bsa032_u:4842: dvāraṃ praveśāya surālayasya saṃsāradurgottaraṇāya setuḥ // Jm_31.58 //
T09bsa032_u:4843: atha saudāsaḥ sādhu yuktamityabhipraṇamyainaṃ savismayamabhivīkṣamāṇaḥ punaruvāca -
T09bsa032_u:4844: anye na rā madvaśagā bhavanti dainyārpaṇāttrāsaviluptadhairyaḥ /
T09bsa032_u:4845: saṃtyajyase tvaṃ tu na dhairyalakṣmyā manye na te mṛtyubhayaṃ narendra // Jm_31.59 //
T09bsa032_u:4852: tadeva kartuṃ na tu saṃsmarāmi bhavedyato me manaso 'nutāpaḥ /
T09bsa032_u:4853: sātmīkṛtaṃ karma ca śuklamasmāddharmasthitaḥ ko maraṇādvibhīyāt // Jm_31.62 //
T09bsa032_u:4854: na ca smarāmyarthijanopayānaṃ yanna praharṣāya mamārthināṃ vā /
T09bsa032_u:4856: iti pradānaiḥ samavāptatuṣṭirdharme sthitaḥ ko maraṇādbibhīyāt // Jm_31.63 //
T09bsa032_u:4857: ciraṃ vicintyāpi ca naiva pāpe manaḥpadanyāsamapi smarāmi /
T09bsa032_u:4859: vipreṣu bandhuṣu suhṛtsu samāṣriteṣu dīne jane yadiṣu cāśramabhūṣaṇeṣu /
T09bsa032_u:4860: nyastaṃ mayā bahu dhanaṃ dadatā yathārhaṃ kṛtyaṃ ca yasya yadabhūttadakāri tasya // Jm_31.65 //
T09bsa032_u:4863: mṛtyorna me bhayamatastadavāptatuṣṭeryajñāya tatsamupaklpaya bhauṅkṣva vā mām // Jm_31.66 //
T09bsa032_u:4864: tadupaśrutya saudāsaḥ prasādāśruvyāptanayanaḥ samudbhiyamānaromāñcapiṭako vismṛtapāpasvabhāvatāmisraḥ sabahumānamavekṣya bodhisattvamuvāca - śāntaṃ pāpam /
T09bsa032_u:4865: adyādviṣaṃ sa khalu hāhahalaṃ prajānannāśīviṣaṃ prakupitaṃ jvaladāyasaṃ vā /

T09bsa032_u:4868: anena hi te vacanakusumavarṣeṇābhiprasāditamanasaḥ suṣṭutaramabhivṛddhaṃ ca teṣu me kautūhalam / api ca bhoḥ /
T09bsa032_u:4870: api nāmāgatāvegaṃ syanme dharmotsukaṃ manaḥ // Jm_31.68 //
T09bsa032_u:4871: athainaṃ bodhisattvaḥ patrīkṛtāśayaṃ dharmaśravaṇapravaṇamānasamavetyovāca - tena hi dharmārthinā tadanurūpasamudācārasauṣṭhavena dharmaḥ śrotuṃ yuktam / paśya /
T09bsa032_u:4877: atha saudāsaḥ svenottarīyeṇa samāstīryoccaistaraṃ śilātalaṃ tatra cādhiropya bodhisattvaṃ
T09bsa032_u:4880: atha bodhisattvo navāmbhodharaninadamadhureṇa gambhīreṇāpūrayanniva tadvanaṃ vyāpinā svareṇovāca /
T09bsa032_u:4883: tadupaśrutya saudāsaḥ sādhu sādhviti svaśiraḥ prakampyāṅgalīvīkṣepaṃ bodhisattvamuvāca - tatastataḥ?
T09bsa032_u:4885: na sajjanād duracaraḥ kvacidbhavedbhajeta sādhūn vinayakramānugaḥ /
T09bsa032_u:4889: sthāne khalu niyukto 'rthaḥ sthāne nāvekṣitaḥ śramaḥ // Jm_31.73 //
T09bsa032_u:4892: rathā nṛpāṇāṃ maṇihemabhūṣaṇā vrajanti dehāśca jarāvirūpatām /
T09bsa032_u:4893: satāṃ tu dharmaṃ na jarābhivartate sthirānurāgā hi guṇeṣu sādhavaḥ // Jm_31.74 //
T09bsa032_u:4898: nabhaśca dure vasudhātalācca pārādavāraṃ ca mahārṇavasya /
T09bsa032_u:4899: astācalendrādudayastato 'pi dharmaḥ satāṃ dūratare 'satāṃ ca // Jm_31.75 //
T09bsa032_u:4903: ānanditastatpratipūjanārthaṃ varānahaṃ te caturo dadāmi // Jm_31.76 //
T09bsa032_u:4905: athainaṃ bodhisattvaḥ savismayabahumāna uvāca kastvaṃ varapradānasya?
T09bsa032_u:4907: sa tvaṃ varaṃ dāsyasi kaṃ parasmai śubhapravṛterapavṛttabhāvaḥ // Jm_31.77 //
T09bsa032_u:4908: ahaṃ ca dehīti varaṃ vadeyaṃ manaśca ditsāthiśilaṃ tava syāt /
T09bsa032_u:4909: tamatyayaṃ kaḥ saghṛṇo 'bhyupeyādetāvadevālamalaṃ yato naḥ // Jm_31.78 //
T09bsa032_u:4910: atha saudāsaḥ kiṃcid vrīḍāvanatavadano bodhisattvamuvāca - alamatrabhavato māmevaṃ viśaṅkitum /
T09bsa032_u:4912: visrabdhaṃ tad vṛṇīṣva tvaṃ yadyādicchasi bhūmipa // Jm_31.79 //
T09bsa032_u:4914: satyavarato bhava visarjaya sattvahiṃsāṃ bandīkṛtaṃ janamaśeṣamimaṃ vimuñca /
T09bsa032_u:4915: adyā na caiva naravīra manuṣyamāṃsametān varānanavarāṃścaturaḥ prayaccha // Jm_31.80 //
T09bsa032_u:4917: dadāmi pūrvān bhavate varāṃstrīnanyaṃ caturthaṃ tu varaṃ vṛṇīṣva /
T09bsa032_u:4918: avaiṣi kiṃ na tvamidaṃ yathāhamīśo virantuṃ na manuṣyamāṃsāt // Jm_31.81 //
T09bsa032_u:4920: nanūktaṃ mayā kastvaṃ varapradānasyeti? api ca bhoḥ?
T09bsa032_u:4921: satyavratatvaṃ ca kathaṃ syadahiṃsakatā ca te /
T09bsa032_u:4927: ahiṃsakatvaṃ ca kuto māṃsārthaṃ te ghnato narān /
T09bsa032_u:4928: satyevaṃ katame dattā bhavatā syurvarāstrayaḥ // Jm_31.84 //
T09bsa032_u:4930: tyaktvā rājyaṃ vane kleśo yasya heturtādhṛto mayā /
T09bsa032_u:4931: hato dharmaḥ kṣatā kīrtistyakṣyāmi tadahaṃ katham // Jm_31.85 //
T09bsa032_u:4936: nīcata sā kathaṃ nāma tvāmapyabhibhavediti // Jm_31.87 //
T09bsa032_u:4941: māṃsāni santi kuru tairhṛdayasya tuṣṭiṃ nindāvahādvirama sādhu manuṣyamāṃsāt // Jm_31.88 //
T09bsa032_u:4942: tūryasvanāna sajalatoyadanādadhīrān gītasvanaṃ ca niśi rājyasukhaṃ ca tattat /
T09bsa032_u:4943: bandhūn sutān parijanaṃ ca manonukūlaṃ hitvā kathaṃ nu ramase 'tra vane vivikte // Jm_31.89 //
T09bsa032_u:4944: cittasya nārhasi narendra vaśena gantuṃ dharmārthayoranuparodhapathaṃ bhajasva /

T09bsa032_u:4946: lokaḥ paro 'pi manujādhipa nanvavekṣyastasmātpriyaṃ yadahitaṃ ca na tanniṣevyam /
T09bsa032_u:4947: yatsyāttu kīrtyanuparodhi manojñamārgaṃ tadvipriyaṃ sadapi bheṣajavadbhajasva // Jm_31.91 //
T09bsa032_u:4949: atha saudāsaḥ prasādāśruvyāptanayano gadgadāyamānakaṅṭhaḥ samabhisṛtyaiva bodhisattvaṃ pādayoḥ saṃpariṣvajyovāca -
T09bsa032_u:4951: iti vicarati pāpe mṛtyudūtogravṛttau tvamiva hi ka ivānyaḥ sānukampo mayi syāt // Jm_31.92 //
T09bsa032_u:4952: śastā guruśca mama daivatameva ca tvaṃ mūrdhnā vacāṃsyahamamūni tavārcayāmi /
T09bsa032_u:4953: bhokṣye na caiva sutasoma manuṣyamāṃsaṃ yanmāṃ yathā vadasi tacca tathā kariṣye // Jm_31.93 //
T09bsa032_u:4954: nṛpātmajā yaṅanimittamāhṛtā mayā ca ye bandhanakhedapīḍitāḥ /
T09bsa032_u:4955: hatatviṣaḥ śokaparītamānasāstadehi muñcāva sahaiva tānapi // Jm_31.94 //
T09bsa032_u:4956: atha bodhisattvastathetyasmai pratiśrutya yatra te nṛpasutāstenāvaruddhāstatraivābhijagāma /
T09bsa032_u:4957: dṛṣṭai va ca te nṛpasutāḥ sutasomaṃ hanta muktā vayamiti paraṃ harṣamupajagmuḥ /
T09bsa032_u:4959: śaranmukhe candrakaropabṛhitā vijṛmbhamāṇāḥ kumudākarā iva // Jm_31.95 //
T09bsa032_u:4960: athainānabhigamya bodhisattvaḥ samāśvāsayan priyavacanapuraḥsaraṃ ca pratisaṃmodya
T09bsa032_u:4961: saudāsasyādrohāya śapathaṃ kārayitvā bandhanādvimucya sārdhaṃ saudāsena taiśca nṛpatiputrairanugamyamānaḥ
T09bsa032_u:4962: svaṃ rājyamupetya yathārhakṛtasaṃskārāṃstān rājaputrān saudāsaṃ ca sveṣu sveṣu rājyeṣu pratiṣṭhāpayāmāsa /
T09bsa032_u:4963: tadevaṃ śreyaḥ samādhatte yathātathāpyupanataḥ satsaṃgama iti śreyo 'rthinā sajjanasamāśrayeṇa bhavitavyam /
T09bsa032_u:4965: evaṃ saddharmaśravaṇaṃ doṣāpacayāya guṇasamādhānāya ca bhavatīti saddharmaśravaṇe 'pi vācyam /
T09bsa032_u:4967: satyakathāyāmapi vācyam - evaṃ sajjaneṣṭaṃ puṇyakīrtyākaraṃ satyavacanamityevaṃ svaprāṇasukheśvaryanirapekṣāḥ satyamanurakṣanti satpuruṣā iti
T09bsa032_u:4972: rājalakṣmīrapi śreyomārgaṃ nāvṛṇoti saṃvignamānasānāmiti saṃvegaparicayaḥ kāryaḥ /
T09bsa032_u:4976: vimukhasyāsaṃstutasyāpi ca lokasya hitaṃ sukhaviśeṣa ca kadācidanyatamasmin rājakule
T09bsa032_u:4979: sa jāyamāna eva tadrājakulaṃ tatsamānasukhaduḥkhaṃ ca puravaraṃ parayābhyudayaśriyā samyojayāmāsa /
T09bsa032_u:4987: lokaṃ tadā vyāptumivodyatā śrīrunmattagaṅgālalitaṃ cakāra // Jm_32.4 //
T09bsa032_u:4988: tena ca samayena tasya rājño jātā jātāḥ kumārā mriyante sma /
T09bsa032_u:4989: sa taṃ vidhimamānuṣakṛtamiti manyamānastasya tanayasya rakṣārthaṃ maṇikāñcanarajatabhakticitre
T09bsa032_u:4990: śrīmati sarvāyase prasūtibhavane bhūtavidyāparidṛṣṭena vedavihitena ca krameṇa vihitarakṣodhnapratīkāre
T09bsa032_u:4993: (Vaidya 234) tamapi ca mahāsattvaṃ sattvasaṃpatteḥ puṇyopacayaprabhāvātsusaṃvihitatvācca rakṣāyā nāmānuṣāḥ prasehire /
T09bsa032_u:4996: nisargasiddhena ca vinayānurāgeṇa paraṃ premāspadaṃ svajanasya janasya ca babhūva /
T09bsa032_u:5000: saṃbandhasiddhirlokasya kā hi candramasā saha // Jm_32.6 //
T09bsa032_u:5002: snehabahumānasumukhena ca pitrā viśvāsananirviśaṅkaṃ dṛśyamānaḥ kadācitsvasmin puravare
T09bsa032_u:5008: paurajānapadasya samudayaśobhāmālokya labdhapraharṣāvakāśe 'pi manasi kṛtasaṃvegaparicayatvātpūrvajanmasu smṛtiṃ pratilebhe /
T09bsa032_u:5011: evaṃvidhāyāṃ ca jagatpravṛttāvaho yathā nirbhayatā janānām /
T09bsa032_u:5014: avaśyagamye paralokadurge harṣāvakāśo 'tra sacetasaḥ kaḥ // Jm_32.9 //
T09bsa032_u:5016: meghāstaḍidbhāsurahemamālāḥ saṃbhūya bhūyo vilayaṃ vrajanti // Jm_32.10 //
T09bsa032_u:5018: taṭaiḥ samaṃ tadvinibaddhamūlān hṛtvā tarūṃllabdhajavaiḥ payobhiḥ /
T09bsa032_u:5019: bhavanti bhūyaḥ saritaḥ kramena śokopatāpādiva dinarūpāḥ // Jm_32.11 //
T09bsa032_u:5020: hṛtvāpi śṛṅgāṇi mahīdharāṇāṃ vegena vṛndāni ca toyadānām /
T09bsa032_u:5021: vighūrṇya codvartya ca sāgarāmbhaḥ prayāti nāśa pavanaprabhāvaḥ // Jm_32.12 //
T09bsa032_u:5023: krameṇa śobhāśca vanāntarāṇāmudyanti bhūyaśca tirobhavanti // Jm_32.13 //
T09bsa032_u:5024: kaḥ saṃprayogo na viyoganiṣṭhaḥ kāḥ saṃpado yā na vipatparaiti /
T09bsa032_u:5026: iti sa parigaṇayan mahātmā saṃvegādvyāvṛttapramodauddhavena manasā ramaṇīyeṣvapi
T09bsa032_u:5028: tadabhivṛddhasaṃvegaśca viṣayasukheṣvanāstho dharma ekaḥ śaraṇamiti tatpratipattiniścitamatiryathāprastāvamabhigamya rājānaṃ kṛtāñjalistapovanagamanāyānujñāmayācata
T09bsa032_u:5031: tacchratvā priyatanayaḥ sa tasya rājā digdhena dvirada iveṣuṇābhividdhaḥ /
T09bsa032_u:5033: nivārayiṣyannatha taṃ sa rājā snehātpaṣvajya sabāṣpakaṇṭhaḥ /
T09bsa032_u:5034: uvāca kasmātsahasaiva tāta saṃtyaktumasmān matimityakārṣīḥ // Jm_32.17 //
T09bsa032_u:5038: athāpi kiṃcitpariśaṅkitaṃ vā mayi vyalīkaṃ samupaśrutaṃ vā /
T09bsa032_u:5039: tadbrūhi yāvadviramāmi tasmātpaśyāmi na tvātmani kiṃcidīdṛk // Jm_32.19 //
T09bsa032_u:5042: vipriyeṇa samarthaḥ syānmāmāsādayituṃ ca kaḥ // Jm_32.20 //
T09bsa032_u:5043: atha kiṃ tarhi naḥ parityuaktumicchasīti cābhihitaḥ sāśrunayanena rājñā sa mahāsattvastamuvāca - mṛtyubhayāt /
T09bsa032_u:5045: yāmeva rātriṃ prathamāmupaiti garbhe nivāsaṃ naravīra lokaḥ /
T09bsa032_u:5046: tataḥ prabhṛtyaskhalitaprayāṇaḥ sa pratyahaṃ mṛtyusamīpameti // Jm_32.21 //
T09bsa032_u:5047: nītau suyukto 'pi bale sthito 'pi nātyeti kaścinmaraṇaṃ jarāṃ vā /
T09bsa032_u:5050: jetuṃ kṛtā taripumekamapi tvaśaktāstanme matirbhavati dharmamabhiprapattum // Jm_32.23 //
T09bsa032_u:5052: sārdhaṃ balairatibalasya tu mṛtyuśatrormanvādayo 'pi vivaśā vaśamabhyupetāḥ // Jm_32.24 //
T09bsa032_u:5054: saṃcūrṇya dantamusalaiḥ puragopurāṇi mattā dvipā yudhi rathāṃśca narān dvīpāṃśca /
T09bsa032_u:5055: naivāntakaṃ pratimukhābhigataṃ nudanti vaprāntalabdhavijayairapi tairviṣāṇaiḥ // Jm_32.25 //
T09bsa032_u:5057: iṣubhistadastrakuśalā dviṣataściravairiṇaṃ na tu kṛtāntamarim // Jm_32.26 //
T09bsa032_u:5059: bhittvaiva ca śrutamanāṃsi ravaiḥ pareṣāṃ mṛtyuṃ sametya hatadarpabalāḥ svapanti // Jm_32.27 //
T09bsa032_u:5060: doṣānurūpaṃ praṇayanti daṇḍaṃ kṛtāparādheṣu nṛpāḥ pareṣu /
T09bsa032_u:5061: mahāparādhe yadi mṛtyuśatrau na daṇḍanītipravaṇā bhavanti // Jm_32.28 //
T09bsa032_u:5065: daṃṣṭavyayatnavidhurāstu bhavanti mṛtyau vadhye 'pi nityamapakāravidhānadakṣe // Jm_32.30 //
T09bsa032_u:5066: daṣṭasya koparabhasairapi pannagaiśca mantrairviṣaṃ praśamayantyagadaiśca vaidyāḥ /
T09bsa032_u:5070: sarpān haranti vitatagrahaṇāḥ suparṇā mṛtyuṃ punaḥ pramathituṃ na tathotsahante // Jm_32.32 //
T09bsa032_u:5072: vyāghrāḥ pibanti rudhirāṇi vane mṛgāṇāṃ naivaṃpravṛttipaṭavastu bhavanti mṛtyau // Jm_32.33 //
T09bsa032_u:5073: daṣṭrākarālamapi nāma mṛgaḥ sametya vaiyāghramānanamupaiti punarvimokṣam /
T09bsa032_u:5074: mṛtyormukhaṃ tu pṛthurogajarārtidaṃṣṭraṃ prāptasya kasya ca punaḥ śivatātirasti // Jm_32.34 //
T09bsa032_u:5075: pibanti nṝṇāṃ vikṛtogravigrahā śaujasāyūṃṣi dṛḍhagrahā grahāḥ /
T09bsa032_u:5080: ko 'pi prabhāvastvayamantakasyayadbhrāmyate tairapi nāsya cakṣuḥ // Jm_32.37 //
T09bsa032_u:5081: hatvā viṣāṇi ca tapobalasiddhamantrā vyādhīnnṛṇāmupaśamayya ca vaidyavaryāḥ /
T09bsa032_u:5082: dhanvantariprabhṛtayo 'pi gatā vināśaṃ dharmāya me namati tena matirvanānte // Jm_32.38 //
T09bsa032_u:5083: āvirbhavanti ca punaśca tirobhavanti gacchanti vānilapathena mahīṃ viśanti /
T09bsa032_u:5084: vidyādharā vividhamantrabalaprabhāvā mṛtyuṃ sametya tu bhavanti hataprabhāvāḥ // Jm_32.39 //
T09bsa032_u:5086: dṛptānapi pratinudantyasurān surendrā dṛptānapi pratinudantyasurāḥ surāṃśca /
T09bsa032_u:5087: mānādhirūḍhamatibhiḥ sumudīrṇasainyaistaiḥ saṃhatairapi tu mṛtyurajayya eva // Jm_32.40 //
T09bsa032_u:5089: na manyunā snehaparikṣayeṇa vā prayāmi dharmāya tu niścito vanam // Jm_32.41 //
T09bsa032_u:5090: rājovāca - atha vane tava ka āśvāsaḥ evamapratikriye mṛtyubhaye sati dharmaparigrahe ca /
T09bsa032_u:5091: kiṃ tvā vane na samupaiṣyati mṛtyuśatrurdharme sthitāḥ kimṛṣayo na vane vinaṣṭāḥ /
T09bsa032_u:5092: sarvatra nāma niyataḥ krama eṣa tatra ko 'rtho vihāya bhavanaṃ vanasaṃśrayeṇa // Jm_32.42 //
T09bsa032_u:5094: kāmaṃ sthiteṣu bhavane ca vane ca mṛtyurdharmātmakesu viguṇeṣu ca tulyavṛttiḥ /
T09bsa032_u:5095: dharmātmanāṃ bhavati na tvanutāpahetudharmaśca nāma vana eva sukha prapattum // Jm_32.43 //
T09bsa032_u:5100: aśāntacetā vyasanodayāgamaiḥ kadā gṛhasthaḥ śamamārgameṣyati // Jm_32.45 //
T09bsa032_u:5102: śamaikakāryaḥ parituṣṭamānasaḥ sukhaṃ ca dharmaṃ ca yaśāṃsi cārcchati // Jm_32.46 //
T09bsa032_u:5104: dharmaśca rakṣati naraṃ na dhanaṃ balaṃ vā dharmaḥ sukhāya mahate na vibhutisiddhiḥ /
T09bsa032_u:5105: dharmātmanaśca mudameva karoti mṛtyurna hyasti durgatibhayaṃ niratasya dharme // Jm_32.47 //
T09bsa032_u:5106: kriyāviśeṣaśca yathā vyavasthitaḥ śubhasya pāpasya ca bhinnalakṣaṇaḥ /
T09bsa032_u:5107: tathā vipāko 'pyaśubhasya durgatiścitrasya dharmasya sukhāśrayā gatiḥ // Jm_32.48 //
T09bsa032_u:5108: ityanunīya sa mahātmā pitaraṃ kṛtābhyanujñaḥ pitrā tṛṇavadapāsya rājyalakṣmīṃ tapovanāśrayaṃ cakāra /
T09bsa032_u:5109: tatra ca dhyānānyapramāṇāni cotpādya teṣu ca pratiṣṭhāpya lokaṃ brahmalokamadhiroha /
T09bsa032_u:5110: tadevaṃ saṃvignamanasāṃ rājalakṣmīrapi śreyomārgaṃ nāvṛṇotīti saṃvegaparicayaḥ kāryaḥ /
T09bsa032_u:5115: evaṃ vane dharmaḥ sukhaṃ pratipattuṃ na geha ityevamapyunneyam /
T09bsa032_u:5119: sati kṣantavye kṣamā syānnāsatītyapakāriṇāmapi sādhavo lābhamiva bahu manyante /
T09bsa032_u:5121: bodhisattvaḥ kilānyatamasminnaraṇyapradeśe paṅkasaṃparkātparuṣavapurṇīlameghaviccheda iva pādacārī vanamahiṣavṛṣo babhūva /
T09bsa032_u:5122: sa tasyāṃ durlabhadharmasaṃjñāyāṃ saṃmohabahulāyāmapi tiryaggatau vartamānaḥ paṭuvijñānatvānna dharmacaryānirudyogamatirbabhūva /
T09bsa032_u:5123: cirānuvṛttyevaḥ nibaddhabhāvā na taṃ kadācitkaruṇā mumoca /
T09bsa032_u:5124: ko 'pi prabhāva sa tu karmaṇo vā tasyaiva vā yatsa tathā babhūva // Jm_33.1 //
T09bsa032_u:5126: kṛpātmakaḥ sannapi yatsa bheje tiryaggatiṃ tatra ca dharmasaṃjñām // Jm_33.2 //
T09bsa032_u:5127: vinā na karmāsti gatiprabandhaḥ śubhaṃ na cāniṣṭavipākamasti /
T09bsa032_u:5128: sa dharmasaṃjñīpi tu karmaleśāṃstāṃstān samāsādya tathā tathāsīt // Jm_33.3 //
T09bsa032_u:5129: athānyatamo duṣṭavānarastasya kālāntarābhivyaktāṃ prakṛtibhadratāṃ dayānuvṛttyā ca
T09bsa032_u:5130: vigatakrodhasaṃrambhatāmavetya nāsmādbhayamastīti taṃ mahāsattvaṃ tena tena vihiṃsākrameṇa
T09bsa032_u:5133: parāṃ vrajati vikriyāṃ na hi bhayaṃ tataḥ paśyati /
T09bsa032_u:5135: vinīta iva nīcakaiścarati tatra śāntoddhavaḥ // Jm_33.4 //
T09bsa032_u:5136: sa kadācittasya mahāsattvasya visrabdhaprasuptasya nidrāvaśādvā pracalāyataḥ sahasaivopari nipatati sma /
T09bsa032_u:5140: salilāvagāhanasamutsukasyāpyasya kadācicchiraḥ samabhiruhya pāṇibhyāṃ nayane samāvavre /
T09bsa032_u:5143: bodhisattvo 'pi mahasattvaḥ sarvaṃ tadasyāvinayaceṣṭitamupakāramiva manyamāno niḥsaṃkṣobhasaṃrambhamanyurmarṣayāmāsa /
T09bsa032_u:5145: abhyāsāttatra ca satāmupakāra iva kṣamā // Jm_33.5 //
T09bsa032_u:5146: atha kilānyatamo yakṣastamasya paribhavamamṛṣyamāno bhāvaṃ vā jijñāsamānastasya mahāsattvasya
T09bsa032_u:5147: tena duṣṭakapinā vāhyamānaṃ taṃ mahiṣavṛṣabhaṃ mārge sthitvedamuvācamā tāvadbhoḥ
T09bsa032_u:5151: utāho balamātmagataṃ nāveṣi yadevamanena paribhūya vāhyase? nanu bhoḥ
T09bsa032_u:5154: idaṃ ca śailopamasaṃhatasthiraṃ samagraśobhaṃ balasaṃpadā vapuḥ /
T09bsa032_u:5155: svabhāvasaujaskanirīkṣitorjitaṃ durāsadaṃ kesariṇo 'pi te bhavet // Jm_33.7 //
T09bsa032_u:5156: mathāna dhṛtvā tadimaṃ kṣureṇa vā viṣāṇakoṭyā madamasya voddhara /
T09bsa032_u:5158: asajjanaḥ kutra yathā cikitsyate guṇānuvṛttyā sukhaśīlasaumyayā /
T09bsa032_u:5159: kaṭuṣṇarūkṣākṣi hi yatra siddhaye kaphātmako roga iva prasarpati // Jm_33.9 //
T09bsa032_u:5161: avaimyenaṃ calaṃ nūnaṃ sadā cāvinaye ratam /
T09bsa032_u:5162: ata eva mayā tvasya yuktaṃ marṣayituṃ nanu // Jm_33.10 //
T09bsa032_u:5164: vinayācāraśīreṣu kṣantavyaṃ kiṃ ca sādhuṣu // Jm_33.11 //
T09bsa032_u:5168: asatkriyā hīnabalāścca nāma nirdeśakālaḥ paramo guṇānām /
T09bsa032_u:5170: nityaṃ kṣamāyāśca nanu kṣamāyāḥ kālaḥ parāyattayā durāpaḥ /
T09bsa032_u:5171: pareṇa tasminnupapādite ca tatraiva kopapraṇa kopapraṇakramaḥ kaḥ // Jm_33.14 //
T09bsa032_u:5173: na cetkṣamāmapyahamatra kuryāmanya kṛtaghno bata kīdṛśaḥ syāt // Jm_33.15 //
T09bsa032_u:5174: yakṣa uvāca - tena hi na tvamasyāḥ kacācitprabādhanāyā mokṣyase -
T09bsa032_u:5178: parasya pīḍāpraṇayena yatsukhaṃ nivāraṇaṃ syādasukhodayasya vā /
T09bsa032_u:5179: sukhārthinastanna niṣevituṃ kṣamaṃ na tadvipāko hi sukhaprasiddhaye // Jm_33.17 //
T09bsa032_u:5182: asatkriyāṃ prāpya ca tadvidhājjanānna mādṛśe 'pyevamasau kariṣyati /
T09bsa032_u:5184: na labdhadoṣo hi punastathācaredataśca muktirmama sā bhaviṣayti // Jm_33.19 //
T09bsa032_u:5185: atha yakṣastaṃ mahāsattvaṃ prasādavismayabahumānāvarjitamatiḥ sādhu sādhviti saśiraḥprakampāṅgalivikṣepamabhisaṃrādhya tattatpriyamuvāca -
T09bsa032_u:5187: kayāpi buddhyā tvidamāsthito vapustapovane ko 'pi bhavāṃstapasyati // Jm_33.20 //
T09bsa032_u:5188: ityenamabhipraśasya taṃ cāsya duṣṭavānaraṃ pṛṣṭhādavadhūya samādiśya cāsya rakṣāvidhānaṃ tatraivāntardadhe /
T09bsa032_u:5189: tadevaṃ sati kṣantavye kṣamā syānnāsatītyapakāriṇamapi sādhavo lābhamiva bahu manyante iti kṣāntikathāyāṃ vācyam /
T09bsa032_u:5191: ko nāma manuṣyabhūtaḥ pravrajitapratijño vā tadvikalaḥ śobheta?
T09bsa032_u:5199: bodhisattvaḥ kilānyatamasmin vanapradeśe nānāvidharāgaruciracitrapatraḥ śatapatro babhūva /
T09bsa032_u:5201: bālaiḥ pravālaiḥ sa mahīruhāṇāṃ puṣpādhivāsairmadhubhiśca hyadyaiḥ /
T09bsa032_u:5203: dharmaṃ parebhyaḥ pravadan yathārhamārtān yathāśakti samuddharaṃśca /
T09bsa032_u:5205: iti paripālyamānastena mahāsattvena tasmin vanapradeśe sattvakāyaḥ sācāryaka iva bandhumāniva savidya iva rājanvāniva sukhamabhyavardhata /
T09bsa032_u:5207: sa sattvakāyo 'pi tathaiva tena saṃrakṣyamāṇo guṇavṛddhimāpa // Jm_34.3 //
T09bsa032_u:5209: digdhaviddhamivānyatamasmin vanapradeśe reṇusaṃparkavyākulamalinake sarasaṭaṃ sihaṃ dadarśa /
T09bsa032_u:5210: samabhigamya cainaṃ karuṇayā paricodyamānaḥ papraccha - kimidaṃ mṛgarāja?
T09bsa032_u:5213: kṛtaṃ tavāsvāsthyamidaṃ śrameṇa vyādheṣuṇā vā rujayā kayācit // Jm_34.4 //
T09bsa032_u:5214: tad brūhi vācyaṃ mayi cedidaṃ te yadeva vā kṛtyamihocyatāṃ tat /
T09bsa032_u:5215: mamāsti yā mitragatā ca śaktistatsādhyasaukhyasya bhavān sukhī ca // Jm_34.5 //
T09bsa032_u:5217: siṃha uvāca - sādho pakṣivara na me śramajātamidamasvāsthyaṃ rujayā vyādheṣuṇā vā /
T09bsa032_u:5218: idaṃ tvasthiśakalaṃ galāntare vilagnaṃ śalyamiva māṃ bhṛśaṃ dunoti /
T09bsa032_u:5223: atha bodhisattvaḥ paṭuvijñānatvādvicintya śalyoddharaṇopāyaṃ tadvacanaviṣkambhapramāṇaṃ kāṣṭhamādāya taṃ siṃhamuvāca - yā te śaktistayā samyak tāvatsvamukhaṃ nirvyādehīti /
T09bsa032_u:5225: atha bodhisattvastadasya kāṣṭhaṃ dantapālyorantare samyagniveśya praviśya cāsya galamūlaṃ
T09bsa032_u:5231: uddhṛtya śalyena sahaiva tasya duḥkhaṃ ca tatsaṃjanitāṃ śucaṃ ca /
T09bsa032_u:5232: prītaḥ sa śalyoddharaṇādyathāsīt prītaḥ saśalyoddharaṇāttathāsīt // Jm_34.7 //
T09bsa032_u:5234: prasādhya saukhyaṃ vyasanaṃ nivartya vā sahāpi duḥkhena parasya sajjanaḥ /
T09bsa032_u:5235: upaiti tāṃ prītiviśeṣasaṃpadaṃ na yāṃ svasaukhyeṣu sukhāgateṣvapi // Jm_34.8 //
T09bsa032_u:5236: iti sa mahāsattvastasya tadduḥkhamupaśamayya prītahṛdayastamāmantrya siṃhaṃ pratinanditastena yatheṣṭaṃ jagāma /
T09bsa032_u:5237: atha sa kadācitpravitataruciracitrapatraḥ śatapatraḥ paribhraman kiṃcitkvacit tadvidhamāhārajātamanāsādya
T09bsa032_u:5240: kṛtopakāro 'pi tu na prasehe vaktuṃ sa yācñāvirasākṣaraṃ tam /
T09bsa032_u:5241: viśāradasyāpi hi tasya lajjā tatkālamaunavratamādideśa // Jm_34.9 //
T09bsa032_u:5242: kāryānurodhāttu tathāpi tasya cakṣuṣpathe hrīvidhuraṃ cacāra /
T09bsa032_u:5244: sa cānupaśyannapi taṃ durātmā nimantraṇāmapyakaronna tasya // Jm_34.10 //
T09bsa032_u:5245: śilātale bījamiva prakīrṇaṃ hutaṃ ca śāntoṣmaṇi bhasmapuñje /
T09bsa032_u:5246: samaprakāraṃ phalayogakāle kṛtaṃ kṛtaghne vidule ca puṣpam // Jm_34.11 //
T09bsa032_u:5247: atha bodhisattvo nūnamayaṃ māṃ na pratyabhijānīta iti nirviśaṅkataraḥ samabhigamyainamarthivṛttyā prayuktayuktāśīrvādaḥ saṃvibhāgamayācata -
T09bsa032_u:5251: kopāgnidīptayātipiṅgalayā didhakṣanniva vivartitayā dṛṣṭyā bodhisattvamīkṣamāṇa uvāca - mā tavadbhoḥ /
T09bsa032_u:5252: dayāklaibyaṃ na yo veda khādana visphurato mṛgān /
T09bsa032_u:5253: praviśya tasya me vaktraṃ yajjīvasi na tadbahu // Jm_34.13 //
T09bsa032_u:5255: jīvitena nu khinno 'si paraṃ lokaṃ didṛkṣase // Jm_34.14 //
T09bsa032_u:5256: atha bodhisattvastena tasya rūkṣākṣarakrameṇa pratyākhyānavacasā samupajātavrīḍastatraiva nabhaḥ samutpapāta /
T09bsa032_u:5258: athānyatamā vanadevatā tasya tamasatkāramasahamānā dhairyaprayāmajijñāsayā vā samutpatya taṃ mahāsattvamuvāca - pakṣivara,
T09bsa032_u:5262: śaktastvamasya nayane vadanābhighātād visphūrjitaḥ pramathituṃ balaśālino 'pi /
T09bsa032_u:5263: daṃṣṭrāntarasthamapi cāmiṣamasya hartuṃ tanmṛṣyate kimayamasya balāvalepaḥ // Jm_34.15 //
T09bsa032_u:5264: atha bodhisattvastathāpyasatkāraviprakṛtaḥ protsāhyamāno 'pi tayā vanadevatayā svāṃ prakṛtibhadratāṃ pradarśayannuvāca - alamalamanena krameṇa
T09bsa032_u:5266: ārte pravṛttiḥ sādhūnāṃ kṛpayā na tu lipsayā /
T09bsa032_u:5267: tāmavaitu paro mā vā tatra kopasya ko vidhiḥ // Jm_34.16 //
T09bsa032_u:5268: vañcanā sā ca tasyaiva yanna vetti kṛtaṃ paraḥ /
T09bsa032_u:5269: ko hi pratyupakārārthī tasya bhūyaḥ kariṣyati // Jm_34.17 //
T09bsa032_u:5275: upakṛtaṃ kila vetti na me parastadapakāramiti prakaroti yaḥ /
T09bsa032_u:5276: nanu viśodhya guṇaiḥ sa yaśastanuṃ dviradavṛttimabhipratipadyate // Jm_34.20 //
T09bsa032_u:5277: na vetti cedupakṛtamāturaḥ paro na yokṣyate 'pi sa guṇakāntayā śriyā /
T09bsa032_u:5278: sacetasaḥ punaratha ko bhavetkramaḥ samucchritaṃ pramathitumātmano yaśaḥ // Jm_34.21 //
T09bsa032_u:5282: atha sā devatā tatsubhāṣitaprasāditamanāḥ sādhu sādhviti punaruktamabhipraśasya tattatpriyamuvāca -
T09bsa032_u:5284: na veṣamātraṃ hi munitvasiddhaye guṇairupetastviha tattvato muniḥ // Jm_34.23 //
T09bsa032_u:5286: tadevaṃ protsāhyamāno 'pi sādhurnālaṃ pāpe pravartitumanabhyāsāditi sajjanapraśaṃsāyāṃ vācyam /
T09bsa032_u:5287: evaṃ kṣāntikathāyāmapyupaneyam - evaṃ kṣamāparicayānna vairabahulo bhavati,
T09bsa032_u:5289: evaṃ pratisaṃkhyānabahulāḥ svāṃ guṇaśobhāmanurakṣanti paṇḍitā iti pratisaṃkhyānavarṇe vācyam /
T09bsa032_u:5290: tathāgatamāhātmye ca bhadraprakṛtyabhyāsavarṇe ca - evaṃ bhadraprakṛtirabhyastā tiryaggatānāmapi na nivartata iti /
